64a5(1): phyin// 'gro ba thams cad snyed kyi thugs rje'i sgo// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs// rang 'byung de bas 'gro ba pa'i don mdzad do// sna tshogs spungs 'od
64a6(1): rnam thar 'di la 'jug/ sems can kun gyis bder gshegs mthong mthag/ mos pargya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal bgyi skalam la yang dge don/ 
64a7(1): myu gu yid 'a 'od kyi rnam thar min+da/ rdul ba kun gyi bsku'i yon tan 'khor// bsal ba rgya mtshor dang par mi nus to// 'grub kun gyi sangs rgyas bsam ma
64a8(1): rnam zer 'di ni 'phreng ba'i dpal gyis mthang// sngon chad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gis rnams// shing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dron// kun tu shes ra
64b1(1): smrasan lag ya stsa/  sman rgyag / g+sa gagasas su grus smra
64b2(1): ba'i legs nags med shin tu yas// sa tshogs rgyan gyi 'od kyis 'di mthong du/ bde ga shegs gsung nazhi bar ba 'i gsang // dag ba ya pa chen ba rna
64b3(1): bskyed// sems can mos pa ci bzhin de dag zhes// 'di ni sgra rnams sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas zhing // sangs
64b4(1): rgyas sbyin rlabs rgya nan rab tu 'byung // rgyal ba'i stan gyi skyid pa dag kyang srin// kun tu du 'dra dang po 'di 'jug/ ma dungs sems can yon tan byung ba dang / 
64b5(1): myos shing 'khor ba dag/ de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston// 'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo // sems can ma rungs spyor ba spyod pa rnams
64b6(1): bskul pa byebs sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan ni bde gshegs skad cig gcig gis bltas/ ro yis 'od kyi sku yis 'di mabyu // del 'a'i lce na du
64b7(1): na du rgyas par ga sa ma par m+WA / su mug na / du sa sa pa na pa slang bang ba pa zhes na/  nags

65a1(1): ri'i lha nus pa kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po lnga 'jug pas nag/ 
65a2(1): par snang ba zhes bya'o// ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis
65a3(1): rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o// rI'i lto snang byas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar po ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par ston pa zhes bya'o// 
65a4(1): ri'i lho stobs la grub pa med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi mapar thar pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o// ro'i lha kun nas gzu
65a5(1): brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i brgyan gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'jom pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lnga snang ba'i rdul rgyu
65a6(1): dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i de'i yon tan snang ba'i yang dge par ston pa zhes bya'o// ro'i lha kun tu mngon pa lI bI'i ma/ 
65a7(1): sa na mas kyi la gyur yang dag pa rnam par sprul par byeng sa byan na sa pa'i mamams
65a8(1): nas tshe dzim mnas kyi sa ma rgyam gyi ma
65b1(1): gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rtul ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos/ sngon mi skyong
65b2(1): mtha las rgyal ba lta// rnam thar gling gi rdul snyed pa sgom mdzad pas// 'gyu ba ma lus dge' ba'i thugs kyang brjod/ sangs rgyas smanas dri dang lnga bkyig

66a1(1): da par sems can sa bsngal 'bar gcas nas/ dngag ldan pa lan sa 'od sa sbrul/  ma dpa
66a2(1): rgyal ba'i skulas sangs rgyas lan ma/ breg sa dbyings sems can bamam bzhin du mug/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bam sa bkun druganas/ 'ad dang rdul gyi chu'i'i
66a3(1): 'jug go// sems can kun skyong dge ba rgya mtsho kun// de la phyogs bsrang sangs rgyas mngon pa srung / sna tshigs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang sngon/ tshul mngon mig
66a4(1): dethos so// chos sgo rgya mtsho ma zang chad med// sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung // bsal pa kun brjod 'jig rten mang la ston// rdo rje'i tshul mig 'dri
66a5(1): gnas la 'jug/ de las yi lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni skad cig skad cig gis sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje'i
66a6(1): 'khor gyis rnam par lwa ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bstsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod rnams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi
66a7(1): rgyun ces bya'o// sa'i la sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thang ba ni ting nge 'dzinas tshogs snyam pas rnam par skyed pa rjen med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i ladus dus su dge pa'i tshig ras
66a8(1): na pa'i ma tshan rims camams ca dga' nang bde bad brtse 'i byung ba zhes bya'o// pa'i lcags kyi mig sa dngos kyirnam pa yin gyi ma mngasasapa/ 
66b1(1): babyed pa'i tshul sa pa zhes byag/ sa lta sprums sus kyi'ang ma pa sred pa'i rnam par ra ba sangs rgyas rnams cad kyim na rgyu ma byung ma bya sas pa
66b2(1): nas bya'o// sa'i lhasgra dbyangs yang du'ang ba skrag pa'i rnam par thar ba na 'gro ba thams cad sa pa'i rgyamam byin gyis rngubs pa zhes bya'o// su l+h+wamadog gi sasum
66b3(1): kyi gtsug zung kyi rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyun gyi rnam par thar pa ni sangs
66b4(1): kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin rlabs kun nas rgyu zhi 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha dri ma snyed pa'i 'od lngakyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi snying thams cad kyi rul
66b5(1): yang dag par 'jug pa'i nas nanu bsgoms pa 'byung ba zhes phyi'o// de nas sa'i lha pal mim tog kun nas nyon tu rgyas pa ma med pas sa sa rgyas kyi mthus/ so
66b6(1): 'khyer cing kyila'o khor dkyil 'khor yid pa thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ de tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad skad cig skang cig bde gshegs na/ 
66b7(1): brjod du med pa'i sring rdzo rnams dang // byams pa'i sgra yang / dam med pa rnams pas na// de phyir sangs rgyu ste nga nanig skyes// dus snyam gdugs pa
66b8(1): ni ris rnams dang // jigang byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dag/ rgyal ba'i mu cig de skyed pa sa rnams 'od// ba mid rnams de mthang bdun
68a1(1): rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i dri mu med rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri
68a2(1): yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ 
68a3(1): de nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ grong khyer gyi lnga yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
68a4(1): 'di dag smras so// mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// snang ba bsnyengs shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin
68a5(1): mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon tu snang // sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te// de dag ma lus rgyal ba'i gro bar mkhyen/ 
68a6(1): rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir// sna tshogs 'od 'byung lta yang rab tu dga'// rgyal bas stsal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyod// sngun chad rgyal bas
68a7(1): kyang yang dag bzung // dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag blangs// rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob// 'gro ba 'dir ni dgra ba thugs rje byams pa/ 
68a8(1): cing // de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad sems can rnams// kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog/ nyon mongs yongs su stong ba 'di la dgal/ 
68b1(1): ban gcigs tsun macu gzugs rnama'athab na tsa mam pa na mas la sa/  ba sangs pa/ 
68b2(1): na tu da ba rda'i ltu bdu dag/ bsad nan sumam rgyacanamatha' yas pa// spyan chad de bzhin gshegs pas 'a sa smrasas/ 
68b3(1): ban 'am da dbus yang med// de dag ba sbyin cing 'bru ba rnam par 'dug/ rdzus ky-i rgyal mnan mtshadarnams
68b4(1): na pas / sa seM sa kyi ma par ma / ma ldan rna
68b5(1): dal d+ha ba gying chub kyi gang dag pa'i drim med pa'i rkyen gyis brtan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par bar nga ni/ sangs rgyas mang ba mtshad pa la yang dag pa
69a1(1): zhing sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab sde'i rin po che bod kyi rnam par thar 'gro ba thams cad dang mngan
69a2(1): mngon sum du byang chub yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug ste sgrog pa'i rgyal rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thams cad kyi ba
69a3(1): pa la sangs rgyas ston cing rmi lam gyi thar sangs rgyas kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig go rnam par tha
69a4(1): pa ni dka' ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i rnam par
69a5(1): pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin pa byed cing snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi 'phreng
69a6(1): ba'i 'od kyi gtsug bud kyi rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos kyi tshul zab ma ngon pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub
69a7(1): gi lha rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// snying
69a8(1): po byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa sras kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin brlabs shes bya'o// snying pa byed
69b1(1): nub kyi rdo sna chags kyi srin gyi nyam par bar ba ni sang pa byang chu ba rnam pa mtha' mas pa yang dag par smon pa'i rgyun ces bya// slong po rgyu chub kyi sa bdun na
69b2(1): 'angs sa ni pas brags rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o// maung bye byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i smra ba ma rmug+sas rnam par na pa'i 'ang ma rnam pa bang ba de de bzhin gshegs
69b3(1): sgribs na gsu dag ba na ba zhes bya'o// de nas ring po byung chub kyi la dge ba drim med pa rgyun sgru ba rgyal mnan rjes sangs rgyas mangs
69b4(1): ba byang chub kyi lnga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor med pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de nas de'i tshetshig sa su bcad pa de dag sngas ste// bskul pa mang po mdzad
69b5(1): dang dbus med par// de bzhin gshegs pas ni lang swan spyad lang/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing sra pa pes na// dpyid ngo ma bamed nams rnam
69b6(1): 'di tshad// nad rnams mtha' mas chud meda'ang med par// me ba zed gastong ba'i sman sa sman btang bas// deb ma la 'od kyi 'dzin// bang gzhesas
69b7(1): rlu nang brgya dga' bang 'gyud// bdu ga gags sprul pa rnam pa mtha' mas pa// 'dag ci rnams kun kya shAn// 'gro ba srungs rgam rmilam bzhi sa
69b8(1): // sprin gyi sna dbyangs lce de rab tu dga'// mtha' yas skal par dka' bar bsrung de// dang ba'i sman gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// chu mtsho'i sum
70a1(1): yongs su sngon btang ste// de la me dog mig gi lha dga'o// yon tan rin chen 'od 'gra mtha' yas sbyin// 'gro ba kun tu srid po byang chub nas/ 
70a2(1): rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis// 'od 'gro bgyed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'// sems can rnams kyi spyod pa'i rgya mtshos// de'i rgyal ba'i chos kyi chur yang
70a3(1): 'bebs// ji ltar mos par nim nur rnam par sel// de yis gtsug phud 'byung ba dga' ba thob// rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lta ni// sems kyi skad cig
70a4(1): gcig gis tshad med pa'i// chos don dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa// rgyo mtshor tha dang yang dag shes rabs 'jug/ ning rnam brjod du med thams cad du/ 
70a5(1): 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas// de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas ning kun grags// de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran// mtha' yas ning gi rnam pas
70a6(1): tshogs gzugs// byang chub zhing las kun kyang mo lus ston//  sa tshogs sbyin gyi ltu / byang chub snyid la dga' bar snang bar blta// sangs rna
70a7(1): ye shes snying po byang chub la// phyogs rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de// rnam pad+ma snang zhing gsal ba'i lha de ni// rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dag/ 
70a8(1): sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su dag bsam mi khya'o// snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grag/ yang dag yang dag bsgrubs pas byung ba de dag ni
70b1(1): thams cad chags snang ba'i ba na // dal rlung gyis 'thon chen dang la gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par ra ba bya yas pa na pa gyis kun byu
70b2(1): sa ga/ rkang gi stsa mapa bsgyur ba'i 'ad bar ga'ad kyi nam par gyur pani/ sangs rgyas 'ong zer skye la dag na pa thams cad du myur pos dga' byung
70b3(1): pa b+h+yag/ sad gyis 'gro ba mi tog gtsug phrad kyi dpal gyi drim med pa'i rnam par bar dra na// sems kyi skang cig rnams la dri gags
70b4(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyabs dang rgyun 'byung ba zhes bya'o// rlung gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni gom pa 'dir ba rnam
70b5(1): dusems nAn mtha' yas pa'i 'dul ba'i sbyin ces bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rnal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig gcig gis
70b6(1): d+mo'i sgyuslo ba byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang dbyangs dang snang ba kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par durma
70b7(1): dge' ba'i shugs nyams bde ba rgya ma mahA' yas pa 'byeng ba zhes bya'o// rlung gis 'gro shin tu ts+tshan danA gi 'dra kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 
70b8(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngadang srin ldang ba zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni rnam par ban
71a1(1): pad+ma'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung ba bskyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni
71a2(1): lus kyi 'od zer rnam par sna tshogs thams cad kyi dra bas snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad la
71a3(1): dge ba'i rje ban+d+ha mchos yang dag par bskul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas rkang gis 'gro ba rin chen dpal gyi rgyas/ sangs rgyas mthus rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha'i 'khor gyi
71a4(1): dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gi shugs bskyed cing // bskal pa mtha' yas
71a5(1): sngon chad spyod pa mdzad// zhing rnams kun 'dul shin tu phra mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mchod// skad cig sems la pad+mo brjod yas
71a6(1): dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sprul mdzad nas// zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa// snang ba'i 'od zer lha des rab tu mthong // 'dren pa rnams kyi
71a7(1): chos nyid bsam mi khyab// 'khor rnams kun tu 'jam klas mtha' yas ra'o// rnam par 'phrul ba mi zad rab tu ston// me tog gtsug phud la yi mthong / 
71a8(1): phyogs bcu'i ning gi dbyangs rnams ma lus pa// thams cad kun tu gshegs shing bzhud pa yis// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin par mdzad// shin tu mdzes
71b1(1): bar dga' bar de mthong ba// sems can med kyi la pakun 'grus pa/  rnams chos kyi dbyings dang 'byengs// rin chen med 'du kyang rab tug tu
71b2(1): nadu grong pal gyi mtshan gyi da mthang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud myal mtha las te// 'khor du rgyal bachas kyi mar yang bebs/ bdag
71b3(1): de'i 'khor na dgar gnas shing // dga' lha dbyangs kyis rnamathar de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas dbyangs ni na ma'o'i mnyam pa 'o// dbyangs kyi phun tan kun dang Sh+Tha/ 
71b4(1): 'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul// can dan shing gi 'od ni de la can// su n+ye kun+d+ra nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang // dus sum gtogs pa'i
71b5(1): rgyal ba man gyi rnams skye bsgrags thos shing dga' ba bsgyud 'gyur te// don rdorje'i bad kyi lus mabyung du/ de bzhin gshegasas byas mgyis ma
71b6(1): / gom pa gos par yon/ na rgya mchi ston// de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mdzad// rdul gyi 'od kyis lhas ni dri mthong ngo // ro jog rten mgon pa na
71b7(1): 'brul rnams mang gis// phyogs bcur sems can yang dag bskul ba mdzad// me tog 'khor med rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha// mthang zhing dga' ba yangs pa
71b8(1): ba ri tu ga// de la lus kyi ris su gtags pa'i lnga khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i' kyi rnam par thar pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprin gyi ldan 'am rdzas
72a1(1): dran pas rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gdogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su srung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams mu rung
72a2(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtshos dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i se
72a3(1): can thams cad la rjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rgyan bzang po me tog gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni de
72a4(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i skun mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gdogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal
72a5(1): gyi rnam par thar pa ni sangs byams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams yang dag par ston pa'i mthu si zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i drang la
72a6(1): gyi rnam par thar pa ni sems can yang dag thams cad gsob dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyi dga' bo zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gdogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i srin
72a7(1): las char 'bebs pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sru
72a8(1): 'dzin yongs su bsdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las rmongs par rnam zlog bzhis byor// l+r-is kyi ris su gdags pa'i
72b1(1): kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i nan ces
72b2(1): bya'o// lus kyi ris su rtags pa'i phyi khrel dang dngal mi g.yo ba'i 'a sti rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing yang dag par sbyong ba zhes byas
72b3(1): de nas lus kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lus kyi ros su gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad pa
72b4(1): rnam par bsdus nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras sa// ri rab rdul phran shin tu ma srid kyi// bskal pa de dag pa snga'i bskul pa de// rdul ces
72b5(1): bar 'du ma dzi 'ang zer nul/ mchod de sman lam pa d+hU bye pa bdag gis nan// sangs rgyas smra mas 'ad 'thar ba bkye ba/ de'i 'od zer chos kyi dbyings
72b6(1): num pa'i 'di per dra ba'i sems can 'dul// 'od 'gro'od zer lha yis de mthong ngo // dbyings kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'o// sangs rgyas gas
72b7(1): rnams kun tu // 'grob ma lus snang dag bskul// dbyangs kyis 'dul ba de la dga' bar nyan// rgyal po'i su nI rab zhi lakhrus/ ug
72b8(1): dum mtshan mo nyid mi mangs// 'gro ba kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang// me tog gtsug sung gis ji bzhin nyid du ma thong/ 'dzin pa'i chos nyid pas
73a1(1): 'byung ba'i ltas mthab/ rgyal ba'i rnams kyi mtshams rnams thams cadan// dri'i mi 'od 'am ldan pa'i sbyi bkye bas// 'gro ba kun gyi can mangs na par gyul
73a2(1): dri mingams kyis de mthongs// sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung // nyon mongs rmongs shing stug bskul gzir ba rnams mgu bar mdza
73a3(1): nyon mongs thams cad bcil// snang ba'i 'phreng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo // 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon// rang 'byung 'jig rten dun
73a4(1): mdzad skyes pa ni// 'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba rnam par sel// khrel yod dpal gyi 'od sang dri skad smras// sems can nyon mongs shing sgribs nyon mongs shi
73a5(1): bdud kyi las kyis dkrugs te phyin pa rnams// de dag rgyal ba'i rnam thar las ston te// bsrung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs kyi
73a6(1): rnam par 'phrul ba ltos/ sangs rgyas sbyin gis chos kyi dbyings mnyan cing // 'jig rten dbang po gnas sems can 'dul// kun gyi sa yad pal
73a7(1): skye yul la// del lag na rjem gyi chem ladag bzang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni min tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs kyi se rnam pa'i chung bsas/ 
73b1(1): par ston pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par gyur pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bskulas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin
73b2(1): sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bstan pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul
73b3(1): bi zhes bya'o// log na rdo rje rnam dag sbyin gyis dbyangs kyi rnam par ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes
73b4(1): zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rjes dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par tha ra pA ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing // sangs
73b5(1): rgyas kyi byin gyis yang dge par bskul ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje yi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings rab tu
73b6(1): bA thams cad ma lus pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje shing gr-i sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni shong gr-I lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rkyen
73b7(1): yid du 'ong ba'i brgyan pa zhes bya'o// lagra na rdo rje seng ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni dri bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil
73b8(1): 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o// log na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po'i dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni sems canas
74a1(1): rungs pa'i rgyud 'grus rigs 'dugs pa ma pa / lag+sa du pa rgyun brgya lung
74a2(1): bya bod kyi rnam par thar pa ni byang chub sem sad pa'i rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po rnams cad b+hin+ti mngon par 'bebs pa shes bya'o// 
74a3(1): nasu pabyin rdo rje ma chen khri dag bab pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ wAg na rdo rje'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas
74a4(1): de'i tshe tshigs su bcing pa 'di dag smras so// chos rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi// chos nyid de la rnam par ltos// yon tan mtha' yas su gzugs kyis/ 
74a5(1): 'jig rten kun tu rnam par 'dzes// sangs rgyas paM sgra thams cad nas// 'od zer dra ba pasam m+b+hi khyab// nyina'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba sa/ phyogs
74a6(1): na tu rnam mdzes// sang+yasar+b+ba sta rnam 'phrul de dag gis// chos kyi dbyings su khyab byas shing // 'gro ba kun la mngon sum du// mi zad spun na
74a7(1): sbyin// sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sdug/ gsung gis sems can thams cad la// bsam thams
74a8(1): rab tu 'gengs/ 'jig rten dbang po kun gnasasathub pa rab tu rdzogs par rnam// de dag thams cad 'khor rnams pa/ 'dzin pa
74b1(1): chas nam / mamatshas kyis/ sgyu / gan nga ga/  gyin pa dag gis/ rnams sa khyi na/ sprul pa sa na/ 
74b2(1): na mthanga' med tshul dag// rgyu mama'i lar rnams dag na rab tu 'dug// sangs rgyas 'daper ba 'dres pas// kun gyis dran pa mtshung bar gyur// dang
74b3(1): bye ba phrul snyed du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas// bsod nams rgyu chen namakha' bzhin// kun gyis 'dus pa rab tu mchod
74b4(1): rdzu 'phrul ma 'das pa// thams cad nying du ston pa mdzad// 'gro sangs rgyas mngon sum du/ byang chub skyed par rnam par mdzes// 'od gzer sna tshogs
74b5(1): / nga tha ni na tshas gyi na tu na sa rgyas la
74b6(1): bam pa lnga pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzong ba'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rnamargya bsam gyis ma khyab pas/ 
74b7(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug ste// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya bya dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba la mthar thug
74b8(1): mngon bsgrub zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhe bya ba'i rnam par
75a1(1): thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gnas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam
75a2(1): par thar pa dang / sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pa sa sangs rgyas par bgengs pa nas bya ba'i rnam par
75a3(1): thar pa dang / zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi brlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dag/ rdul
75a4(1): shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubasu byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med par yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'o rnam par
75a5(1): thar pa dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig tu ston pa zhes 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / 
75a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtshor yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston po zhes bya'o ba'i rnam par thar pa dang gang 'di rnam
75a7(1): sno byungs mtha' dad dbus med pa rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas por rnam par 'dul ba'i byin pas zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang
75a8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ma pa / 
75b1(1): denas byung chub sems kun tu ba 'dra byas rnamya ra thar pa'i tshul rgyu mtsha bsam gos ma khyab pa'i dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan namal
75b2(1): 'jug tsong sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad bu 'di dag smras so// 
75b3(1): rnams rgyal ba 'orlom rnam par sbyangs// mkha' yangs rdul bzhin yon tan med kyang med// sngon gi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa// de la bsam
75b4(1): chos sgron char yang dang// ji ltar rgyal ba gdun la bzhugs snang ba// de bzhin rdul sbubs ma lus kun 'daste// 'od kyang bde gshegs
75b5(1): gshegs pa po pa myed//  rnams kun la yang rab tu ston// sa yi rnal la'i'ajug pa tshad med de/ spyod bgrub pas byang chub sems
75b6(1): sems dpa'i brnam/ ma ma gyim mi khye tshul ni kun gsungs pas/ rnams rnams ni chos kyi dngas 'jug/ chos
75b7(1): bdug rgyul rnam pan ste/ mtha' las phyogs sum dang dbus mes/ rdul phran sru sa su rnal pa gyi bsdus/ 
75b8(1): bsim po kun kyang rab tu mkhyen// phyogs rnams thams cad cing rnams kun tu 'de/ 'jig rten gtsom chen 'phre mnyam pa rus
76a1(1): thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod do// 'dul bas sems can thams cad rnam par spyod// rdul srubs
76a2(1): mtha' dang dbus na med pa yi// rnam 'phrul yangs pa rab tu byung shin tu ston// sngan chad thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams// ji bzhin kun kyang snying
76a3(1): po byang chub brjod// yang dus bskal pa ji snyed yod pa rnams// skad cig skad cog sangs rgyas ma lus ston// der ni sems can 'byung nir 'jig
76a4(1): pa'ang bstan// 'jig rten gtso bo ye shes bsam yas ltos// 'byam klas mi zad mtha' yas lo grangs pas// rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas
76a5(1): sA lngas pa// thams cad sor yang sangs rgyas ma' dbus med// rgyal sras kun gyis shes rabar sra ba min// sangs rgyas mkha' 'dra rnam par mi
76a6(1): tog ste// chos nyid mi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis// sprul pas spyod tshe kun tu rgyas mdzad cing // shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan/ 
76a7(1): sangs rgyas gsung de rab tu brjod pas// chos gnas thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin// 'gro ba thams cad ri ri'i sgo dang gnas// sang
76a8(1): chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug/ de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba drim med pa'i gzi brjed 'ad yid du'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni phyogs kyi
76b1(1): thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyun byed pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'du mchog tun
76b2(1): tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes po ston cing / chos kya dbyings pas
76b3(1): sa ma khyab pa yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba seng ge'i rgyul
76b4(1): gyis rnam par thar pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bskyod nams kyi tshogs dang shing yod dgu par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya/ 
76b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'a'i dpal gyi 'od bar kun tu 'od 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyis rnam spyod pa doran yod pa zhes byas
76b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan d+ha mchi kun tu sgyu dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi snying gi rgyun rnams
76b7(1): cod 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tu yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin spyod yul
76b8(1): ye shes kun du snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par sbyor ba'i smon
77a1(1): pa'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gtsug pun rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi
77a2(1): spyod pa la rab tu zhugs cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyang po'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun
77a3(1): tu 'byam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad sten bkun zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams
77a4(1): mi zang dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis byin gyi brlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub
77a5(1): sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa sku med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 
77a6(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dge batshem med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yod du 'od bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus// byang chub sems dpa'
77a7(1): rnam par b.rarab rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas// de'i rmi tshigs su btsang ba 'di dag smras so// ji snyed gang dag phyogs rnams kun
77a8(1): zhing / rgyal bas de kun skad cigazugs kyis sbyangs/ 'gro ba kun tun pa med pa'i gsu/ sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen nor// skad kyi/ 
77b1(1): dgangs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste// mtha' yas spyod yul dbyings rnams rnam pas/ 'gro ba kun lam snyisnang po byung chub tu// byang chub
77b2(1): 'tshang na rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// bskal brgya phrag snang rnams tshad med du// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad skad spyad de// rnamakha' 'dra bar
77b3(1): na ba k+She ng+gA shAd-i stan nu rab du dbyas/ mtha' drung dbus med bskul bar la la yis// sgrib pa med par rnal pa'i rnam pasems
77b4(1): gyung// sa sid+d+hi si rdzu 'phrul spobs la mtha' dbus med// phyi ma'i mtha' yi skal pa kun tu 'grengaso// rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam pa
77b5(1): ltos/ phyogs bcu'o zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa// rgyal bas 'dir ni kun kyang rlob tu ston// skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs
77b6(1): kyang snad// bsal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu// rgyal ba'i sku gcig mtho' yas shes par dka'// tshul rnams kun sbyar sangs rgyas
77b7(1): chags pa med// 'gro bo 'di ni rgyu chen bsam yas mdzes// sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun te/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsha
77b8(1): chen srin bkur bas// de bas 'jig 'arten gtsol phyogs dbyings rnams// kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung // phyogs
78a1(1): rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang // rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston// de dag yul du mi zad maH
78a2(1): yas pa'i// bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad// sngon che'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro don spyad// thugs rje rgya mtsho tshad med rab bskyed cing
78a3(1): 'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs// sangs rgyas tshad med sku med rdul dang bral// de bzhin
78a4(1): nyid gnas chos dbyings skyid po ste// 'gro ba kun na mtha' yas gzugs su snang // 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad// de la byang chub sem
78a5(1): dpa' 'od gzer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni// pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang / 
78a6(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sprin gying ro rgya mtsho med 'od kyi snying pa'i rnam par thar pa
78a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi tshul gyi khyim sna tshogs la rnam par blta ba zhes bya'o// 
78a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tsa rin cen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phung gyi rnam par thar pa ni bskal pa bsam gyis mo khyab par 'gro ba
78b1(1): rnams la mngon sum du yon tan dri ma med pas yongasu dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa
78b2(1): ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying pa byeng chub tu thog ma 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyun ces bya'o// byang chub sa
78b3(1): dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa'i 'od zer gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams kyi cad dang tha mi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang
78b4(1): mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sbyin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa
78b5(1): pAr bsnol pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i
78b6(1): skye po'i rnam par thar pa mi/ chosems cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' da dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
78b7(1): kyi 'od 'bri shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dang
78b8(1): spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal
79a1(1): mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni rnam par thar sna tshogasang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o// 
79a2(1): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mtshig yon tan 'byung ba'i glos kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi
79a3(1): dbyings thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od can dpal gyi zla bas sangs rgyas
79a4(1): mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'bye ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// pha rol phyin
79a5(1): baN+Di mcho bas ma yas dang // sa yi dkyil 'khor rgyu rgyun kun kyang yos sa rgyas// tshad med sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i che// sangs rgyas ning yangs
79a6(1): kyang rnam par sbyangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad pa// skad cig thugs
79a7(1): kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam pa sim par gsung // bskal pa rnam tshe mi zeng mu med par// rgyas pa 'grib
79a8(1): mngon gsum kun nas bzhugs// mgon pos sngan chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du// rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan// chos rgyal de
79b1(1): ji ltar dam 'phrul ba// phyogs rnams rgya mtshom lus kun nas snang // snying po byang chub kun nas snang // sing po blang chub na rgyal bdag/ rnam
79b2(1): kyis ban cing chos ni gsung bar snang // bgrobs bsam pa thams cad mchi ma mdzad cing 'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas tshul kun 'dzes// dbang po bzhin
79b3(1): rgyas kyi mdang 'bebs// sangs rgyas chos su yangs pa rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de/ rgyal pa dri med 'odagasal
79b4(1): kyisku// ye shes ni ba'i skun chad med de// chos dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bribs// chos rje thams stobs kyis rnam par dag
79b5(1): bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'ang mtha' yas te// rgya chen 'gri ba mtha' dbus med bkang shing // rgyal ba'i stobastsal 'jug pa rab tu ston// sangs
79b6(1): rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings kun bkang nI pa// sangs rgyas stong pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan// rgyal bas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de ni
79b7(1): sa rnams rgyasabs bdun/ dgros rnams na tu N+Ti byung rnam par mdzes/ smon pam rnam par 'phrul ba mthus s+ho/ 
79b8(1): rgyal bas pang sa/ rgyal bas 'do bar chub kun nas skrag/ sangs rgyas yu la ni phyogs su pa dpa med/ dbus dang mtha' ma gan meng
80a1(1): mtha' yas dbyings// phyogs dbyings kun tu chags med brnyes pas na// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun nas shin tu mdzes/ 
80a2(1): dri'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri dang // pad+mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang / 'khor lte ba thams cad dang / 
80a3(1): me tog gi ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / sdig bu'i ngos thams cad dang / rna babs kyi sgo thams dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos thams cad dang / rin po
80a4(1): 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang / seng ge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba
80a5(1): snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po mthon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa
80a6(1): rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil la
80a7(1): gtsug phud dade/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po nyi ma'i rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis
80a8(1): mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig brgyad pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i tshul
80b1(1): dang bdu sa tshugs kyi gtsug dung dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi bdaga'i brjid dkyil la bar gyi 'du dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du s+thA rgyas
80b2(1): dbyin gyi dbyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' na yid nga ba'i drim med pa'i zla ba dang / de dag la sngags pa byung chung sems dpa'as sa rgyas kyi byed
80b3(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna rgyags rab tu 'gyed cing/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad nA rab tu 'byom/ smos
80b4(1): sprin thams cad ni shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'dra ba gtu
80b5(1): pa'i sprin rnam par 'gyid cing gsil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni rab tu sgrog nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin ni rab tu ston/ 
80b6(1): na po che 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yul ga las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam
80b7(1): rnam par snang/ rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pazed mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i cher ni rab tu 'bebs/ rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par
80b8(1): nor bu'i rgyal ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs shing / de lta bu dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul zhin
81a1(1): pra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa byed cing lhags par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
81a2(1): bskor ba byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyud mi chad pa'i char mngon par bab nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ 
81a3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas/ seng gol gyi rin po chesna rtogs du ma'i bad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyel mo dkrung bcas nas 'khad par gyur te/ 
81a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so// sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu snang bar thob pa rnams so// de bani/ 
81a5(1): gshegs pa'i spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so// thA dad pa yang dag par shes pa thams cad kyis tshes rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so// rnam par
81a6(1): kha bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// slan tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so// gzungs kyis rgyamam rnams cad
81a7(1): chos thams cad rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so// dus ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis la rab tu gnas pa rnams so// dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po rab tu thab
81a8(1): rnams so// bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa rnams so// chos rnams kyi dbyings deng na mkha' la rnams par rgyu zhing sangs rgyas thams cad mcho
81b1(1): ma dpa ma na par sgrub pa ba tu btsun pa gag ga/ de nas byang chub sems dang rnam ma 'a blags rnam par rol pa'i gas mngan pa gas pa'i rgyag dus smra sa
81b2(1): kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam
81b3(1): nyid mkhyen// chags med brnyes pas na mkha' lta bu ste// phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang byas nas// 'bum klas 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par
81b4(1): mdzes// bde gshegs rang byung mtha' dbus med de// thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings kuni rgyas par// dbang phyug chen po kun gyis chos bskor cing / 
81b5(1): shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na btsugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// skad cig sems la mi zad yon tan gzugs// rnam
81b6(1): thar ba zhag dang gzhan dog thob pos mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so// bskal pa rgya mtshor slan chad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
81b7(1): pas srid pa rgya mtsho 'dir// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa// de dag rgyal ba de'i chos 'dzin to// yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams
81b8(1): 'khod pa pa dag/ thams cad sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par gnas// pad+mo'i snying po pad+ma gdan bzhugs pa// tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon pa sa
82a1(1): @sangs rgyas gang gzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri// rin chen nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phra zhing // spos 'phro sprin rnams mtha' yas rab tu 'byung / 
82a2(1): snying po du ma'i me dog 'breng sbyangs pa'o// rin chen 'od 'bre'i sprin ni rab tu 'gyed// 'od zer sgron ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar// rnga babs rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ 
82a3(1): thub pa de bzhugs mngon pa ri rab tu mdzes// sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'gyed// rin chen tshon du sna tshogs pad+mo byung // nor bu'i rgyal pos skar krung kun nas brgyan/ 
82a4(1): sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par mdzes// zla gram rin cen mang pos yongs su bzung // rdo rje 'od 'bri snang ba'i snying pos ban+d+hanra// gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpa
82a5(1): bzung // sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin du mdzes// phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab kyi nang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog/ gzugs
82a6(1): bden bzhin du cing rnams kun na snang / thub pa de 'dra'i seng gro'i gdan lub tsugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgyu dbyangs kun tu sgrog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
82a7(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smos so// 'di ni bde gshegs songs byin brlabs te/ 
82a8(1): byang chub chung ban ma pa nga / sas rgyas tshad pa'i mtshad pa dri mdas/ tshum pa'i ga lapa de dag thams rjod/ sa 'i ldang ba na bu'i rgyal / 
82b1(1): me tog snying ba seng ge'i gdan gyi 'khor/ rgyan rnams thams cad gzugs rnan myur pa dang // 'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun kyang snang // skad cigs kyi/ 
82b2(1): rgyun gyi kho dog kun// rnam pa du ma sangs rgyas gdan las snang // sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang // 'khor cings sa rgyas chud mi gdan la blta/ 
82b3(1): lnga lnga pad+mo mang btags pa// phye zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnams sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing // sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med na mkha' ba ni// 
82b4(1): 'di dag nan kun de las rab tu byung // sanas re ro'i rgyun rnams gang yod do// 'gro ba kun gyis de dag pasamA mi nus// mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo rje sa chags pa/ 
82b5(1): 'khor yongs rnams dag shin tu mnyam pa ste// nor bu'i dri ba sna tshogs kun tu bkrA ma// byang chub shing gi sa'i 'khor kun tu'o// sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i
82b6(1): gdan yod pa/ kha dog mtha' yas rgya che sna tshogs te/ me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram// gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan
82b7(1): sa yi lha mo de dgra rab dga' zhing // skad cig sems kyis mi zad sa yang ston// kun kyang rgyal ba'i nal du mngon lta zhing // kha dog thams cad brgyar gyi sprin
82b8(1): gtong ngo // rin can sgron mang po bsal bar 'bar// spos mang dri zhim ming po rtag tu 'byung // dus dang chod kyi rnam par mang ston cing // lha rnams kun kya
83a1(1): sangs rgyas mchod pa byed// phyogs rnams bcun cing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod pa// de dag kun kyang
83a2(1): phyogs dkyil 'khor 'di snang // sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug phud
83a3(1): kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag skyes so// sngan chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dag tu
83a4(1): zhing rnams phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba rnams// snying po byang chub 'khor gyis 'di la// mi zangs dang de dag rab tu snang // rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang
83a5(1): ba yi// sal rin mdzes kun rnam pa bkral rin cin mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtong // sangs rgyas 'od kyis sprin yang rab tu snang // sa rnams
83a6(1): kun rgyun shing gyi dam ri'i drung // kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos brgyan byas las/ bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byung // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
83a7(1): tshul yang rab tu 'arjod// rin cen mang po sgron ma'i char ba brjod// rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes// sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug smranan
83a8(1): tu klog/ sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dge sten// rin cen 'od 'gro sngon ma rnam par snang // 'od zer smin nas las m-i thu 'byung // ni du'i rdzibs
83b1(1): kun nas pakram// rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag brgyan// sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos// rin chen mang po mchod zad rgyun tu kye/ 
83b2(1): 'gro ba dag la ches kyi rgya mtsho sgrogs// de dag chos tsha nyid rnam par dag pa mthong / ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// byang chub shing gi phun sum
83b3(1): tshogs pa dag/ sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste// de dag chos nyid rnam pa dag par brjod// sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams rgya mtsho yi
83b4(1): chos sgo bde bar gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin du// sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu byung // dri nim 'od
83b5(1): rtag tu 'byung bas na// de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro bu 'gengs// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs ni bar byed// sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog
83b6(1): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun sum gang dgra dang // dri med sra ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing // bskul pa bye ba dag tu
83b7(1): 'ang brjod mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil la
83b8(1): yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshim mdzad cing // sangs rgyas chos
84a1(1): kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes// 'jam klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du// sangs rgyas 'gro ba gtso gzhal med khang na snang // rin chen
84a2(1): kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin gshegs mdzes shing 'bar// sangs rgyas po brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab// de na bzhugs zhing sangs rgyas rab
84a3(1): tu mdzes// ga ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs de// phyogs rnams kun skor rnga babs sbyin yang 'brel// stegs bu'i 'bring ba kun nas brgyun tu bkod// gser gyi dral
84a4(1): bu'i sprin yang rnam par rgyus// me dog bla bre rnam pa sna tshogs ltos// rin can shing sdod dar gyi bla bre bres/ nor bu thams cad sgo nas 'phreng ba 'phrul// de na ye shes rgya ma
84a5(1): rab tu mdzes// spos dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste// 'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu g.yog/ brgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bres// de na sangs rgyas rab
84a6(1): tu 'phags pa bzhugs// phyogs rnams kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams// dbyings kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing // 'byam klus phyogs kyi sems
84a7(1): can rnam 'dul ba// sangs rgyas po zang 'din de dag grag/ me tog shing dang rin cen spang spel ba// 'phags par phyogs rnams kun sum rjes// de la dus
84a8(1): gsum shing rnams thams cad kyang // gzugs brgyan gyur par de dag rab tu snang / phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen mang brtseg// de dag sa chags mas
84b1(1): /  ma sa sa smran/  bas ma shAm sna chags ma pas smran/ de 'dzum rdzun
84b2(1): sa rgyas pa ba rnam pa pas ma mas te/ gan mau yang mang thams cad de la snang // de dag kunan 'a dul ba bzhugs gang mangs phyags rnams
84b3(1): kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa// rgyal ba'i bzang 'di ni kun bzhugs kyang // mtha' med dbus myed mu yang med bzhin mid// rang byungasangs rgyas po zang de la
84b4(1): den bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a yon tan rin po che bsam gyis khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgyu m+b+ha n+dan/ 
84b5(1): pade dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad po 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas nying rdul zhen tu ba skyed kyi/ bsod nams
84b6(1): rnam par rab sbyongs te// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dge byung // snying pa byang chub dri med rnam par mdzeste// spos zhem thams cad rtswa nas yang
84b7(1): dgra n+d+ha// yid bzhin nor mchog rgya la bos kun nas brgyan// rdo rje phyi ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris// shing sdong rtsa ba rIn can kun las byas/ 
84b8(1): rdo rje phyi ma'i nor bung 'khor lo 'byung // lhun rnams thams cad rin cen rgyan gyis brgyan// yal ga stug po sprin ltar kun nas khyil// snying po byang chu
85a1(1): byang chub de ni rgyal mdzes// yal gdag pa kun nas mngon pa ste// 'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags
85a2(1): me tog 'bras brgyan ni rnams kyang 'gyed// sring po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab// 'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes// dri ma med pa'i 'di 'bar bad many+dzus
85a3(1): yal ga'i sgonas snron kun char yang 'bebs/ snying po byang chub snying po byang chub smon lam yongs su byung // me tog nor dang rin chen mi bang nor// mu tig nor dag byag/ 
85a4(1): rnams kun nas rgyas/ bye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sbyin 'gyed de// snying pa byang chub phyogs rnams kun du 'byin// bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos// pad+mo
85a5(1): drang nor bu dri ming mang// rini can 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'phro// dril bu'i dra ba sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin// phyogs bcu'i ning bzang gzugs rnams gang
85a6(1): yong du// 'byam klas ning gi ma lus thams cad dag/ byang chub shing las de dag kun nas snang // de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes// yal ga kunaH
85a7(1): rin can mi zang nor// byang chub sems dpab dag kyang rtag 'byung ning // bsod nams rgyu rten dkyil 'khor char pabaste// phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod byar
85a8(1): de dag 'dod// de bzhin gshegs pa sngan chad cir gyur dang // byang chub spyod la byung ba 'di dag ltos// yal gakun las rin chen na rim zad// sangs
85b1(1): rgyas yul kun bsam gyis khyab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor ba rgya mtsho yod pa
85b2(1): cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dus sum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnam 'phrul pa// de dag rin cen sgo nas kyang grags// de ni mtha'
85b3(1): dang dbus yang med pa ste// snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo // me dog mang po'i phreng ba sbyangs pa kye zhing // 'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste// byang chub shing la
85b4(1): gnas pa'i lha yi rnams// sangs rgyas lha zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed// spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor sna tshogs 'bar// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'brung
85b5(1): 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhi bro// shing gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su mdzes// pad+mo 'phrul pa sdug bcing gser mdog 'dra// rgyal ba'i sprin+do sgra rtag
85b6(1): par rab tu 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing // sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung pa sel// rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste/ 
85b7(1): phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la// gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od mchog 'gyed// byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos// smon la
85b8(1): sgra dbyangs kyi mar me rnams// rin cen sna tshogs yal ga kun nas 'bar// srid pa rgya mtsho kun na sngan chad du// rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston/ 
86a1(1): byang chub la snyid rdul snyed de/ de dag thams cad snying po byung rgyub gnas// thub pa'i byang chub shing la skad cig cing // rnamathar gzhan mang
86a2(1): dag ston// rang 'byung spyod pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa// thams cad tsa rims
86a3(1): nas rab tu sdung // phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa// de dag thams cad 'dri las sgra byung ste// de dag cis 'dul nam dag ci 'dra ba'ang // snying po byang chu
86a4(1): 'di las kun brjod do// byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi spyacan dag/ mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyan can thams cad kyang / 
86a5(1): sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su spangs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 
86a6(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad de// mos
86a7(1): pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing // gnas dang gnas mini stobs rnams thugs chung pa'i// bde gshegs stobs ni rnam par dag mthong / 
86a8(1): bskal pa kun tu mtsho ba'i las sbyangs// mnyam nyid chos sgoms ji ltar sbubs pa rnams// sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing // las rnam
86b1(1): mtshad papa' 'dus pa// tshags thabs kyis 'byam nyaman pas snang ma/ khan la pa sngamar 'tha 'ang ba ba sa/ yangs sa sted byas bas la 'gyu
86b2(1): sems dag sangs rgyas dbang ba'i skabs la 'jug/ 'jig rten kun gyi mis pa sna tshogs dang // bsam pa ci bzhin sbyar ba rnam spyod pa// de dag de bzhin nul pa chos so/ 
86b3(1): te// rang 'byung mas pa mkhyen pa'i ston to// phyogs rnams ma lus shing rnams rgya mtsho dang / babyam klas sems can kham sa dang chos kyi khams/ nam 'a'i khams ca
86b4(1): mnyam nyid mkhyen me tog/ rang 'bying skur rtser mkhas mkhyen stobs kyang ston// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen kun du 'gro/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus
86b5(1): 'gengs/ phyogs dang zhing dang bskal pa 'gro bkang zhing // sems can kun la stabs 'jug mngon par smon// bsam gtan rnam thar stobs sa dbus med// ting de dzin
86b6(1): rgya mtsho'i tshul ni'i gro kun skyed// thams cad rgyal ba'i skul bstan pas na// sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs sel// sangs rgyas ye shes dus sum sgribs
86b7(1): baM med// skad cig kun la dus gsum su rtser snyam// zhing dang sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos// de ltar rgyal rjes su dran stobs bstan// thub pa'i spyan no na mal
86b8(1): mnyam pa ste// de ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs// thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas sa// bsres pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bas/ 
87a1(1): 'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang // 'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyal ma lus// thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs ni mdzad cing
87a2(1): rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun na 'byung/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgrog pas// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi rgya mtsho yod pa/ 
87a3(1): thams cad la rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgya chen sangs rgyas byin brlabs phyogs kun tu// sangs rgyas ston kyang
87a4(1): rtogs pa mi mnga' ste// pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang // byang chub spyod pa chen de dag snang // 'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che ba bskyed cing // sbyin
87a5(1): mthur byin snyan chad spyad pa na// de'i phyir thub pa'i sgra ni mtshan gyis na// 'gro ba kun gyis bralta zhing dga' bskyes// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha'i
87a6(1): ston// tshul khrims pa rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas// de phyir bsal pa phyogs su bcu dri meng cing // shin tu 'phags par 'jog rten sdug bsngal
87a7(1): sel// ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de// sngan chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pus// 'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon ta ni kun smin / 
87a8(1): debs phyogs su 'od rnams shin tu 'gro// bskal ba rgya mtsho mang po sngon no// 'gro ba rnams kyi sgribs pa thibs pa gsal// de'i phyir phyogs pargya
87b1(1): 'gro ba kun bkang // / ming rab tu drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// bsam gtan yan lag rgya latsho stong pa'i tshe// bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu ston/ 
87b2(1): de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' ba bskyed// nyon mongs dri ma sgribs pa kun kyang sel// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyad cing // shes rab mtha' phyin rgyal
87b3(1): bas sngon bkang ste// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa yongs su gsal// rgyal ba kun la mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis// yangs drag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam
87b4(1): spangs pas// phyogs rnams kun lha mngon par bzhugs// phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba mngon du lta// smos lam pha rol phyin pa rab spyod no// 
87b5(1): pa rgya mtsho shin rgya che ste// phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin mnyam pa'i// spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes// rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar gyi/ 
87b6(1): bskal pa gnar yos mang por yos su sbyangs// de phyir rang byung stobyas kyi pha rol phyin// phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na da byar 'phags// tham
87b7(1): mnyan nyid rnam pa' ma chung sa mnyam pa'o// mashes kun gyi sanas ston smra smra bas/ de phyir tshogs med ye shes pa rol phyir// thugs pa
87b8(1): kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor rgya mtshan
88a1(1): pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyis/ 
88a2(1): gro ba'i rgyud dbyings na mkha' mnyam par snang // sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bskyed pa// de bzhin kun kyang rin sgo nas brjod// dang po'os ni dga' ba'i zhugs
88a3(1): kyi yul// phyogs dbyings kun gyi bde gshegs rnams mthong zhing // gzhal med bsrel bar dri med yongs sbyangs pas// chos dbyings yang sa la ye shes rab tu 'byung // 
88a4(1): thams cad chos la dri med pas gnyis te// bskal brgya mtsho mang por rnam sbyang cing // rgyal ba tshad med na mtsho mchod byas nas// 'gro ba tshad med dri med dbyangs pa
88a5(1): byung // bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od nis gsum ste// snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lcag mthong brtan// gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas// chos kyi sbyin
88a6(1): ts+tshinA rab tu thos// 'od 'phra brgya mtsho ldan pa gezha le mengs// many+dzu yi 'khor 'od sring pa snying rje ste// zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus// 'gro ba
88a7(1): nyin mongs sngon nas rnamasmras paso// degang rgyal srid m+b+ham myed de/ da rnams kun tu 'gro zhing ni la gnag// sangs nas chos yul kun nas rab tu
88a8(1): der ma sa ngo 'argyal pa na/ gi mtshongs zhin thams rgya gral coM/  ngas ma
88b1(1): sa ma rba// de byung byang chub shing ces 'dilas zag/ chos dbyings mkha' dang mnyam pa'i las can te// 'gro bkun gyis 'am bstan nga byed// 'dumak+Shas
88b2(1): thabs kyi sgonas rnam par dag/ ring du song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan// thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs
88b3(1): / bskal ba kun tu 'gro mchog mogs ste// gzhal med sa 'i snyed kyang rab tu rtog/ tshad ma yul can stobs kyis rab tu stod// rdzu 'drul chos kyis 'a
88b4(1): stobs la 'jug/ 'di ni rdul med dge ba'i bla gros sa// bskal pa rgya mtshor byang chub shing las brjod// chos kyi srin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste// dus rnams kun 'gres
88b5(1): na mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra// sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu// rgyal ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu grag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon gti
88b6(1): mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam par
88b7(1): mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni// dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems// rgyan dang yul rnams kun la rab tu bzhugs/ de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'gru/ 
88b8(1): par 'gyur// phan tshun sngon lam rnam dge sbyong yul te// dag pa mtha' yas bya ba rab tu byas// de bzhig shegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang // gnan
89a1(1): gzhan gyi sgo nas rab du mthong // bde gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag/ la las rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la// kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chag
89a2(1): med pa'i// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong // la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing // yon tan mtha'
89a3(1): yas 'od 'di rab 'bar ba// 'gro ba dang tshul srid du gyur par mthong // la las rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug/ dus sum med mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku// 'gro ba
89a4(1): kun gyis bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong // sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs po med 'byur te// phyogs kun nong rnams ma
89a5(1): lus rgyas 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la 'jug/ la las sangs rgyas snang bas 'gro sna tshogs 'jug/ sna tshogs snang bas 'gro ba kun bka
89a6(1): nga // rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong // baspu'i sa ris 'od zer rab bkye ba'i// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin la/ 
89a7(1): ya 'jug/ spyan chid rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la// la la dgra 'a rjing rgyal bcas par byed// la las bsod na nas sna tshogs mtshon gyi rnams rnams// 
89a8(1): gshegs pas di rnams sna tshag sa mtshan gyis rnams// bde gshegs pasad rnams tshogs byung ba ci bzhin mthong // para'i byin pa rgya mamo spyong pa'i tshe
89b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi rlabs rab tu brjod pa kum// rnam 'phru
89b2(1): de ltar dag gyung mtshan kyang lalas mdzang// sgo rnams kun du rgyal ba chad med de// mtha' dang dbus med nas kyi dbyings ba kang shing / sings r+g+has y-i li ni la las
89b3(1): mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang // snying po rgya mtsha thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu
89b4(1): g.yos sa// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to rab tu 'gul to// kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg go rab du sdig go/ che mche ma rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rim
89b5(1): chem// bur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig go// 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams cad re re nas kyang mchod pa mngon pa
89b6(1): sgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i char// de bzhin gshes pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu phab bro// 'di ltar spos kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi sbyin
89b7(1): g+hinAr thams ca rab tu bab pa// rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin dang // rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba'i pad+ma'i dri thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin pa
89b8(1): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas sprin dang // rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang / rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang / 
89b9(1): spos dang pan ngan rin pa tshesems cad dang kyi sngon dang / rin pa che'i gdugs thams kyi smin dang / nor bu'i rgyal ba skad byas babang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang / 
90a1(1): nor bu'i nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang // nor bu'i nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdza
90a2(1): thams cad kyi sprin dang rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin dang / de lta bu dag la stsogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sprin pas
90a3(1): gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par bab bo// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams rab dga' bar gyur pa de
90a4(1): bzhin du/ bzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyun gyis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbang por res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ldan
90a5(1): gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa
90a6(1): gzhan dang gzhan/ dmyigs pa gzhan dang gnan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho gnan dang gzhan/ tshogs gzhan dang gzhan/ yang dag par bsgrub pa
90a7(1): gzhan dang gzhan/ dga' ba'i thugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan/ phyogs kyi tshul gzhan gnan/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gnan/ de
90a8(1): gsags pa'i yul dang byin gyis rlabs pa 'jug pa gdan dang gzhan/ yul dang stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gas/ rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgyamatsha dogs
90b1(1): gzhan gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong du chud par byed do// de na ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i rnam mthas klas pa'i 'a
90b2(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin na/ shin tu rgyus pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 
90b3(1): 'jig rten gyi dbang pa thams cad kyi rgyun gyi tshul la rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ l-i'u dang pa'o// bam po drug pa'o// 
90b4(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rnon gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyis
90b5(1): ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs
90b6(1): rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom
90b7(1): ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyim bsnyengs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mngal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni dzi lta du
90b8(1): shig mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni t+pa lta bu ga sa
91a1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la// sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mngang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs
91a2(1): rgyas kyi sman ni ji lta bu zhig mngal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi sman ni ji lta bu zhig mngal/ sangs rgyas kyi bcom ldan 'das rnams pa/ 
91a3(1): sangs rgyas gangs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi lhag ni rdo lta bu nig mngal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das larnam
91a4(1): la/ sangs rgyas kyi sgo ni ji lta bu zhig mngal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
91a5(1): 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs
91a6(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni ji lta bu zhig mang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldanas
91a7(1): rnams cad/ byang chub sems dpya 'a bram snad la smon lam rgyu mtshan ji lta ba zhig tu yongs su tshun/ byang chub sems dpa' thams dpa rab tu 'jug pa/ 
91a8(1): mtshathams cad no dza lta bu zhog yongs su sun/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cadade la tshogs rgyamatshathams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu seM su/ 
91b1(1): ni sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhin tu mongs su sngo
91b2(1): sems dpa' thams cad la theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab du gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu
91b3(1): zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par
91b4(1): shes pa rgya mtsha rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub
91b5(1): sems dpa' thams cad la las rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpo' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yang
91b6(1): su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams nI ji lta bu zhig tu yongs ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag lu thugs brtse ba'i
91b7(1): nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya tsho
91b8(1): rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad kyang / sems can n+ya mtsho rnams kyang bsnun pa mdzad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi pa rlol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grapa
91b9(1): sa kyis gyi rnam par tha ba rgyam ma rnam pa thang ba rgya ma tsha rnams kyang brten pa mdza zang sangs rgyas kyi yol 'tshul pa rgyam ma par byer ban pa
92a1(1): mdzad grang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bsdu/ 
92a2(1): pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i brgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan grab mdzad grang snyam pa
92a3(1): dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi smon de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // 
92a4(1): yas chen bskal par rab spyad de// byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes// byi mtha'i bar du 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pas skur byin gyis
92a5(1): rlabs// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tsom bcod// mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal thA yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs
92a6(1): rgyas bde la 'grob thams cad bkod// byang chub sems dpa' tha yas zhing rdul skyed// de bzhin gshegs la ba lnga zhing kun nus gnas// de dag bsam pa
92a7(1): ji bzhin du/ khre tshom gsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsal// rgyal ba kun gyis ni ji lta bur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul gyi rgyud rnams dang / sangs
92a8(1): rgyam byin panabs mtha' da bus med pa// de dag tshu ni rnam dag brtan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod bul sa yis 'jug/ rgyal ba'i ma/ 
92b1(1): badz+ra ltar 'jug pa da // rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnam sbyangs pa te// rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan du gsal// sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin de lhur mtha' yas dpa / 
92b2(1): mi sems chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu yang tha dad dbus med pa// 'gro ba'i bsams pa rnams la skrag tu gsol// rgyal ba'i sras kun la yang dag
92b3(1): bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang // mi sems chos nyid ji ltar rnam spangs dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu yang tha dad dbus med pa
92b4(1): 'gro ba'i bsams pa rnams la sdug tu gsol// sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar chos rgyal po brang mnga' mdzad cing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang / sangs
92b5(1): rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang // thugs brtse slad du yang dag bstan du gsol// rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med cing // sman dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sra/ 
92b6(1): sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa// 'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan du gsol// zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul
92b7(1): rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang // sangs rgyas rgya mtsha mtha' da dbus med pa// 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du gsol// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho'i bsams dang / 
92b8(1): rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang / chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mchod ga/ byang chub snying por thams cad bstan du gsa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
93a1(1): de'i mi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs su rgyud nas// gnal gyi sgomatshams kyi gseb nas
93a2(1): 'od gzer sangs rgyas kyi rdul shin tu phra ba sed rab tu bkye ba/ 'di la ste/ rin pa tsho'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'di par dang / 'di la sa chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs
93a3(1): kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste 'od shin tu bya ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i zer dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas smin kun ljid kyi rdzu 'phrul
93a4(1): dang // snying po byang chub kyi 'odra byer dang / 'di lta ste rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste rnam par snang ba'i chos kyi dbyings
93a5(1): du spang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung zhing khyil ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste rin po che rdo rje dri ma med pa
93a6(1): po'i rgyal mtshan zhes pa'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta/ 
93a7(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo 'khor sgra rab tu sgrogs pa zhi pa'i 'od zer dang / de dge la stsogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul sbyin tu za ba snyed
93a8(1): 'od zer de dag ri zhing 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi rdul zhin tu ma bskyed do/ 'od zer de dag re re shing yang/ rin po che thams cad kyi khe dog shin tu ston pad/ 
93b1(1): byang chub sems dpa' rang rang gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba
93b2(1): nga bar 'gyur te/ 'di lar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba'i dang / snying baM me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang / mang ba chags su shar phyogs bya logs na 'a
93b3(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i pAd+ma'i dpal dri mi med par sreng ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de// 'jog rten gyi khams pad ma'i rgyud de dag las// 'jig rten khams rin pa
93b4(1): rje'i 'breng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de dag bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ nam kha'i mtha' yas pa rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'ang
93b5(1): kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+ma rnam par blta ba'i rgyan mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha
93b6(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyu nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sgo
93b7(1): bcus nu mkhra' kun nas g.yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po nI'i char gyi 'od zer pad+ma'i sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa dang / 
93b8(1): rin po che'i ri ba'i zom gyi sprin bcuso// na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis birlabs pa dang / nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil gyi sprin bcus// 
95a1(1): na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob pa dang / rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i sbyin bcus na mkha' nas ge yogs par byin gyis
95a2(1): nub pa dang / sil snyanas thams cad byin pa'i sman bcus rnam pa' kun nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bye ma'i shing gi mdzad kyi sbyin bcu sanamakha' kun nas g.yogs pa
95a3(1): khyen gyis byu bya ba / blos dang bdug thos gzugs rnams med yongams dran pa'i sprin bcus rnam 'i 'gun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabasas dang / 
95a4(1): thams cad kyi gong gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa tshod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
95a5(1): snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas g.yogs pa'i byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas// 
95a6(1): phyogs su brtson te/ ra phyogs mi tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te/ 
95a7(1): 'khod par gyur to/ de nas yung 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dra ba chags su/ lho phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams
95a8(1): sdang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams por ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jigs rten gyi khams 'od tha yas
95b1(1): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal g+hi ro'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal ma mongs/ byang chub sems dpa'
95b2(1): rgya mtsho rnam par snga ba'i blo gros shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu 'khor de nas gyi dkyil
95b3(1): bai khor de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i
95b4(1): snying po'i sbyin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyun gyi sprin bcas/ na mkha'
95b5(1): kun na g.yog par byin gyi brlob pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab du'i bar shing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sngon bcus namakha' su
95b6(1): nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrogs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kunan
95b7(1): g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sngags pa'i sbyin bcus nas mkha' kun
95b8(1): nas g.yogs par byin gyi brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po song gi yal ga sna tshogs kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus namakha' kun sa
96a1(1): g.yogs par byen gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal ba sa kun nas rin pa che'i 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas
96a2(1): snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus namakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khrir gyi
96a3(1): dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan ston pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro shin tu sngags
96a4(1): pa'i sgron mas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yul rjes su sgron ma'i sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nus g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor
96a5(1): bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab phra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnal med khang gi gzugs rnyan yang dag par smin pa'i
96a6(1): sbyin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi mtshon gyis dus gsum ga sangs
96a7(1): rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yo gas par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa
96a8(1): nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra mo sbed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab par byed cing / bcom ldan
96b1(1): 'das gang nA ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs su bstan te/ in+d+ra ni la dang / 'dzam bu nad dang / pad+ma rA ga sna tshogs kyi
96b2(1): snying po can gyi ser ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas/ bskyil mo krung btsa si te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang / 'dab
96b3(1): chags su nub phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de dgra las 'jig
96b4(1): rten gyi khams gos kyi bstan yongs su 'byung ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa smos mngon tu snang ba'i yon tan rin po che sra brgyas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho
96b5(1): rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
96b6(1): tu phra ba snyed drang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar khrod byar gyur to/ rin po che dang spyos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa
96b7(1): brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob cing nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i
96b8(1): sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs pa dbyin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
97a1(1): @sbyin bcas na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sbyin
97a2(1): bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pra dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha'
97a3(1): kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brnyas pa dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par
97a4(1): par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus rin
97a5(1): che'i mtshan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan cing / rgyun du ma yang dag par ston de'i khang pa brtsegs pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus/ dzin po che'i/ mtshon tha
97a6(1): kyis rab tu brgyan thams pa na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rgyun rgyan par kun tu byas par 'gengs
97a7(1): khang pa brtsegs sbyi bcus rnamakha' kun nas g.yags par byer gyis brlabs pa dang / sngo kun tu me dag gi ni bebs da / dril bu'i drabu bris pa'i
97a8(1): pa brtsegs pa'i srin bcus rnam pa'i kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngon 'jig / 
97b1(1): gyis khams rna mtsha' rdul shin tu tha bsnyed kyis namakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der byin te/ ba
97b2(1): ldan dasal phyag 'tshal nas/ nu baphyags su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri na pa che'i pa chen po lom sna chags gser las byas pa'i snying ba can mngon par smras na
97b3(1): skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyis rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su/ byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchi khyeru
97b4(1): pad+ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'i rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs
97b5(1): pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu byin pa'i blo gros shes
97b6(1): bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gdon pa der 'ong bar gyur
97b7(1): sa nar bus tshogs rnams cad kyi gang gi sprin bcus/ namakho'i kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlo ba tshang sgo thams cad nas/ la ma'i dag pa
97b8(1): sus 'byung ba'i spos kyi sprin bcus g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams las rgyanatha' yas pa yongs su ston
