98a1(1): me tog thams cad kyi sri rab tu ma ba'i me ton gi shing gi sI 'chus rnam mkha' kun sa ga mdzam par byin gyis brlab pa dang
98a2(1): shing gi sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che 'di'i bri ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnamapa
98a3(1): byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan dan gyi bye ma thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus byed yang dag par ston
98a4(1): pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis snying po byang chub kyi brgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs
98a5(1): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos gi mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyis nyi ma'i/ bar snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs
98a6(1): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / dag dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i shing sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlo ba dang / de dag
98a7(1): la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang
98a8(1): na ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsha'i nas/ byung phyogs su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu'i sgron ma'i pad+ma skyong po can mngon par sprul nas
98a9(1): rgyal mo phreng bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho dang / 'dab chags su byeng ger phyogs kyi mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi la
98b1(1): rgya mcho 'jam burgya klung dang / shel gyi kha dog tshon zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i nan
98b2(1): tshogs kyi snying pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gya dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
98b3(1): kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid gyi mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu prA be sbrid dang lhan cig tu
98b4(1): 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying bcan gyi sprin bcus/ rnamatha
98b5(1): kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob cing / seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun mngon pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas
98b6(1): g.yogs par byin gyis rlob pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par
98b7(1): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin btsus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis
98b8(1): brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas 'phreng ba'i rin po che 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyi brlab pa dang / 
99a1(1): seng ge po khri mas kyi me tog pa d+mo'i 'phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi skyes bcas/ namakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis
99a2(1): dab pa dang / seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi khri bden thams cad kyi rgyun yang dag par bstan po'i nor bu'i rgyal ba'i snying po can gyi sbyin bcus/ namakha' kun nas g.yogs par
99a3(1): d+hin d+ha sa nub pa dang / seng go ljin dang 'phreng ba thams cad bye shing rna babs dang / stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying potson gyi sbyin bcas rnam pa kun nas g.yogs
99a4(1): par byin gyi brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yul ga las nor bu rin po che dang / bye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi sbyin bcus/ namakha' kun nus
99a5(1): g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ga'i khri smos dang rin po che'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nos brgyan pa'i nyims rnam par snang bar byas pa'i
99a6(1): bocan gyi sbyin bcus/ nam pa' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag lo stsogs pa seng ge'i khri'i sbyin 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam
99a7(1): rdul shin tu phye bsnyed kyis na mkha' kun nas g.yogs pa'i byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsha la nas
99a8(1): byi dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ seng ge'i khror bu rin pa che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis pad+ma sna tshags kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas
99b1(1): 'khang par byung / ngas pa nga ga na gyi thams rgya mtsha didang mad ba nags su par dang lha phyogs mtshams sa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamam the la ba ts+tsha
99b2(1): snang ba gsor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i rgyud de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dngul dri ma med par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs
99b3(1): baM kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyid kyil rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun sgron ma'i blo gros
99b4(1): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu 'phags pa snyed dang ldan cig tu du 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
99b5(1): nA ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams cang bla bre'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabe pa dang / 
99b6(1): rin po che in+d+ra ni la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi bla bre'i spyi na bcus na mkha' kun nus g.yogs par byin gyis rlab pa dang / spos rin po che bla na med
99b7(1): ze thams cad kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlab pa dang / rin 'i che'i 'od 'phro ba sgron ma gzugs kyi blo bre'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas
99b8(1): gshegs par byen gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi chu 'phrul dang / 'ad dang spang byangs rab tu ston pa'i bre bre'i badzin bcas rnam par
100a1(1): na ra gyi byu ba pa dang / me tog tum khu dag dzin pa me rnaM na cwas na na nas galags par gyim pa sa
100a2(1): na kyi slo sa gamags pa byin gyis pa ba nga / gsang kyim pamam man
100a3(1): rgyal mchen gyi skye bye'i sbyin bcis rnamakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / brtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs parnyan rab tu ston pa'in
100a4(1): pa'i bla bre'i sman bcus nam mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab dang / de dag la stsogs pa bla bre'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu
100a5(1): bsnyed kyis na mkha'i kun g.yogs par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 
100a6(1): karaM dang lho phyogs mtshams su bstan te/ seng ge'i khri bad+ma sa chags rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sbrel nas skyil mo krung bcas
100b1(1): 'khod par gyur ro/ de nas pang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang mad pa chags su dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams ma/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'i ma'i 'od
100b2(1): rab tu 'ab rabs kun tu spang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod do/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyun dro dgra las/ 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma 'dang seng ge ltar snang ba
100b3(1): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shos rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog
100b4(1): kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug pud rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin prA ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags
100b5(1): / sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob cing 'od zer snang ba
100b6(1): brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob pa dang / mu tig mang mos kha dog mtha' yas pa
100b7(1): thams cad kyi gdugs sprin bcus na mkha' kunas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
100b8(1): snying po rje'i sgo rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna chags
101a1(1): kyi 'breng ba'i gdugs kyi sbyin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob pa dang / rin pa tsho tshan rnams pa sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi
101a2(1): rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra bas bres pa'i gdugs kyi sbyin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che shing gi yal ga thams cad kyis ba
101a3(1): pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po nya mi rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus
101a4(1): mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos dang gdug pa thams cad kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / tsan dan
101a5(1): kyi khyim mang pos kunanas nus par 'gengs pa'i gdugs kyi sbyin bcus namakha' kun nas ga yogs par byin gyis ba ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyil can rnams
101a6(1): bstan pas kun tu rgyun gyis khyab par byed pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa gdugs kyi
101a7(1): sprin 'jig sbyin gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis ne mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis par bru bar byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gdun pa der ste/ 
101a8(1): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang nub dang kyi phyogs tshams su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri man+da na la yid du'ong ber 'bar ba'i 'a
101b1(1): sa / sa byung ba sa dang// smra gad+hAn kyi thams nam dang bajugs myu pa dang byung gcugs mtshamasas
101b2(1): 'jig na gyi las mI n+d+ha tsho bang byu 'gyur ba na mya 'ab kyi rnyeng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig nan gyi rnams par 'i rgyud da dgal 'jig rted rgyulas
101b3(1): sa kyi rgyun yid du 'de ba'i snying pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa yan tan rgya mtsho'i tshad med pa'i 'di bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyilal bar myi mtshanas/ byang chub sems
101b4(1): dnga' 'od zer dang / gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed dang ldan cig tu la
101b5(1): bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po tshe thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bac+doMs namakha' kun nas g.yogs par
101b6(1): byin gyis rlob par cing rin po ni'i 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob pa dang / me tog gi sbyin
101b7(1): gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas
101b8(1): sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning gzugs
102a1(1): brnyan gyis khang du chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin chus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin pa che'i ya
102a2(1): ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrog po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu
102a3(1): rtul po rin po che bai 'i rigs kyi 'od kyi 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pA dang / sems skad cig gis sems can mtha'
102a4(1): yas pa'i gzug sa yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khrur gyi sbyin bcus rnamakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
102a5(1): smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis rlob pa
102a6(1): dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrog pa'i nor bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par
102a7(1): byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sngags pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngon 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha'i khams kun nas
102a8(1): g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'phyag 'tshal na/ nub dang bya
102b1(1): kyi phyogs 'tshams su kha brtan te/ seng ge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do
102b2(1): de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo 'dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 
102b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po seng ge 'bar ba'i snang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer
102b4(1): bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub
102b5(1): sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu bya ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams
102b6(1): cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus namakha'i kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab par cing spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs
102b7(1): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs
102b8(1): rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus mamakha' kun nas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
103a1(1): kyi rgyan kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa
103a2(1): thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sbyin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / bskal pa thams cad gcig nas cig tu rgyud par sangs rgyas par yang dag 'byung zhing sems can
103a3(1): yongs su smin par bya ba brjod pa'i zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che zad mi shes pa thams cad kyi zla ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam
103a4(1): mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa 'od zer gyi sprin bcus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas g.yogs
103a5(1): par byin gyis brlab par byed cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogs su brtan brtan nas/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i
103a6(1): na me rab tu 'ber ba 'byung ba smod pasbyin dag mngon par stsal nas snrel ma rung bcas snrel khong // de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ni dang / snying pa med dag gi
103a7(1): rtun pa 'di dang bad ba chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha nor bu rin pa N+DI sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsha'i sbyin ces bya ba yod de// 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de
103a8(1): ri dag la 'jig rten gyi khams mtsha na nyid du 'ong bar rnam par snang ba zhis bya ba sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i ma
103b1(1): bdugs pa'i' khor rgyu mtshanas/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs brtson 'grus rgyags pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha'i rdulanan
103b2(1): tu phra bsred dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sman bcas namakha' kun nas
103b3(1): g.yogs par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu rin po che kun nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas
103b4(1): zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pas rnam par snang bar 'ang 'dra ba'i sprin bcus/ namakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / smos thams cad 'od 'dra ba'i sprin bcu
103b5(1): namamakha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyan thams cad 'ong ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin brlabs pa dang / sangs
103b6(1): rgyus thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / shing dang ze ba'i sna tshogs su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nasal
103b7(1): na nas galegs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rdo rjes tshogs 'ad 'phro ba'i sprin bcos na mkha'i kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po
103b8(1): byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa mapa' mas pa brjod cing 'ang 'gro ba'i srin bcas/ rnam pa' kun nas g.yegs par gyis brda ba ba dang su cag sman ma' nang ma
104a1(1): smin ba sa/ namakha' kun gsogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od 'gro ba'i sbyin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rnal byin tu za ba snyed kyis
104a2(1): nam mkha' kun nas g.yogs par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ snying gi phyogs su brtan
104a3(1): sing ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i rad ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcus te 'khor du/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
104a4(1): rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phreg ban+d+ha'i rdul shin tu sle ba sed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ning bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin du rma ba sad/ byang chub se
104a5(1): dpa' de zhing yang / byang chub sems dbang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya batsho'i rdul shing du phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing par na rnam pa sna
104a6(1): tshugs kyi na pa'i srin 'jig chen gyi lda 'i rdul zhi d+hAm skyed kyis rnamal par gan nas galags par brnangs cing 'ongs par gyu byin ma
104a7(1): phyos su brtan na/ seng po'i khri rin pa sna gas kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par sgru cing cing yod krurang bcas de 'khod par nur // 'khod pa
104a8(1): 9 byang nab sems dpa' de dag gis bsnga'i 'ang thangs cad ri sa chod ze gyi sbyin na po tshe thams can lta pa dag sa chags pa'ajig nin gyi banas rgya mcho 'i rnam ni/ 
104b1(1): na bzed bat+na byung ba gyu / na pa nga sanas byung dubs mas dpa seng ge'i ni dang ma sna n+ta pa 'ab ga 'jig na gyi sa
104b2(1): rdu' zhin sra ba seM gAng byung bar gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' de res kyang rjes kyi dbyings kyi rdul rgya mtsha'i khams kyi rdul shin du thub rnams cad kyi snabs gang dang / 
104b3(1): byis nas/ rnal shin tra pra ba re re la lung zhing 'bum klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin nu zla ba snyed rab du 'jug par gyur to// nair re rer yang dus sa su mar gshegs
104b4(1): b.ri sangs rgyas 'acom ldan 'das thams cad mamor shing shes par gyur na/ sems kyis tsho nga la yang rdzi ma lta bu'i rnam par 'dul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dgam/ 
104b5(1): dag par yul pa byed par byed ro// sems kyi skar cig re re la ya / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed de kyi ri'i lha'i gnas gnas thams cad du sde pa dang / 'chi ma ba yang dag par
104b6(1): smyan pa'i s+ho nas/ yang dag par skal ba byed par gyur na/ sems kyi sa cig ri ril 'jig rten gyi khams ni mtsho'i rdub shin nA rla ba sad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
104b7(1): dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dag ras/ yang dag par skal ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad re re lajig rjid kyi khams
105a1(1): rgya mtsho' rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tu brjod cing rnam par 'phrul ba'in
105a2(1): dag nas yang dag par bskul bar byed par gyur te// sems can gyi smad cig re re 'jig rten gyi khams nA mtsho'i rdu la shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yangs
105a3(1): su dag par bya bA dang / smon lam d+h+ya mtsho thams cad rab tu skrag pa'i sgod gnas yang dgra par skal po byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad ce/ de de la 'jig rten gyi la
105a4(1): rgyo mcho rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag rnam par bstun cing brjod pa'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag
105a5(1): bor bskul ba byed par bskul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba srid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku
105a6(1): thams cad kyi chur dbab po'i sgod gnas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig ro ril 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba srod
105a7(1): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams smra tshus kyi dbyangs snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mtha'i stong gnas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to// 
105a8(1): sems kyi sad cig ril 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu'i rdul shin tu tha bsrid kyis ngas rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sas kyis kyi rnams
105b1(1): rol pa dang / 'od thams cad kyi skyo gnas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
105b2(1): kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgod gnas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to// 
105b3(1): lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu yang bzhin du yang dag par bskul bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams
105b4(1): 'byam kras dag tu rab tu bdal te/ shing re re yang sems kyi skad cigA re re lA sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsnga
105b5(1): thams cad ni rab tu na par byed do// sems can phyin cig la nges pa'i ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dge par nges pa'i phung po la rab tu dgod do// sems
105b6(1): na re rab kyi rdul shin du tha bsrid ni dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mthu ros su skye ba'i rab tu dkring ngo // sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu rba bskyed / nyan rdzas
105b7(1): dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la rab tu dgad do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba'i blo shes gnyen la bskyed bkur bya ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la rab tu
105b8(1): dgod do// zhing de dag re reng yang sems can rirab kyi dril shin tu pa bsred// sran chad ma skyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par byed do// zhing de dag pas med
106a1(1): sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin khru rnyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad kun nas snang zhing gzigs pa la yongs su stu sa twe rab tu
106a2(1): gyong // zhing dag rang yang sems na rig kyi rdul shin du rgyu ba snyed spongs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zang migs pa dang / sangs skyes kyin
106a3(1): yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya ma la rab du 'god do// ning de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu bya ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang
106a4(1): rlung yang dag par byung ba'i gnas d+ha mi rnam par spyod pa la rab du dgong ngo do// byang chub sems dpa'adi dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di lnga du dag
106a5(1): byung bar gyur to// 'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste// ji snyed byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang // rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i// dbyangs kyi phyogs
106a6(1): rnams na tu bkang zhing sgrog/ bskal pa rgya mtshor skyo med spyad pa spyod// sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grol kyang // yid la sgo med num dag gang yang meng // 'dir
106a7(1): tshul la rgya lasas rab tu nigs// rnaMs kyi sgo rnams kun la ba stod cing / tshul 'dir bsgral pa mam zeng bar byed/ ma' dang dadus med lhag ma gang yang med/ 
106a8(1): de ga sa ting ni bar ba tu sgrog// dus gos mi rmyil ba'i sngon ma ma gang meng pa/ rgyal sras dngag 'grol nardon du// de dag thams cadam sus yongs su spyod // de
106b1(1): dag spyod pa 'i rgyan na 'di 'dra'o// rgyal bkun gyi 'khor dunyer phyin te// phyogs rnams kunan gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing / rgyal sras la zhes rgyu mtsha zu gas ma
106b2(1): de dag des nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o// 'di zer sgo nas ri na mtha' yas pa'o// bsem yas zhing rnams de ga rab tu 'jug/ skyong bas mig ni kun na yongs dag
106b3(1): rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'ang yin no// sgra rje gcig tu 'di dag rab gnas shing // zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang // sems can rnams la 'jig
106b4(1): par mi byed de// 'di rnam dag tshul 'chang dag gi'o// tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus// de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul// skad cig
106b5(1): sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang // rgyun 'di sems la chugase rnye rnams kyi'o// dus gsu mu bskal pa gang yong na lus par// skad cig gcig gis thams cad
106b6(1): sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med// de 'dra'i chos nyid rmugs med blos rtogs so// bzung po spyod pa na chog la zhugs pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la
106b7(1): yid du'ong ba'i tshe lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te// 'od zer kun gyi sgonas dbyangs kyang sgrog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
107a1(1): sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ma par spyod pas 'phrul ba thob par bya ba'i byer sbyin ma dngas kyim
107a2(1): sbubu mas 'od zer chen po// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas phyogs rnam par sngon po'i stong po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o// 'od zer ring po che mas
107a3(1): cad kyi kha dog sgron ma'i sprin du bdal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas/ tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'bum klas pa rab tu sdang bar byas
107a4(1): phyogs thams kyad dbyangs rgya mtsha rnams rab tu snang bar byas ras// sems can gyi mngon ma rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'dag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab cur sku
107a5(1): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams cad rab tu skyed pa'i rgyan gyi tshus thams cad kyi rab tu spong ras/ sang+yas rgyas kyi spyi 'jig rten gyi kham thathams cad kyi rdul la
107a6(1): shin du phra pa thams cad dang // mnyam pa dag tu rab tho smos nas// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta brgya mtsho dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs
107a7(1): pathams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor la sprinas kyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin du pra pa dang mnyam pa pa bste// dus gsum dus gsum gau sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
107a8(1): rol du phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas/ sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir mos pa
107b1(1): ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sprin gyi char rab pa tu 'bab pa dang / de bzhin gshes pa ma thams cad kyi smor lam ma 'os pa'i sprin gyi char rab du 'bab pa dang / 
107b2(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i 'khor dga' par phrad pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
107b3(1): g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman dang pad+mo chen po yu ba rin po che thams cad las bsdu bstan nor bu'i rgyal rdoni mdzod sun tshogs las byas pa/ 
107b4(1): lom rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs pa ze bo'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan po tshwa thams cad las byas pa/ snying po 'dzem bu'i chuklung mi gus gyi cho
107b5(1): gyis rab bris pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par smang bar byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba sems kyi skad cig la/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
107b6(1): bar 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa ston pa'i sgor ba tu 'byung ba nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs rkun gyi srid kyis thams cad rdugrang bar byed
107b7(1): byang chub sems dpe' spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad rab tu sdodan pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo // pad+ma chen po de byung ba'i rjes byang chub sems dpa
107b8(1): chos thams cad la pham pa med po'i dbyings shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rterten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bi steng dang lhar cig tu bcom ldan 'ad/ 
107'a1(1): kyi mdzod sde de nyid byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lar du bar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas das bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal na/ 
107'a2(1): du ron pa che de'i snying po la 'dug go// khyang rab sems dpa' 'jog rten gyi khams che mngo rnal shin du bri ba sbed po de dag kyang ze ba'i 'bring ba de dag la 'khod do/ 
107'a3(1): de ras byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing chang med pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shing du skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs
107'a4(1): thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes song ba'i ye shes na can sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/ rab tu bzhugs pa'i mthu' ldan pa/ zhing 'byung
107'a5(1): klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs drung du phyin pa// ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa/ sems kyi
107'a6(1): sgrar cigi khams ca la myigs pa rnams thos kyid datshungs kun tu sbya pa/ chos kyang dablangs thams cadrul dus pas/ khyab par byed pa'i sted lus yul gyi snyarnam par stong pa/ 
107'a7(1): phyogs rnams kyi de bzhin gshes pa'i b+hir gyi brlabs 'chang ba/ dang 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing // phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin de
107'a8(1): rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi yo mnyan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang // chos kyi lus dpyid dngadu ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang
107'b1(1): ma pa par sprul pa d+hA ngas ma phyir ma par rgyums yad du'i du rnam sa/  sa nas sa sa nga ngas / 
107'b2(1): rgyal bu sam ste// de ltar mes pa'i sems can rgyas bkad sa nus// snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs// tshad rnams kur gyi rdul phran mchog sbed
107'b3(1): la po s+phu tsi kur la rab bzhugs te/ byang chub ses ba'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskoro// kun kyang bzod pa'i spyod pa mchog ston to// spu bra gcel zhing ma rgya
107'b4(1): nga chub cad mer po la rnams ma nirnam kang / sna mas nal la par 'phrul 'aso// 'a
107'b5(1): drung du 'dod zhing rnams srin gyi rdul dran mchog snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i sangs kA DUr du byung 'i
107'b6(1): chos dbyings 'byam kyus rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnya da rapatu ston/ chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can/ 
107'b7(1): kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun 'khor du yang dag byung / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul cam/ chos sprin gcan cing/ 
108a1(1): kyi mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la ldan du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'dul te/ 
108a2(1): pad ma rin po che de'i snying po la 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang ze ba'i phreng ba de dag la 'khod de// 
108a3(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' ches thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya ro zhing tshad med pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa/ de
108a4(1): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan
108a5(1): pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa/ ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs
108a6(1): bar byed pa/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la dmigs pa thams rlos kyi dbyings kun tu sbyar ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par
108a7(1): byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad kyi de bo nir gshegs pa'i byor gyi rlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzir thams cad la ra
108a8(1): tu 'jog c-i/ phyi ma'i mtha' ma sal ba'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par bar bal spyo ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mo dang na rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams
108b1(1): dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa 'tha' dang dpung med pal rnam par bsdus te/ 
108b2(1): de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas sku ri chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal/ bgro bkun la rgyal ba mngon dul ste// ji ltar mas
108b3(1): pa'i sems can rgyas btang nas// sring pa byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul 'bran pa chog snyed kyi// rgyal ba ste rtse kun la rab zhugs na
108b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' 'byor kun res bskor// kun kyang bzeng po'i spyod pa mchog snyan to// spya gcig rtse nong mang rgya mtsho ste// byang chub snying por pad ma'i ganganas
108b5(1): zhugs// chos dbyings rgyu rkyen thams cad kun bkang ste// spu rnams kur la rnam par 'phrul pa ston// ning rnams re re dgan rab bzhugs shing / zhing rnams 'byu kla
108b6(1): kur tA rgyas mdzad pas// phyogaso bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sgor gyi rnams// kur gyi snying po byang chub drung ngu 'dong // zhing rnams kur gyi rdul phran pa chog snyed kyi// bya
108b7(1): chub sems dpa'i yon tar rgya mtsho 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dod// chos dbyings 'byam klas rtag tu rgyas pa 'gengs// zhing nas thas cad gzugasasman ra/ 
108b8(1): tu ston// chos dpying rnal rnams ye shes spyod yul can// kur kyang bzang ba'i spyod la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun kyi 'khor du yang dag byung // byang chub sas dpa' ye mchog yul tsam// chos sprin 'an cing
108'a1(1): / du mkhas pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas/ zhing rnams kun du bsal a pargya tshor spyod/ 
108'a2(1): rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang par spyod// de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtshor bzhugs/ sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'brum pa// de dag smo
108'a3(1): ma rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtshod dang// kun du bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams su
108'a4(1): gang zhing // de dag rnam 'phrul rgya cher la bzhugs/ zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phrar phung po snyed// lus kyi sprid rtag par rab tu ston/ sems can kun pa
108'a5(1): 'od zer ba kun bkang la skyo// bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+ma rnam par lta ba'i rgyal ma
108'a6(1): gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshegasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zag
108'a7(1): dras gsum kun du de 'byung ste/ chos dbyings drug su chud pas na/ 'jig rten mgon zhes bar du brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyis// 'dres pa med
108'a8(1): sem pa / sems pathams cad med bzhin du/ gzubs kyi spang sa rang du ma ba marnams thams nas / chos mas
108'b1(1): larab tu bzhugs/ thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad bzigs/ zhing rnams kun na rnam par 'dzes// / kha dog bsam gyis me khyab par/ sems can mas
108'b2(1): yid bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang // de bzhin sku'i sprin kyang mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las// mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa rnang // 
108'b3(1): zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrog cing / chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston// spu rnams re
108'b4(1): re kun nas kyang / phyogs bcur 'od zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing / 'dul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od
108'b5(1): zer sgo rnams ras// sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tug byung // sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi
108'b6(1): 'khor lo dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bsod// ye shes zab mos shes byab/ rgya chen phyogs su rab ba ston// 'jig den khams rnams thams ca
108'b7(1): rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // yang ngag sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// skra rnams re re kun las kyang // 
108'b8(1): zhing rnams kun gyi rdul panyam par// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam phyung zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam
109a1(1): @rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ phyogs bcur rnams par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs srab
109a2(1): pa'adi dag smras sa// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun grub par/ sangs rgyas smini rnam par mdzes/ rgya chen ba srung ni rang 'byung ba/ zhing rnams rgya mchor shin tus
109a3(1): 'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par/ 'jig rten mgon de shin tu mdzes/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing / byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu sngon/ sangs rgyas 'jig chen kun la
109a4(1): mngon/ sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin/ thams cad gzigs sangs rgyas kyi/ rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong / mtha' yas 'od mnga' sangs rgyas
109a5(1): ma/ chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog/ ye shes rnams rgyu'i rdul bzhin du/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug 'jug pa
109a6(1): rnams la 'byung ba med// 'byung ba yod par rnam par bas na/ gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/ chos rnams 'byung ba ma mkha' ba ni ni/ 'gro dang gnas
109a7(1): pa mi mnga' ste/ 'on kyang rgyal ba kun na snang / sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung / dpyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod/ srel na bzhugs med rang bzhin mad
109a8(1): de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste/ sgra dang mtshan kyang de bzhin med/ rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dri ba'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos smin/ bsam pa kun las rab tu byung / yangs
109b1(1): sangs rgyas rnam kun tu/ sems can rgya mtsho la ba mdzad/ 'jig gyi khams rnams thams cad kyi/ snying po byang chub kun na snang / 'khor gyi rgya mtshol thams cad ni/ zhing rnams
109b2(1): kun gyis rnam par mdzes/ sangs rgyas kun gyi skra dag la/ yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes/ sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas/ de dag yon tan zad pa med/ de nas
109b3(1): byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad ba 'di
109b4(1): dag smras so// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas par/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa/ de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad mthong // / 
109b5(1): ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams/ zhing kun rdul gyi dbubs su yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo // gzugs brnyan zhing
109b6(1): rnams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung / kun tu byin gyi rlabs rnams dang / rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ kun kyang po bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod
109b7(1): pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa/ de dag zhing rnams thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong / kun tu mnyam pa nyid gyur cing / kun gyi lus kyis rab gnas te/ 
109b8(1): ye shes kun gyi rjes song ste/ sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa rnams/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par mdzes/ sangs rgyas
110a1(1): gyi sku dag tu/ rgya mtsho zhing la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu/ byin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi
110a2(1): lus dag dang / ming gyis kun na rab tu gnas/ byang chub snying po rnam 'phrul dang // byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya ning / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ skad cig sems
110a3(1): kyis ston pa byed/ shing rnams 'byamak+Shas thams cad dang / bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams// ska cig sems
110a4(1): kyis rnam par ston// sangs rgyas ni rnams thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams/ sangs rgyas skul rnam spyod kyang / mtha' ma rnyed par mi rung ngo // 
110a5(1): denas byang chub sems dpa' seng po'i dong bar snang bas mthu byin pa'i phyogros kyis/ bang sa rgyas kyi thun gyi rlabs kyis/ phyugs bzer rnamanga' ba ltas te/ 
110a6(1): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ chos kyi 'khol rab tu bskor/ chos dbyings rgyal rnams rnams
110a7(1): da kyang / sangs rgyas sbyin gyis mngon tu g.yogs/ 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dag/ phyogs bcur kun na gang med pa/ thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'ag
110a8(1): de ni smin lam rnam 'bral ba/ 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang gzhan gyi ming dag gis/ zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang / chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu bskor/ 
110b1(1): rnam par mdzad byin gyi rlabs/ ning rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang / kun tu bzang po'i smon la mdag/ brjod cing rnams kun tu 'byung / zhing kun rdul la sku
110b2(1): rnams/ thams cad chos char rab tu 'bebs/ 'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med/ 'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes/ bskal pa bye brag grangs med par/ zhing
110b3(1): kun rdul 'phran sbubs dgatu/ rnam par snang ba 'dzad pa'i gsung / sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrog/ zhing rnams thams cad rdul sbed kyi/ 'od zer dra ba phyogs bcu na/ 
110b4(1): sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sngonas/ byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul/ kun tum 'dres ske dag gis/ chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te/ 'gro rnams 'dul ba
110b5(1): ji banan du/ gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong / dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams/ de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang smod
110b6(1): sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltas/ da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas gang rnams mabyin pa/ de dag kun gyi bas ma yas pa/ chos kyi 'khor la
110b7(1): rab tu grag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa dpal gyi gzi badzad mar
110b8(1): mas sangs rgyas kyi rkyenaHrlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ 
111a1(1): deni tshigs su pa 'dir ga smras sa// gang gis byang chub sems dpa'ag/ seshes chags 'di ku nga // yashes nogs pa brnyes pa rnams
111a2(1): de dag 'di'i tshul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs// cing rnams kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas kur gyi spyod yul te// byang chub sems dpa' ched du
111a3(1): brjod// skad cig re re'i sems kun la// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing rder// chos rnams rgya mtsho kur la zhugs// rgyar gyi pha rol phyin pa
111a4(1): rnams// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag tu// cing rnams kun na gnas shing spyod// rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos rnams
111a5(1): kun ni bu 'byung // cing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed// ye shes chags med spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul du// lus pa med par kun bkang ning / 
111a6(1): rnam par po'i rnar spyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsregs dbyangs// chos kyi dbyings ni bsdog pa// chos dbyings rjes
111a7(1): su shes pa rnams// dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la skyod // bskal ba rgya mchong ma 'dres par// skra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu srog/ dus rnams thams cad shes pas gsal/ 
111a8(1): dbyings kyis de dgas la thugs// sla'i shes la rmongs pa med// sems canas yang spyod yul te// thams cad mtshan pakuran gyi yong / rnam par 'khrul ba'i dbyangs pas
111b1(1): sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing // stobs kyis la rab gnas te// bskal pa bye bar spyad pas na// chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yin
111b2(1): kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
111b3(1): smras so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid mes// ye shes pa ni thob pa nams// tha chig/  rten gtso bo rab tu mthong // 
111b4(1): rab snang ba'i kun 'od can// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams// sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang // sku'i rnam par 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi
111b5(1): dbyings la rnam spyod cing // lus kyi dngos la ra ba 'jug ste// za ba mo'i rnams rtogs gyur nas// smon lam dag gis yang dag byung // bsod nams rgya mtshos
111b6(1): byung gyur cig/ ye shes sa lnga rab tu gnas// chos la rnam spyod khong du chud// spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas ning rnams thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas
111b7(1): kun gyi rlung dag tu// chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas na// rang bzhin lus ni rab tu mthong // ning rnams 'byaraklas thams cad du// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// 
111b8(1): thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi nas/ rgya mtsho kun na rab tu spyod// bdag mthong bas ni lus dang bral// gcig tu 'dras par mngon par bla/ ma skyes mtshan nyid med
112a1(1): @ ma pa ma sa nan du ngas pa mthu pang // sems sa smra smra
112a2(1): kyi sbyin ni bstan byas shing // byang chub don tu sems can 'dul// sangs rnams cad mtha' yas ni// byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa ste// gang sa
112a3(1): man pa mdzad pa ye/ rgyal ba'i byin grams na pab/ mag pa ji snyi gang bzhugs pa'i/ khyen brnams papa' nga dbus pa de/ 
112a4(1): dbyings rab tu yang byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'amaH/ denas byang chub sems dang 'gyu nas 'od 'gro bcug 'badurab du 'byangs pas
112a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rim par ldas de// de'i tshe rigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams kun du sangs rgyas kyi// gsung
112a6(1): dkyil 'khor smra 'byin te/ chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// yod d+han spyan ni rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyis
112a7(1): rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// gzugs kyi sku yang dag rab bskrun cing // chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'dug// dga' dod mos pa'o shugs rnams
112a8(1): sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cid la/ rab tu ba ngas shing ringadagan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i migs 'dug/ shes rab chung dris chos
112b1(1): dag kun nas shes par mi nus te/ ye shes mig rnam sbyangs cing // 'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// rab tu gnas dang byin brlabs dang / 
112b2(1): rab tu spyad pa spyod pa dang // rab tu sgyu 'jug pa dang ldan pa'o// mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs// chos rnams tha' yas slob gi rnams chos kunam
112b3(1): nyid rnams la ste/ kun mkhyen nyid la rab bzhugs chos kyi rgya mtshos kun la spyod// sangs rgyas zhing na kur 'khor cing // thams cad kun na rnam par
112b4(1): mdzes/ 'ongs pa med cing 'phos pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o// gzugs snyan 'dra ba'i sku rnams ni// sems can rgya mtsho'i nang
112b5(1): ra snang / mos pa ji 'dra yod pa'i rnams// de bzhin mgon po kun gis mthong // kun du bzang po'i ma smon lam dang / spyod pa mang po sus spangs
112b6(1): ba/ de dag thams cad basbru la 'ang // rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong // lus kyi rnams ni re re kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams kun du khya
112b7(1): 'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang // gza'i brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i
112b8(1): zo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas ste/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas skra ni thams cad
113a1(1): nas/ 'od zer sngo mang daphyogs rnam 'acum/ 'dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can kun la bsam pa 'a/ 
113a2(1): sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// byang chub snying po kun na bzhags// bdud rnams thams cad rab bdul te// 'khor gyi rang rnam par 'dzes// thams
113a3(1): cang rdul dang ma 'dres par// 'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gas// phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du/ zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu sor// zhing gi rnams
113a4(1): ni rgya mtsho'i klong // phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon// zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag// in+da rI la raM kur nas gnas// sI la tsug dag dang spel gzhi dang / 
113a5(1): pad ma'i dbyibs dang khyad khrung dang / dkyil 'khor lo'i khyad par du// gzugs rnams kur kun gyi rab tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings rnams par phyin par/ 
113a6(1): thub pa med par 'gram 'dal paM// de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams// shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dbyings ro// 'khod pa'i zhing rnam
113a7(1): bsam pa khyab// de dag kun gyi chos nyid 'di// 'jig rter mgor po rnams kyang ston// tha dad med pa'i chos kyi 'khor la rab tu 'khor// gcig
113a8(1): gi tshul gyi rnam pa yis// chos bstan pas na ni kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab tu brjod// dang pa'i
113b1(1): rna rgyam tsho chul dag gis// me zang tshul rnams rab tu stan// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na yang / rgyal pa'i rnams ni mig yor 'dra// snying po byang
113b2(1): chub rnams na sdang // 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'gro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs
113b3(1): rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par btaltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams// 
113b4(1): sku gzugs bsam gas mi khyab ste// dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung / chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel/ mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs bcu
113b5(1): kun du rab tu 'byung/ rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa yis// sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cig sems kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar// 
113b6(1): rnam 'phrul gzhan ni rnam dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na sdang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// rgya mtshe lhas byung ba rnams/ sangs rgyas kun gis byin brlang
113b7(1): pa/ 'di ni yul la rnam par spyod / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la// gang rnams gyur pa// de dang de dag zhing dag tu yang sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun la ba lta// 
113b8(1): ye shes zab mo rnams gnon cing // chos kyi dbyings la gzhol bar ni// mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste// smom lam kun gyis 'byung ba'o// sangs rgyas
114a1(1): kun gyi sla dang gsung / chags pa med la rab tu zhugs/ spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dgagis spyod yul
114a2(1): kyang long du chung // sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin gnas cing // ye shes spyod yul gyur pa rnams// chos kyi dbyangs la rab brtson pa// rgyal brnam
114a3(1): ba rnam kyis sa gnon to// skad cig sems kyi zhing gi rnams/ sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa// de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du// rdul gcig ste
114a4(1): durnam par sbyor// zhing rnams ji snyed thams cadan// zhing gi rnams 'bral gang yong pa/ chos 'di la zhugs pa rnams/ 'dzis kyis dun bstsu
114a5(1): ba byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' stabs dang rtson 'grus chags pa med po'i rdzogs kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ phyogs
114a6(1): rnam par bltas ste gcang pa 'di dag da'i tshe tshigs su bcadang pa 'od dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsum ma zab ma 'byung// dbya
114a7(1): kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa// chos kyi smon ni mar 'babs so// rjod pa rgya mtshothams cad kur gyi sang dag te// sangs rgyas gang rnams ku du ya // chos nam
114a8(1): bsan parabatu 'byung // zhing rnams kun du ma lus par/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'brel mthing 'ang// sangs rgyas gsung rnams tham po dang / 
114b1(1): byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang da
114b2(1): sangs rgyas rnam bral ston pa 'byed// chos kyi skur ni tha dang min// na mkha' bzhin te chags pa med gzugs kyi skur ni rnam par dmigs// mig yor sA
114b3(1): ba'i mtshan nyid do// mig yor yul mi gnas te// mamakha' bzhin du dngos po med// mnyam pa nyid du dogs gyur ras// ye shes rgya mtsho thob par 'gyur/ 
114b4(1): sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te// gzung ba med cing byung ba med// namakha'i mnam pa nyid dang mtshungs// gzung du med pa 'di bstan to// zhing rnams kun gyi sangs
114b5(1): rgyas rnams// de dag spu gcig rtsel tshogs// ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis// spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong // rnam par snang mdzad spon lam ste// 
114b6(1): chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // tha med chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ 'di rnams kunan dag tu 'khor// de ste bskal ba bas ma yas par/ sA rtse gci
114b7(1): rnam sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdad kyang / de'i mtha' ni rnyed par dka'// ji ltar gleng bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshes pas rnam par 'bral pa
114b8(1): snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa'i thams
115a1(1): cang gling bzhi pa re rer yang // de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag dri/ bying chub sems
115a2(1): dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgya mtsho bya ba'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kuran ras 'dus par gyur to// 'di na ji ltar de bzhin du/ 'jig rter gyi khams
115a3(1): thams cad kyi snying po byang chub de bzhin gshegs pas rnam sgrol pa dag du kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang // shin tu rgyas pa chen
115a4(1): po'i mdo'// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ le'u gnyis pa'o// 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po me pa zhes bya ba/ 
115a5(1): shin tu rgyas blo'i mdo// bam po bdun pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po seng
115a6(1): ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi
115a7(1): sku'i snying po zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyamad kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings gzugs brnyan rnam par rtogs pa'i chos
115a8(1): namakha'i dbyings chags pa med cing brgya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i gling mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing shin tu rdul ba'i
115b1(1): tshogs/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas 'gengs pa// phyogs thams cad du yang ngang
115b2(1): par zhugs pa'i chos kyi lus kyis kun nas g.yogs par byas rlung bzhin gyi snying po can// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung pa'i ye shes
115b3(1): snang ba rgya mtsho'i gling phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon tu yang dag par ston pa// sangs rgyas
115b4(1): thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar pas// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs snying po can/ zhing 'byam klas pa
115b5(1): thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings 'jug pas 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas kyi yon don brgya mtsho thams cad yongasu
115b6(1): grub par byed pa/ bskal pa thams cad du smon lam rgya mtsho rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor
115b7(1): lo ston cing brjod pa'i byin brla pa la mnyam par gzhag par gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi phung // byang chub
115b8(1): ses raba'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po bya ba 'di la mnyam par gnag de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bye klas
116a1(1): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa rnam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i dus
116a2(1): gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lding 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i ris su gdogs pa/ shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa/ phyogs
116a3(1): rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa/ sangs
116a4(1): rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rnal mA lus ma kun tu
116a5(1): gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad kyi rdul shin du zab dang ma/ ma pa dag tu/ rdul pa mo re re la yang zhing 'jig rten gyi 'am
116a6(1): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu tha bsnyed la rab tu zhugs nas/ ning re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phrab snyed la rab tu 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs
116a7(1): bai re re'i rlabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rte gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu tha bsnyed kyis/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa sang mdzad kyi
116a8(1): snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
116b1(1): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mam par bzhag pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bya ma thos pa thams
116b2(1): cad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal
116b3(1): te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgra'i snying po 'di la mnyam par bas/ 
116b4(1): pa legs so// legs so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
116b5(1): rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang
116b6(1): mthus/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya che mtsho thams cad rnam par
116b7(1): dbye ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus pa snang bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / 
117a1(1): chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa thams cad yongasu gan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa red par 'jugs pa
117a2(1): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas// thams cad ma khyer pa
117a3(1): yongasu bzung ba dang // chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par lta ba dang // sems cad gi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad longasu shes par bya ba dang // de bzhin
117a4(1): gshegs pa zas kyi gsung gi yang lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongasu bzung zhing byin gyis rlob pa mdzad ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis// byang chub sems
117a5(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la// rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar skabs sa/ chos kyi dbyings tha
117a6(1): med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi nye bar sgrub so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang na bar sgrub sa/ 
117a7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang 'dul ba'i ye shes kyang na par sgrub so// chos kyi dbyings 'byam las mtha' dang bus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes
117a8(1): kyang nye bar sgrub so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zad mi dad pa dang / ting ngange 'dzir thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar sgrub so// byang chub ses
117b1(1): tshig gi ye zhes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// 'jog rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjesu song shing // chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'im
117b2(1): shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar sgrub so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi
117b3(1): drung tu 'dug pa nye bar sgrubs pa de bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang / rdul shin tu pha ba'i
117b4(1): kho pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltan ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
117b5(1): snang mdzad kyis kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe' byang bzang pos rnam par 'dzes par brgyan pa/ 
117b6(1): 'od zer gyi dra pa'i me dag sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa'i 'od gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa// rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis
117b7(1): rnam par gsal bar gyur pa// phyogs thams cad du spos 'phro ba'i 'od kyis rnam par snang ba// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gyi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor
118a1(1): gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnams par 'phrul pa dang // khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par sngon
118a2(1): pa byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'dris pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun du bzang po'i snga lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang gi rnam par ston pa
118a3(1): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i ston pa// dus sum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi gzugs brnyad 'byung ba rnams kyang ste/ byang chub
118a4(1): sems dpa' kur du bzang po'i spyi bor gzhag go// 'di ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad/ rdul shin tu 'phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams
118a5(1): bang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhabs kyi drang du/ byang chub sems kun du bzang ba'i skye bo la brag rgya mtsho sprin rnams rab tu bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa'
118a6(1): tu bzang po la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag tu// de nas de'i mdol zhing nge 'dzin de las ldang ba'i sbom tsho 'dzag rten po khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
118a7(1): du zab steng dus gsum thams cad sems kyi skang cig ro la nying nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i
118a8(1): byin gyis brlabs kyi chos gi dbyings dang dus sum du mnyam pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang // sangs rgyas kyi mang 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs par
118b1(1): daltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgo dang // sems can ma lus pa'i gnas cung dang mnam zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya chen po la 'jug
118b2(1): pa'i sgo dang // sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / mag 'khor las ldang ba'i sgo dang // phyogs dang phyogs rnams thams cad du chos kyi
118b3(1): dbyings rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang // rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa 'byamaklas pa'i sgo dang // chos
118b4(1): kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas langs par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu de'i
118b5(1): che/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so so re re zhing // ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs
118b6(1): par gyur to// gzungs rgya mtsho'i sbyin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed la yang rab tu zhugs pa gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i snying
118b7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu pra bsnyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// so so yang dag par rig par pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi
118b8(1): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprir 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya tsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng la
119a1(1): yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogasu rnam par snang zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa thams
119a2(1): cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yor dang gi snying po'i can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul gan du phra ba steng la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 
119a3(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang // ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed la yang ngur gyur // / de bzhin
119a4(1): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang bzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du zhi ba steng la yang rab tu zhugs
119a5(1): zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phob dang // 'byung ba dang byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das
119a6(1): bstan pa rgya cha sngon 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche'i rdul gan dus bsnyed la yang rabatu zhugs par gyur to// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig na gyi khams ma
119a7(1): thams pacu yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtshan mas da/ rdul shin du ma pa thams cad kyi khengs na yid bkun tu yang / 
119a8(1): chub sems dpa' rgya mtshornam par rab tu zhugs par gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang // byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab
119b1(1): thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs tsam drug yos te// rin po che thams cad gyis rab tu rgyan par gangs
119b2(1): shing chos thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu zag par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po chen po
119b3(1): bcu'i sngon gyi char mngon par 'bab par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal chen gyi sboman+d+har mtsha
119b4(1): par 'bab po// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di la ste nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i rin
119b5(1): po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnyan rin po che'i snyid gyi char
119b6(1): par bab bo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtsharan gi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste nor
119b7(1): bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par sdungad bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sbyin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di la ste nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs
119b8(1): babar snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprir gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di la se nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yod ngan gyi 'khor lo dang/ 
120a1(1): mtha' rab tu grags par byed pa'i srin gyi char mngon par blo// 'di lta ste nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal
120a2(1): kye gzi'i brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad du khyab par
120a3(1): byed pa'i sngoran gyi char yang mngon par babaste/ nor bu rgyas pa'i snyir gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs
120a4(1): pa thams cad gyi pa spu'i sgo thams cad dang // 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// zhing rnams 'byam
120a5(1): klas kun tu bzang po de// pad+mo yid du 'ong la rab tu 'dug pa mthong kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston pa byed// ting nge 'dzin yul la
120a6(1): 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus mtha' dang dbus med do// lus rnams thams cad ras kyang kun du bzang po'o// sprul pa rab tu 'gying gyi chos
120a7(1): dbyings rtag par 'gengs// ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul pa// thams cad dbyangs kyi chags pa med par rgya che sdig
120a8(1): ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam 'phrul gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag du// rgyal ba kun gyi
120b1(1): spyod yul yangs pa gang byas so// zhing rnams kun du rnam par 'phrul pa mang po ston// zhing kun rgyas pa kun gyi zhabs dru
120b2(1): ji bzhin du// de ltar zhing rnams kun du phra ba'i rdul phran la// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston// 
120b3(1): rnam par snang mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs// kun du bzang po'i lus ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// thams cad
120b4(1): zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas// lus kyi sgrar ni 'gro ba kun dang mnya bar bkye/ sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin
120b5(1): du drag ste// sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams
120b6(1): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas bdag la sbyar// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa chad kyang med// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho
120b7(1): rdul zan mthadang dbus med pa/ chang med thams cad lus kyi nang du kun rung cing // dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam par 'chang
120b8(1): rgya ston/ zhe skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston// zhing rnams thams cad 'jam khas pa na rnam gnas shing // rnam
121a1(1): par 'phrul dam pastod parab tu mthong / phyogs rnams kun gyi 'ang gi dbyangs rnams ma lus sto// kun tu
121a2(1): be de la rnam la kur kyang mthod rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes spobs la zhugs/ zhing 'dzidas ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu mnan// chos rnams
121a3(1): 'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs// rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngan chad pa ston// de ltar zhing rnams kun pasam yas nam 'phrul pa/ phyo
121a4(1): rnams rgya che kun chu snun/ 'di 'dzin rnams la 'jug par btus napa'ithor// rgyu ma pa'i 'od zer snyan las man dade legs su 'byung / deras byang chub sa
121a5(1): dpa' 'khor yo pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus zil po bskyed de// byang chub sems dpa' blan ma ba lnga zhing dbyangs kyi ro gtsas/ 'dus dang
121a6(1): tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// m+b+hal pa thams cad chos las skyes pa ste/ smon la mi kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu bya/ de bzhin
121a7(1): ma marnam pa pa'i nang pa/ sa kyi skams rnam par rab tu sangs//  mas 'jamams pa la grags ma /  bzang ba
121b1(1): phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams// rdul bsgrubs kun tu de dag chung byas shing // zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams
121b2(1): kun du rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/ rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin deng spyod dang // chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa bsal par
121b3(1): kun kyang snang // chos kyi dbusde rnams ma lus khyab byas shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la shin tu zhugs// sems can rgya mtsho'i don tu de spyong
121b4(1): cing // rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang // rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad// 
121b5(1): namamakha'i dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing // rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od kun gzhal du med/ rnams
121b6(1): yangs stobs chen 'od gzer yon tan sprin// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing // rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston// rgyal gang gi don
121b7(1): du bskal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' yas par ni bar ni bzang po spyod spyad pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos
121b8(1): kyi sngon las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur bong ngo // stobs bcu rnams kyang ji ltan 'byung 'gyur dang // sems can rgya
122a1(1): ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba/ sems can rnam sul sna byungs pan+d+ha zhing stsur// 'khor rnams 'angs pa 'di dag thams cad byung // kun du bzang po
122a2(1): la mngon gam panas// sangs rgyas kyi gyis paning bar gyur ba la// chos kyi 'khor mo ro rang khyod kyis bsgolashin tu rgyas pa chen po'o mam seMs rgyas pa
122a3(1): ngo che zhes byab las/ kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'chi// rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes sa/ le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas byang rab sems dpa
122a4(1): na du bzang po/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams ca pa rnam pang brnyas/ sems can khams rgya mtshol rnam par bltas/ chos kyi dbyi
122a5(1): rgyamatshal rnam 'a shes/ sems can thams pa dkyi las rgya mtshal rnam par bltas/ sems can thams sadapas pa dang bang de rgyas pa rnam pa bltas/ sa
122a6(1): rgyas thams cad kyi ches kyi rna mtsho 'a bu ltas/ des rgya batshol rnam par 'altas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smod 'am rgya mtshol rnam par bsdus
122a7(1): sangs nas thams cad kyirnam para'i tshul pa rgyum mol rnam par bltas nasab+ha na pa sems dpa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor yor pa rnams cad la smrams/ kye rgyal ba'i sras nas
122a8(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'di ning 'jig pa yongs su dag 'jud pa'i 'i shes ni bas mgyis mi khyang // sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can
122b1(1): thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ri bas ma gyis mi khyad ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis
122b2(1): mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'i ye shes ri bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom lngar
122b3(1): 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dang ba dang
122b4(1): dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad gcig gcig la dus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs
122b5(1): su rung ba'i ye shes ri bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyai rnam par 'phrul
122b6(1): rgya batsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyaba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
123a1(1): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
123a2(1): kyi rnam par dgod pa rab tu bstan pa rgya mtshon bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bsten pa yongasu
123a3(1): dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni bsam gyis khyab
123a4(1): po/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpa'i byang bzang po yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
123a5(1): kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya che kha dog sna tshogs
123a6(1): kye snying ba du 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal ring po che'i 'od 'gro brgya mtsho rnam par
123a7(1): rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab du 'grub pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs
123a8(1): byas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam gsum yongasu snyan pas pa sems canan rgya mtsha yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba mdzad pa ni bsam
123b1(1): gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas
123b2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi sa la rab tu bzhug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug
123b3(1): pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu' ni bsam gyis me khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom
123b4(1): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sbyong yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstobs la thug pa
123b5(1): med pa bsam gyis ma khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi snyengs pa zil gyis mi mnon pa ni besam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas
123b6(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ring nge 'dzad la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshes
123b7(1): pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang // rnam par 'phrul ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen po'i ye shes rnams par dag pa ni bas
123b8(1): gyis mi khyab pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
124a1(1): kyi mthu' dang // de bzhin gshegs d+ma'i khyer g+has brlabs pas// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
124a2(1): rgya mtsho la bzung ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa dang // 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tham
124a3(1): cang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / bskal brgyam pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdu rjes su bsam padun
124a4(1): 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa ji lta ba
124a5(1): bzhin du rab du snyan pa dang // sems cad gyi dbang po rgya rol sangs rgyas kyi tshul kun tu snang ba ye shes yang dag par sbed pa// sems cad thams cad kyi bsam
124a6(1): brgya ma'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhim pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / 
124a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa' spor la mtsho rgya mtsho rab tu dgod phyir yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
124a8(1): kun du babang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba nga / chos la dra'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang
124b1(1): mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang // snying po go kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya
124b2(1): ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab du dgod par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi mig dus gsum gyi rdo rje su song ba yongasu spangs pa dang // 'dzag rten thams
124b3(1): cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang // thams cad
124b4(1): mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgyas tshe rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa'i 'di dag smras so// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes sa zang
124b5(1): mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab// sems can bsam la sbyor bas ji bzhin snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o// bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa
124b6(1): bskal pa rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas// sems can rgya mtsho yongasu spor bya'i phyir// sems can rang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes// sems can rgya mtsho
124b7(1): 'byung ba bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab// srid pa'i gnas can dad pa rung ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub shes rab
124b8(1): mi nus so// gzhan du gang rnams shin tu sems btan zhing // dge' pa'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // sangs rgyas kur gyis byin gyi
125a1(1): brlabs pa dag/ 6/ sangs ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug/ gang rnams sems ngag g.yo med rgyu med cing // snying rje'i bsam
125a2(1): can khong nas bya mas dga' dang // dad pa chen zhing rlabs chen de dag na// 'di dag 'a ba thob par 'gyur// kun du bzang po'i smon lams ngag dang / 
125a3(1): chos dbyings ma mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas shing sbyong ba rab tu sus stod po// de dag rgyal bas spyod yul 'di bres so// gang gise pa'i rnam 'phrul
125a4(1): 'di mthong ba'i// byang chub sems dpas thob legs par thob// gzhog gis yul gis shes par mi nus te// 'di ni kun bzang pos brtogs pa'o// 
125a5(1): de bzhin gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs shing // 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na// kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'khor ro// rnam par sdang mdzad
125a6(1): sal da mang+ga yod de// bdag galus su 'ang rnams thams cad kyang // rab tu zhugs shing der zhigazhing rnams kun/ de dag swA ci kun tu ba lta bar
125a7(1): rgyal ba'i stong yul shin du bshad par byer bya// kun tu bzang ba'i sgo la pa spyod pa rnams// mtha' dang dbus med mngon par bslab pa deng // gron sumagyi
125a8(1): yul dang lus ldan pa// de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di can to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'angadi dag ni// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas mchi shin
125b1(1): bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom lda 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang // da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsung so// gsung do gsung par gyur ro// bcu ga
125b2(1): zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyis rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan pa dang // 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
125b3(1): mchoganas pa'i shin du bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jog rter gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyi bas dang / rnam pa shin tu bstan pa dang // 'di ltas
125b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhan// shin du bstan pa dang // 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khas ma rgya mtsho'i rgyan/ shin du bstan pa dang
125b5(1): 'di lta ste 'dzag rter gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin du bstan pa dang // 'di lta ste 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas
125b6(1): 'byung ba shin du bsti 'jig gi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa'i byin gyis bas bas brlabs shin du snyan pa dang // 'di lta ste gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa mtha'
125b7(1): yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin du bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shin du bstan pa'o// kye rgyal pa'i sras ngag 'dzag rten
125b8(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la stsogs pa// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa// 'dzag rten gyi khams chosa'i rdul shin phra ba snyed// 
126a1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / mthun pa snarang byung brnams kyi gsungs pa// gsung ngag sung par 'gyu / 
126a2(1): sa pa'i sas dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshe thams cad ni ma dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i 'jig rte gyi khams rgya mtshaji rdul zhi dupa pa skyed zag
126a3(1): drung / 'brangs de 'brung de 'byung bar 'gyu/ bcu ga na 'di ga ste/  na naH / ches nang ra
126a4(1): pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can
126a5(1): rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang // bsod nams kyi rtsa ba bskal ba mthun pa bsags dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs
126a6(1): dag pa'i snod lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par spangs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par slebs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
126a7(1): kyi mos pa'i rang rnams dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ga brtsa ba gres pa 'dzag rji rnalas 'das dadang / hUM mthun par mngon par 'cha
126a8(1): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khru mchog mthu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o// kye rgyal
126b1(1): ba'i mas dag de ltar gyu dang byen la dpags pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sngags / 'du can gyi khams rgya ma rdul shin du brubasad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam pa
126b2(1): cang byung ngo // 'bring ngo par 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos/ 'dzag der gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin du bsar pa 'ang
126b3(1): gsal bar rjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byir gyi brlabs kyis/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas ngas/ 
126b4(1): byin brlabs rnams 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu// zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su spangs// byang chub
126b5(1): sems dpa' kun gyi bsam pa bzhin/ smon lam rgya mtsho bas mi yas rnam sbyangs shing // sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bas ma yas pas/ 
126b6(1): phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam phul dang // thams cad khron pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos/ 
126b7(1): lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sgrubs shing // namakha'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhing 'byung ngo // spyod pa pargya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med rnams// spreng
126b8(1): chad med bde ga shegs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun sbyong zhi// bskal pa mtha' yas zhams re rer baspyod// sems cad pas
127a1(1): dbyings bsam g+has mi khyab pa'i// las kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung // rnon mongs las kyis de dag
