127a2(1): mongs bcas/ mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams// rin cen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri med pa/ 
127a3(1): dngapa rgya mtshonam par sel ba'i phyir/ rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcur zhing rnams sbyong // chos dbyings rdul gi khongs rgyal sras rnams// kun du
127a4(1): ba'i spyang pa spyod pa dag/ rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston te// rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbyings yang med// dmakha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'di
127a5(1): 'dra ste/ snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhab drung ni/ pad+ma'i bstan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun/ de dag zhing bcas lus kyi rang na khong // skad cig sems
127a6(1): kyi dus gsum 'byung ba yi// zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang sod// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dras gsum zhing bstan pa// rnam par snang mang
127a7(1): rgya mtsho'i 'ang me de// tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas// rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyis rnams// sangs rgyas kar gal
127a8(1): byin gyis rlobs/ rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab rab tu mchir/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gnas pashin du bsad pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga
127b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la nimam pa'i dbyings kyi rnas la rab tu gas / 
127b2(1): 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra bsad de/ 'ang sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshal la de/ rgyan thams cad kyi rgyam tshe lu lar bdugs
127b3(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la la ni// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi kha rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 
127b4(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyi'i 'khor rgya mtsho la la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni// rin che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la tu
127b5(1): gnas so/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi
127b6(1): khams r+b+ba mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i rgyan rnam pa
127b7(1): ji mchis bdugs// da la grums pa sar dus spyod du sgrur pa/  kyi sa la
127b8(1): zhing yang 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho rdu la shin du phra bsnyed do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzangs pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa/ 
127b9(1): ni du bstan pa'i ngor 'di nyid yongs su bsdu pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i tshe dgas stong pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin
128a1(1): chen rang bzhin dri med rnam/ rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos/ 'di dag rgyal ba'i byed
128a2(1): brlabs rgyu'i dbyibs legs 'khor bar snang / de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun rab tu khyab/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho la lnga dri med 'od
128a3(1): can nam kha'i dbyings la gnas/ snang pa'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya ro dag la legs par gnas/ 'dre bang bus rgyal po 'khor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po
128a4(1): bskor/ 'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems cad rgya mtsho shin du mgu byed pa'o// la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu kur tig nor bus brgyad/ 'di rer nga bas
128a5(1): kun nas sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te/ zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen pad+ma'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang bzhin zhing rnams
128a6(1): 'byam klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la rgyas shing byin la gnas/ yangs shing rir chen mang ldan rgya chen de dag byang chub
128a7(1): sems dpasaM gang / lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang chog ltung bang lus la de bzhin gnas/ der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo rnag tu 'khor/ 
128a8(1): bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'ang 'gro sngon rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas/ chu yi phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mchi brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas/ la la gos dang brag dang rgyal
128b1(1): mngan me tog rgya mtsho dag gnas/ kun na 'od rnam phral 'di rgya cheran rnam par snang mdzang ston pa mdzad / zhing rnams ring dang zung dang klong gi gzugs dang krornam pa
128b2(1): sna tshogs te/ sna tshogs rgya chen snying po ji ma thal pa yongs dag dri med na/ rnam pa sna tshogs dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i ba dbyings la rab tu gnas/ sangs
128b3(1): rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yog par rtag tu ra mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ zhing rnams rgya tshe 'byam klas la la sbyi drug yong dang med la gnas/ byang chub sems
128b4(1): dpa'i gcod pan rin chen 'khor los bzung bas dag par gnas/ de na sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya cher thams cad kun nas rab tu sdang / ri rer sangs rgyas gsung
128b5(1): rnams kun tu gtong ldan las gyis de dag sprul/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'bum klas mig g.yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dri/ mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag
128b6(1): dri med sems kyis shin du bskyed pa ste/ na mkha'i dbyings rnam sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang / las kyi yul ni bam gyis mi khyab 'di
128b7(1): dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa rnams/ zhing rdul kun la kun du bzang po dag par rab
128b8(1): du sgrub byed cing / de la bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smidan par bya phyir spyad pa spyod/ chos byings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam par 'phrul rgya chen sngo/ rdul
129a1(1): rnams kun na yongs dbyangs yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgyar tshe kun nas/ sangs rgyas sprin gyis byi gas brnyas pas
129a2(1): kun na kyang g.yogs cung yongs su rgyas/ ji ltar rdul phrar gcig la rnam sprul de bzhir 'gro ba kun ra'o// rnam par sdang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'bral rgya chen rab tu
129a3(1): stongan pa mdzad/ zhing rnams 'byam zas thams cad mig g.yor la bu sbyam mig rgya 'dra/ sdang ba med cang 'byung med phyogs cu dgan 'gro dang 'ong ba mod/ mkha'
129a4(1): la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'dzag par de bzhin 'gyur/ shin du yangs pa dge smon lam rnam sbyangs las kyis yongs su bzung / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
129a5(1): de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyis dbyibs ni rnam pa sngo tshogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'a byam zas la la ni/ kur ris zlum po'i 'jig rten gyi
129a6(1): khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun ras gru bzhi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun ras khyil pa'i dbyings su 'dug go// 'jig rter gyi
129a7(1): khams rgya mtsho 'byab klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la lani shing sna tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyings su 'dug
129a8(1): go/ 'jig rdon gi khams rgya mtsho 'brumal la ni/ me dog sna tshog gi kyi dbyings su 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la lo ni shing sna tshogs kyi
129b1(1): kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byamaHklas pa la la ni sems can sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam
129b2(1): klas pa la la ni mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyings su 'dug la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs su shin tu bstan pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba
129b3(1): snyad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin brlabs
129b4(1): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dernam pa sna tshogs rgya che'i zhing la ltos/ rnam bye sna tshogs mtha' yas dbyibs su
129b5(1): gnas dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te/ phyogs rnams kun na zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang / la la zlum po la la zur sum ste/ de dag la la phyogs na gru bzhir
129b6(1): gnas/ nor bu pad+ma 'khor lo yan lag brgyad/ kun nas las rnams brgya mtshos rnam par bris/ rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing / gser
129b7(1): las grub pa rnam phye sna tshogs te/ sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs
129b8(1): snying po can/ na mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin de dag rin chen mang gzhi rnam par phye/ de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes/ zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis
130a1(1): rnam par rtags/ sna tshogs rgyar dang sdang bas kun ras gnas/ rnam par 'phrul ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ zhing
130a2(1): rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/ bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur ni/ rnam par ngag dang nyon mongs tshul te/ chos nyid 'di ni dag tu yod pa yin/ de ltar las
130a3(1): rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab/ skad cig rtse la bsam gyis mi khyab zhing / thams cad rdul snying sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas/ kur na sangs rgyas rnam par sdang mdzad
130a4(1): bzhugs/ 'khor rnams rgya mtshor chos rnams rab tu ston/ rdul gcig rtsel pra dang yangs pa'i rnams/ thams cad rdul steng kha dog kun dang ldan/ kha dog dbyibs
130a5(1): rnams kyang rnam par bdags/ de dag dkun tu rgyal ba'i lte pa'i bskor/ rdul rnams kun rab tu zhing bstan pa/ de dag smor lam rnam par sprul pa yin/ na mkha'i dbyings
130a6(1): su las kyis sprul pa ni/ sna tshogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par rtags/ sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams cad la/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa bsrung ba
130a7(1): dag rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te/ dul phrar kun la zhing rnams shin du gnas kyi rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'jig rten gyi khas gya mtsho'i lhun dag ni/ gzhan da
130a8(1): gzhan du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi ldan can no/ 'jig den gyi khams rgya mtshol lo ni rin po che gcig las
130b1(1): rnam pasna tshogs bkod rgyad kyi ldan can no/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi ldan can no/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 
130b2(1): 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhan can no/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi lhan can no/ 'angag rten gyi khams rgya marol la ni/ rdo rje gzhan
130b3(1): mi shogs pa'i lhun can no/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi brlabs kyi lhun po can no/ 'jibaden gyi khams rgya mtshol
130b4(1): la ni rin po che'i mtshan nyid kyi ldan can no/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'i lhun po can no/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni
130b5(1): nyi ma'i nor bu dkyil 'khor gyi ljin can no/ 'jig rjen gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la na
130b6(1): snang ba'i lhun can no// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtshol la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i lhun po can no/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
130b7(1): la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la rin po che thams cad kyi med tog gi gcod pa gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
130b8(1): mtshol la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od lhun can no// 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
131a1(1): la la ni sems kyi rnam par rtogs pa skad cig gis dmas pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i ldan can no/ 'dzag rten gyi khams
131a2(1): rgya mtshol la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi ringan po che'i dbyings kyi ldan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i
131a3(1): lhan can no// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsungs dbyangs rnam pa'i lha can no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bza
131a4(1): pos yang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ldan shin du bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu zung bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam
131a5(1): bar bltas ste/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa'ing smras so// zhing ga rgya ngal la ni rin chen bzin kun na gnas/ rdorje bzhin du mi shigs sa/ rin chen pad+mo rnams
131a6(1): gnasal la 'ong bar rang bzhin de/ dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byud/ rgyun rnams kun kyang 'jo zer gyis/ sna tshogs mkha' bzhin d+hi ma med/ la la 'o
131a7(1): rang zhen te/ dag pa'i 'od dgasal gzer la gnas/ 'od kyi sbyin chen sna chos 'od/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/ zhidi rnams rgya mtshol la ni
131a8(1): mig yor la bur gnas pa ste/ brjod du med cing bzung du med/ smon lam dbang gis rab 'byung / la la nor bu mu tig r+b+ha/ seng po thams cad rnam par 'ab
131b1(1): mu tig 'khor lo'i gzhi dag dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su ga ba rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing/ 'od 'gro'i stan gyis mngon 'bebs shing / 
131b2(1): rin chen thams can sna tshogs ldan/ thams cad las kyis sprul pa yin/ la la mtshan las byung ba ste/ gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun du bris/ bcod par rnam pa
131b3(1): sna tshogs bkod/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul/ rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba yi/ zhing rnams mos pa yid la gnas/ yul na mi gnas sna
131b4(1): mi bzhin/ yongs su brtog pas yang dag bskyed/ sangs rgyas sku'i 'od zer gyi/ nor bu sna tshogs kun du gnas/ sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang
131b5(1): sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu sbrul/ la la kun du bzang po yis/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin du sprul/ nam mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang / smon lam rnams
131b6(1): kyis rnam par bris/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'dzag der gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu pab snyed du shes par bya
131b7(1): ste/ 'di ltar dmigs pa rnam par sna tshogs thams cad kyi spyan rab tu 'phros pa'i brgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor le rjes su
131b8(1): brjod cing / rab byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyis las rnam par smin du mtsho las
132a1(1): rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'ja'adi lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i long yongs su bstan
132a2(1): bya'i rgyun dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum sa ngas rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste sems can gyi skad
132a3(1): cig la bskal batha' yas par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di la ste rgyan gyi dmigs pa/ thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byung
132a4(1): ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste rin po che dang / spos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste sa po byang chub kyi rgyan dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'a
132a5(1): gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyun dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' kun du bang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su spyor pa'i rgyan dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sas dag
132a6(1): de dag la sogs pa 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
132a7(1): pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khams shin dri bstan pa 'di nad yongasu bstan pa'i byor sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyi phyogs cher rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs
132a8(1): su bcad pa 'di dag sbaso// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgyan chen mtha' yas te/ rnam ngag las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i gnas
132b1(1): kun kyang / sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas/ kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams/ rgya mtsho dag par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung / 
132b2(1): rgyan dang rin cher 'od 'phro sna tshogs sngan/ skra byin zhing gi dbyings rnam khyebs par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams/ de dag kun kyang rgya ma
132b3(1): zhing ma grag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams dang / de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin/ 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag
132b4(1): rgyan gyi sprin rnams kun nas sgra 'byin te/ sems can de dag rnam smin ci 'dra ba/ sangs rgyas 'byin gyis kun ras sgra yang sgra yang sgrog/ dus gsum byung ba'i
132b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ rnam 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho ku rnams na snang / dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyu smra mtshos rgyan le ltos/ 'das pa'i bskal
132b6(1): pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba ji snyed pa'i/ bsal pa de dag rgyan mang yang pa yang / zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang / dmigs
132b7(1): pa kun la sangs rgyas sbyin gyi rnams/ 'gro dang mnyam pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gengs/ rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnam par 'dul/ 'di ni zhing ni zhing
132b8(1): rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to/ spos 'od sprin dang de bzhin me tog krung rnams sde tshogs thams cad kun ras kyang / rtag par kun tu khyab rab tu byung / 'di ni zhing
133a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bzhes bzhen thams cad rten pa'i dge ba'i rtsabs bskal pa mnyam pa dang / rgyang chu thos dpa rdzas kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nam rgya chen ba'i smim rjes par 'phel bar
133a2(1): rnams rgyatsho rnam mthar te/ phyogs su kun gyi seng po drang chub 'dzin zhing ma rnams su gas rgyan kyang mi lus rnam par gyun// 
133a3(1): rgya mtsho'i zhing 'di dbyings dgan/ rnam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston par spong / rgyalo sras kur du bzang po thams ca kyai/ zhing rnams mtha' yas 'byags
133a4(1): gyi rnams/ 'gro ba'i grangs steng bsngal rgya patsho rnams sbyangs pa/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun darab tu snang / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su
133a5(1): dag par bya pa'i tshul rgya tsho ni/ 'jig rten gas rtul gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng shes par byas te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
133a6(1): myos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i yul la rnam par
133a7(1): spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams dang yongs su rdzogs par bar bya ba dang / yongs su skyed bya ba dang / byang chub sems
133a8(1): bla pa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu bkod cing gzung ba'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang
133a9(1): 'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par sprad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnams par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
133b1(1): rnams kyi rgyan mtsho thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta sa ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par
133b2(1): sgrub pa rnams pa'i dag pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa 'dzag rten gyi khas rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho/ 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra
133b3(1): snyed du shes par bya'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid mas par bstan pa'i
133b4(1): phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi phyogs bcur ni rnam par bltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs
133b5(1): rna rgyan/ smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun gyis byung / kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtsho dag/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho rtag du 'od mang 'gyeng / sngon chad dge
133b6(1): pa'i bshes gnyen snyen bskur zhe na/ bskal pa mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te/ snying rje 'jams pas 'gro yangs kur bkang zhing / zhing rnams mtsho
133b7(1): yangs pa 'di kun byangs/ tshes sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis/ sangs rgyas yon rgya mtsho yongs te/ bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyangs shing / zhing
133b8(1): rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung / mos pas dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing / rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas/ bzod pa'i rgya
134a1(1): \u0f7f/ mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing / rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams byung / bsod rnams snod ni namakha' mnyam
134a2(1): bskyed cing/ 'gro po kun phan bde don spyod 'gyur te/ bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan pas/ 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung
134a3(1): zhong rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snying mtshad med pa'i/ pha rol phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs te/ smon lam mthar phyir mi zad goms byas pas/ dri meng rgya mtsho
134a4(1): dernams yangs pa 'byung/ 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod char mod/ chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs spangs te/ sna tshogs thabs smos sems cad sbyangs pa
134a5(1): na'adi 'dra'i yod 'od rgya ma che'i zhing rnams 'byung / rkyen rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing / rgyal ba'i yon nargya mtsho kun zhugs nas/ 'gro
134a6(1): lan gyi sdug bsngal mcho bskabs pas/ gang gi mtsho yengs 'di kun dag mche bar 'gyur/ stobs rnams rgya mtsho ga zhal med yongs sbyangs shing / 'gro ba 'a
134a7(1): dag chung med yongs sbyangs te/ sangs rgyas rgya tshe yangs spar bskud bkung bas/ maud rnams mtsharnams mang rnam par da/ kyeN+Dal po'i sras pa de dag la 'ja
134a8(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtshon/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyeng du shes pa bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs
134b1(1): rgyas 'byung ba la ni sku chu dur kun du ston do/ 'di ltar ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad gzugs bskus gang bar ston to// sangs 'byung
134b2(1): ba la la ni sku rmad ni mo rid do/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob po/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ 
134b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob po/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la la ni/ tshul gtsigs mi snyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
134b4(1): byin gyi rlob/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul khams gis mi khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob po/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sems can
134b5(1): gyi khams nyu du rnam par 'dul ba byin gyis rlung po/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sems kyi rgya mtsho ya mtha' yas pa rnam par 'dul bar byin gyis rlob ste/ de dag
134b6(1): la stsogs pa 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho'i re rer sangs 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i de'i tshe tshigs su bcud 'di dag sba so// rdul bra ba steng du shes
134b7(1): par bya'o// de ras byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yid sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya ro'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su baM sngun de'i phyir/ sangs
134b8(1): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par blta ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra so/ rgyal ba 'byung rnams sna tshogs kyis/ sgo nas zhing
135a1(1): rnams man+ta rArab tu 'byung de dag sems dngasapa pa ji ban maSh+Te/ sangas+yang+yas thabs
135a2(1): kyiskye mang rgya mtsho'o// sangs rgyas chos skabs kyis mi khyab ste/ mig yod ma yin ma na nyid med pa'i gzugs/ gzugs kyi khyab par 'gro ba'i
135a3(1): da sems cad bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston pa ltos/ sa che zung ba la la rnam par / lel bskal pa bsamams can gyis rnag
135a4(1): chos kyi sa ni phyogs rnams kun gyi ste/ rab tu 'dzegs par 'gro ba 'din bzhugs/ lal zhing rnams kyi pargyobs ma las ngas/ sbrang gi 'dus zlas dz+nyAms
135a5(1): cu kun na yod/ la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong ba mdzad / mon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul tshig go// la la bsam gyisa~M me khu 'i theg pa'i
135a6(1): sems can yang bzhin sangs rgyas sten par mdzad / phal theg pa cag kyang rab sa/ rgyal ba'i thabs gcig kya mtha' yas sa
135a7(1): yul byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ sems ca myed yang la ma la gzhog pa pa nga la la skad tsan rnas sems ca rnams/ rtsamatshobs ma ma
135a8(1): byang chub dul/ lalas saHla seMs pasam sa cas spel pa'i snga rnams rabatu lang / 'tsha
135b1(1): dag mngon bkang zhing thabs kyi sgonas sems can 'dul ba mdzad/ la lasas rgyas gsung gis kun bkang zhing / nying du sems
135b2(1): can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog/ bsam yas bska ga ya par de dag gsung sgrog cing sems cad rgya mtsho tha' yas rnam par 'dul/ la la zhing rgyan
135b3(1): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'khor rnams yang dag kun nas 'khor bcas de/ zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs kyang byas shing / sangs rgyas mkha'
135b4(1): la sbror ltar khyab pa bzhus/ de ltar sangs rgyas thabs mi khyab/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun du rgyus bkang zhing / 'gro ba kun la sangs
135b5(1): rgyas mngon gsum ste/ sna chos rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang nis kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskul ba'i byin gyi brlabs
135b6(1): kye byid brlabs kyi tshul shin du bstan pa ri/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du pra steng du shes par byas ste/ 'di lta ste zhing mtshol ni bskal ba grangs
135b7(1): med pa'o//  rgya rol la ni bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis rlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa bsam gas mi khyab par byin gyis
135b8(1): brlabs par/ zhing rgya tshol la ni bskul pa mtshungs maM par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal ba kun nas mtha' yas par byin
135b9(1): nga rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlangs/ 
136a1(1): gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa kun mu med byin gyi brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la
136a2(1): ni bskal ba gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de dag la sogs
136a3(1): pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mdo'i bskal pa'i bIr gyi brlabs kyi tshul shin du bstar pa brgya mtsho ri 'jig rdor gyi khams rgya ma ro'i rdul shing du pra bsnyed do// de nas
136a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'dzag rter gyi khams rgya tshimasal pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi tshul bzhin du bstar pa 'di 'ang yongasu bster pa'i phyir/ sangs
136a5(1): rgyas kyi byin gyi byiran gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rab bar bltas te/ de'i tshe rigs su bcang ba 'di gasdu so/ 'jig rten rgya mtsho bsal tha dad de/ snang
136a6(1): tshigs rdul 'jug na kyar mas smra ra/ byags bcu 'a rnams rgya mchi kun sngang bskal pa rdul na mtshangangs kyang med/ bsal bam
136a7(1): 'grob kun mam/ b+h+yo ba s+yA b+h+r-ings 'dzag rten mtshan 'dus na snang desal ba bcur yas me la rong pa zung/ ngasalang sa sa rnal ba
136a8(1): kyang smras so/ rgya mtsha'i bang rnams 'di dag grags dpangs sngo bye ba gyis bskal pa'ong dum rnyeng nga ldan/ lal gzhan rnams sbal btsug gis 'jug
136b1(1): la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung / bskal dri med la la nyon mongs can/ la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par dag bskal pa'i mngar sman
136b2(1): lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gis byud/ sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dang tshul la 'jug/ bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed sngan chad sdong sdud pas/ 'dzag rten
136b3(1): khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag / kun de grwa kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med/ 'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten brgya mtsho'i khams
136b4(1): bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen mig sna tshogs/ bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mge snang ba/ snang dang dri med bzang po bskal pa'i ming
136b5(1): la 'jug/ bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung / dri med bskal ba la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o// bskal ba la lang mi'i gtso bo mtha' yas 'byung / 
136b6(1): bskal po'i tshul rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes/ smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams
136b7(1): kyang bskul pa gcig tu 'dus/ bskal pa la lar gcig kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu/ bskal pa mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo ras 'jug/ phyogs bcu'i
136b8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nang nas sgra yang 'byin/ bskal pa la lar brdab bskal pa kun gyi rgyan kyang 'drung / mig rgyan rnams rnam par dgapa'ang de la yon
137a1(1): skal pa la lar sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu'i 'byung / bskal pa tshul rnams kun gyi 'di rgyan yangs yin/ zhing dang bskal
137a2(1): pargya mtsho tshul ri tsag dag/ zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang chang med gzhal du med/ skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs kyis bskal par 'gyur/ 'di dag thar
137a3(1): cang sems can 'du shes rnam par byung / kye rgyal po'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig rten gyi
137a4(1): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rteran gyi khams rgya mtsho ngag bskal pas 'jog cing 'du ba la rab tu 'jug
137a5(1): par rab tu gnas pa dang / 'jig nin gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang / 
137a6(1): 'di ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po bsags pa rnam par dag pa/ 'jig de nas gyi khams rgya mtsho
137a7(1): sman nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par gnas pa dang / 'di ltas byang chub sems dpa' na sangs pa snga tshogs kyis stong pa rnams skyebs/ 'jig rten gyis
137a8(1): rgyal chenam par ngas pa la dran mas na mangs par sas par bang 'das kyi semams kyim rgya chen po byang chu gyi sems la gangs pas/ 'am
137b1(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dong pas/ bskal pa brgyad
137b2(1): thadad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas/ bskal pa mtha' ma
137b3(1): pargyan shin tu mang po kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di ltar ste de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gis rgyar nub pa
137b4(1): 'gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyis rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste
137b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'bral pas 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa 'jog
137b6(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho'i mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya maro dang kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ri 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
137b7(1): tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho
137b8(1): 'odi nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnams par bltas nas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
138a1(1): zhing rnams rgya mtsho chos nad dug ltos/ chos kyis byung ste ji ltar/ de dag 'byung zhing 'jigs par 'gyur ba yang / 
138a2(1): rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang / sems can dbang pa don mongs ldan pa pa/ las non mongs de nipas sgribs pa rnams/ dedag thasams
138a3(1): rgya mtsho rnams kun nas nyan mongs ldan par gyur pa yin/ sems canan pa dag bsam pa ldan rnams dang / bsod nams ngan dang ma ngag spyod yul na can/ rnam pa
138a4(1): yul nyon mongs ldan 'gyur rnams de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i dus dag na bskal pa de ni rnam par dag
138a5(1): pa snang / sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang / de yi chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa me/ byang chub bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'brel sna/ de bzhin
138a6(1): bskal brgya mtsho mang po dag/ bsam gyis pa khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong / bye ba mang po bsam yas mi zad pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun tu
138a7(1): rgyan rnam par tha dang yod pa med/ skal bzangang tshul gyi bye brag snang / dul rnams re re'i skabs su ngas kun du sangs rgyas kyi nad kyi rdul dang rnam
138a8(1): rgyal sras ci tshul 'dong pa de bzhin du/ zhing rnams kyi mchi tshul dag par 'grel gal rgyal ba rnams ni skyes gyur na/ zhing rnams rkyer gyis na
138b1(1): tu tsun par 'gyur/ bsam pa yongs dag de bzhin rdzas 'gyur te/ 'di mi ga rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/ gal tergal ba ma ngan 'das rnas
138b2(1): de'i tsheng zhing rgyar rnams 'grib par 'gyur 'gyur/ sems can rnams kyang sdod du rung ba min/ zhing gi rgya mcho yang non mongs ldan/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
138b3(1): yangs pa dag / bsamagyis mo khyab gang tshe ston pa na/ de che zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag/ kun kyang rgyan gyis dbapar brgyan par 'gyur/ kye rgyal po'i sras
138b4(1): ngag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gyi khas pa rgya mtsho'i rdul shi na phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ de dag ri sangs rgyas bcom
138b5(1): ldan 'das 'das dang / ma byon pa dang / da lta byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo re gsung bar 'gyur ro/ de ni 'di
138b6(1): lte ste/ 'dzag rten gyi khas rgya mtsho TIg tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gyi 'jig rter gyi khams tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten
138b7(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas/ chos kyi
138b8(1): dbyings kyis phyogs rgyas par 'gyings pa tha ma mi dang pa dang pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ngag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gi
139a1(1): / dkyil khor dad pa dang pa dang / 'di ltar 'jig rter gyi khams rgyar ro dang/ gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od gyi dkyil 'khor
139a2(1): 'khor chos kyi dbyings 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprin dang / mtshan gyi 'khor lo ba mi dang / 'di lta ste/ 
139a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas par rjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi brlabs pami dad pa dang / 
139a4(1): 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyis 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig
139a5(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'dre ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'byam klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
139a6(1): kyis yul rgya chen po sten cing bcod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de dag la stsogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten
139a7(1): gyi khams kyi mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng du shes par bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'ang gi rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha me dngam pa'i tshul rgyu
139a8(1): mtsho shin tu bsan pa'i ngas la bar bsan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi phyir gyis brlabs kyis phyogs brgya rabang bltas ste/ de'i tshatshogs su bcang pa'i'adi ngag sdes so/ 
139b1(1): rdul cig sbeng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/ kun na rgyan mang brgyar rnam dag kun yod kyang / gnod pa med cing 'dra ba gang yang mer/ 'jug rter ba bsam gyis rma
139b2(1): khyab pa 'di la ltos/ rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs/ sems cacag kyis bsam pa yid bzhin du/ zhing rnams rgya b.ro thams cad
139b3(1): khyab byas kyang / de dag thams la tha dang gang yang med/ rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha'as pa/ sna tshogs rgyad pang dun nas zes sbyangs te/ phyogs
139b4(1): nam kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang / de dag za dang gyur pa rnam yang med rdul phran rgya tshot+pal phran re re la/ ro'i gtso bo 'tsho rnams kun skor cing / 'dzag rten
139b5(1): kur tu bkang ste 'phags zhugs kyang / gdong pa dag dang 'dre ba'i nyes pa med/ rdal gcig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho ldan
139b6(1): kur bkang zhing / bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub sbyong bstan kyang / rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang med/ rdul rnams kun la kha dos bsam mi khyab
139b7(1): sprul pa'i sbyiran gyis kur tu gang byas de/ sangs rgyas sprul bas sems can rnam 'dul 'dul yang / 'brims phyogs mtha dang gang yang med/ rdul rnams kur la rgya mtsho'i
139b8(1): chos brjod de/ de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing / thabs dang mthu'i sgo mangs tshogs kyis thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dang med/ rdul gcig la ni rgyal
140a1(1): rgyal ba kun gyis gsung / 'gro ba sdong du gyur la de dag brngo byas te/ rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal bar byed brlabs
140a2(1): kyang / de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dang / zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha'i yas rgyan gyis rnams/ thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab 'ju
140a3(1): rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthul ltos/ las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa mi/ rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar 'byung ba de
140a4(1): dag thams cad snang/ de dag gshegs ras byon pa gang yang med/ 'gro bkunan sangs rgyas rnam par 'bral/ in rgyas pa chen po'i mngal
140a5(1): sangs rgyas pa la po che zhes pa las/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs zhes bya ba ste/ 
140a6(1): le'u bzhi pa'o// 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin du rgyas pa'i mdol/ bam po brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de
140a7(1): la'ag rten gyi khas rgya mdzub zhi dang / snying pa mi dog gi d+hAr gyis brgyar pa'ad-i/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par da bang sngun sna
140a8(1): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bskal ba rgya mtsho rdul shin du zab stong kyis yongs su das par byas ni bsal bar zhing yang de bzhin ga shigs pa
140b1(1): 'dzag tu khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du pra srid kyi zhabs drung du smon lam rgya mtsho 'dzag der gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shing phra ba skyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so// 
140b2(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'dza gaur gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / snying po med rdog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de ni rlung gi dkyil lo 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shir tu phra ba snyed kyis
140b3(1): shin tu bzung ste/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma'i bzhi kun ras rdog pa zhes bya ba ste/ ring po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa
140b4(1): bzhis rngod do// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyar 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi
140b5(1): bzhis rngon do/ de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thus zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhes rton do/ de'i steng ra/ rlung gi dkyil
140b6(1): 'khor 'od 'gro ba mnyam par ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo gzhis rngod to/ de'i steng na rlung gyi dkyil 'khor rgyan
140b7(1): kun nas rnam par zos pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'od zer gyi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor me dog gzhis don to// de'i sden rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi kun nas ji ma med
140b8(1): cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ med dog thams cad 'od 'gro ba'i seng ge'i khri'i gzhis don to/ de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su s+tha sgrog cing kun
141a1(1): dum+b+ha ba zhes bya ba mngaHmu ga dang / ma zhal margyal mngan sna chags kyi bzhes gnan/ dam
141a2(1): drug la 'khor ringan po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes med de/ nor bu'i rgyal tho' shing dang / me ga sna tshogs kyi slong gi gzhes rnon / de'i seng na nang gis
141a3(1): kho kun nas 'dzin pa'i thugs shes bya ba yod de/ sras kyi nor ba thams cad kyi spang gyi gzhis smin to// de'i steng mang gi dkyil 'khor gi kun ts+tsha banas
141a4(1): yang ba ba mangs 'ad btsugs pa dums pa nabral ba sas nga sa kyim son
141a5(1): du thams da/ ngan pal pa ma po rnying ba zhes bya na/ nang bub nas snang pa'i rkyen dang kyis rgyam
141a6(1): gnas don to// sras kyi chu rgya che mtsho'i ror du kun ras snang ba'i gzhis rgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pad+mo'i sbyin gyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang / 
141a7(1): sna tshogs zhes bya ma ngan par byung ste/ pang ma chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams ma bzhi dang / snang po mdzeg kyi can pa kun nas zla bzhin 'ag pa/ 
141a8(1): rnape pa na thas na bde jis/ rangasathams ca sa la ba mun kyi ra ba masas gnas pa gas pa ji'i chung rgya mchis par
141b1(1): ba 'di 'dug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bzhi dang / snying po me dog gi rgyar gyis brgyad pa'ang
141b2(1): nyid kyi/ yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid 'arjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis/ phyogs bcu rnam par bltas te/ de'i
141b3(1): tshigs su bcad pa'i nga dag smras so// gzhi rgyan me tog 'jig der khams kyi rgya mcho de/ rin chen kur gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs de/ rdul rnams
141b4(1): dkun dang mnyam pa'i sngan chad sangs rgyas kyi/ drung du sngon che rgya mtshor spangs pas dri ma med/ rgya cher snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang
141b5(1): zhing zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun bad nas/ sngon gyi bskul pa rgya mtshor spyod pa sbyang bsren/ 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams
141b6(1): de yangs shing rnam par dag sangs rgyas rnam par snang ba'i smon lam che mdzad de/ 'ong snang ba dang ba nam mkho'i dkyil na gnas pa ni/ rlung gi gi drang
141b7(1): nges bdab kyang mi bskyod mi g.yo ste/ nor bu kun gyin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan sngar snying po'o// me dog mdzad pa kye gtor ba rin chen yang 'ong zhe ni/ sngad
141b8(1): gyi smon lam dbang gyi nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ rgya mtsho'i rgyan ra rnams thams cad sna tshogs gdang par gnas/ phyogs dang phyogs chams kun tu 'od kyi
142a1(1): sbyin yang gtong / nor buthams cad sgo nas byung chuHsems dpa' rnams/ byung zhing 'od zer stan
142a2(1): phyogs rnams kun tu 'dod/ 'od zer me toge tshon dang 'od gzer 'khor lo'i phyogs/ tshogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed
142a3(1): rin chen kun gyi 'di bar slod rnams kyang ni/ grags dang bregs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed/ sdug bsngal thams cing bkyil zhing byang chub sems
142a4(1): lang med/ 'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'gro rab tu 'bar/ 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sde tshogs rnams/ rin chen kun dang sprul
142a5(1): rnams kyi rgyal bas 'gyur/ brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor lo bsgyur 'dra dang / 'gro kun gyi lus lus rnams kun kyang gnas/ sprul pas 'ab rgya chos
142a6(1): kyi dbyings kyi mtshad mnyam pa/ 'od zer sgonas sangs rgyasu rnams cad ma chad kyang skan/ 'gro ngam las kun gyi bsam pa tsham byas ngas/ tshul rnams
142a7(1): sa sonas sems sa rnams par 'gyus/ 'ang garten mdze ma dag snying po denang na/ rdul phung kAr gyi/ khengs na chos dbyings thams cad

142b1(1): snag sngal sa la byas te/ smon lapa yangs pa'i sbyin ni chos kyis dbyings many+dzu pa dang / bzang po'i spyod pa bskyes shing ye shes ldang pa rma
142b2(1): dgas pa las 'dzes de dag byung ba yin/ shin tu rgyas po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas pal po'i tshe zhes bya ba las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dade/ snang
142b3(1): po me dog gi rgyur gyi rgyan pa'i yid rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ste// le'u ste lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'jig rte
142b4(1): khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / sring po me tog gi rgyar gyis brgyan po'i 'khor yug chen por/ nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo nyi ma'i gzho la rten pa ste/ nor bu'i rigs rgya
142b5(1): spos kyis can dan thams cad las grub pa nor bu'i rgyal po rgyar gyi yul thams cad kyis lhun shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnod pa/ nor bu'i spos dri bzhim po
142b6(1): gze rdzing gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i snying po car nor bu'i rgyal rigs 'argyal po do rdo sra zhing / zhing shegs pa ltar shin tu khregs shing za sra ba/ rin po che'i chu
142b7(1): thams cad dbyang su 'byung ba/ rid pa ba ga rnapas tshul gyis na rnams cad me pa rgyas pa sdus rgyun mchag bzang bas thams pad skye brgyams
142b8(1): me dag dpal na ni du bi mang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal ba 'dzag rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs la bu'idabs kung nas bris pa ste/ de dag la
143a1(1): brgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'dzag rter gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu bsnyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// de nas byang
143a2(1): chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang khor yug rgyal po yon ngan yongs su dag pa 'di nod bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi skabs kyis
143a3(1): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// 'jig der khams rgya mtsho gang yod pa/ mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnams
143a4(1): ba can/ nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdog/ de dag sangs rgyas rnams par 'phrul bas byung / dri med 'khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/ 
143a5(1): nor du mang po de bzhin spos mang dang / mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas/ kha dog mtha' yas rin cen rnams kyis brten/ stong pa nor bu'i sprin
143a6(1): can sna tshogs pa/ 'jam bu'i cha klung 'od 'gro snying pa'i tshogs/ 'od zengam pa phyogs su snang zhing tsher/ 'khor yug ji ma med par rnam par mdzes ro
143a7(1): rje 'dres byas she rdzas 'a ba na/ mjams rnams pa byed na dbus chogs 'phrul/ mer ldan bu'i rin che pa bkod pa/ rgyan dmas pa
143b1(1): dri zhim rnams dang ldan/ sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan/ nor bzangs kun gyis kun sa gzi brji 'bar/ 'od zer sprin g+haM 'od kyis
143b2(1): la 'khor can/ gos kyi tshor gyis shing du 'bar bar gnas/ spos kyis kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa gdugs 'chang ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' mang bas
143b3(1): chos dbyings gang / sgra dbyangs mang po mtsho thams cad 'byin/ 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo/ rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cang dang /
