143b7(1): zhing rnams rna rgya mtsho yos su dag byas pa/ de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing zag/ de shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mi'o// sangs rgyas
143b8(1): bal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khor yug gi ma rgya mtsho'i 'khor yug shin du bsten pa zhes bya ba ste/ 
144a1(1): / le'u drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'khor yug chen po de'i nang gi khams rgya mtsho'i sa
144a2(1): chen po'i bzhi nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyand pa/ rdo rje ltar shAn su la blanan pa/ ring po che'i rigs thams cad las grub pa/ rgya mtshom
144a3(1): par phye ba'i mi shogs snying po can pa mi mtho mi dpa' ba'i thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa/ ror bu rin po che thams cad kyis kha dog dang 'od rnams
144a4(1): kyis rab tu brgyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyis kyi dbying lta bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyi rab tu bsgrub pa/ ring po che tshon thams cad kyi rgyun kyis brgyan
144a5(1): pa/ ri po na che yid du 'ong ba'i badro thams cad bzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad dus mo tshogs gyur pa'i sten gyis kun sa g.yogs pa/ 
144a6(1): bu'i rgyal po spos kyis mdod thams cad kyis gzhi mnyam par bang la ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyur gyi sgrar
144a7(1): da ba rnams par bris pa/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'ong dang / nor bu'i dza mas 'phrul lta dus rnam par bye ba ste/ kyai rgyal
144a8(1): sras ngag de dag 'a stsogs pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyang shin du bstad pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba sted do// de nas byang chub
144b1(1): sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyar rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
144b2(1): brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnya/ 
144b3(1): 'khor lo'i dra ba'i bsgrubs pa mi shigs sra/ rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i glanas shing / rir sna tshogs kun du gang / yid 'ongs ni rdo rje bser
144b4(1): g+he gzhi/ rin chen chu'i ri bo'i 'khor los sgrubs/ bad+mo kyil 'khor gzhi yin me togs/ can phye ma rin ren kun tu bkram/ 'od zer sna tshogs
144b5(1): rin chen me tog rnams/ 'di 'phro 'gyed pas phyogasu skyon yang 'bar/ sangs rgyas 'od snang ror bu rnam par bkra / sa kun me dog yod du 'ong ba
144b6(1): g.yogs/ thams cad sprin ni phyogs na sdug lding bas/ mi zad yangs pa'i kun ras khyebs par 'dug/ zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun
144b7(1): zhing / sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu sgrog/ rin cen nas snang sangs rgyas smor lam kur/ shin tu dus ring rtag tu ster/ snga na chang sprod pa ci'ang
144b8(1): spyod pa dag/ kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snad/ de'i rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs gting/ de'i nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul bsnad/ sangs rgyas
145a1(1): spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams/ rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang / me tog snying ban kyi 'khor los bsgrubs der ri bya
145a2(1): chub sems dpa' dag 'dod zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i sgom lam kun kyang sgeg/ skang po byang rlob 'khor du ma 'bru'o/ rim can 'od zer 'ang dang ldan das/ 
145a3(1): sa yen brgyan las rab tu 'byung / sangs rgyas ches nyid 'di ying dag tu sten/ tshes dbyangs dam mkha' lta ba kun tu 'grengs/ sangs rgyas grar yul ye shes
145a4(1): chen dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa/ de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun du yang / zhi rnams rnam rgya mcho dbyings kyi 'phrul pa 'dur
145a5(1): shin tu rgyas po chen po'i mdor/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa'i rgyan shin tu sman pa zhes bya ba ste/ 
145a6(1): le'u bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dang de 'phrul pa 'jug/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdzel/ ngasangs rgyas de 'jig rten gyi khams rgya'am
145a7(1): zhi'i san pa lA 'khe la/ skyes rgyu rgya mchos sems kyis gang padzang du meng pa rdul can tu za ba da yod du/ dngag ldan kyang san ri pa rnamam
145a8(1): kyang gyi rgyan pa'o// rin bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis zang rab tu nor dro'i rgyal ba bzang zhing mang 'od par snang ba'i rabs kun nas bres pam
145b1(1): rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / mdog tu sdang ba'i spos kyis chus yongs su rgyas pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyis me tog sna tshogs klong du 'khyil bal
145b2(1): can dan gyis bye ma dang 'dres pa'o/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang / smon lam rgyal mtsho'i sgra byin pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od
145b3(1): zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sder rnam par snang ba'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin med tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bur rab tu 'gyed pa'o// kha ngas pa
145b4(1): dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad
145b5(1): snang ba'o// phyogs kun nas rin po'i them smras kyi phreng ba bcu rab tu kye'o// mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po
145b6(1): tshe shel gyis kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o// 'di lta ste nor bu dang / mu tig kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye
145b7(1): ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste nor bu thams cad kyi pad+ma yid dri 'ong pa'i grong khyer bri ba khrag khrig rgya stong bcas mdun nas bskor ba
145b8(1): 'di lta ste ror bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rab tu sgrubs pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog bu ri ka dang / 
146a1(1): spos kyis rus yongs su rgyas bkun nas bskor ba'o/ 'di lta ste rin po che'i shing gis phra ba'i rin po che 'bar ba zhing kun nas 'byung
146a2(1): ba'i nor bu drab can dang / gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul shin du phra ba snyed kyis kun ras bskor pa'o// can dang dang / spos dang / nor bu mang po sgra thams cad
146a3(1): dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa/ gang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o// 'di lnga ste rin po che dang / 
146a4(1): gos dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu mang po thams mang pos thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin du rgyas pa'o// rin po che ying du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi
146a5(1): rang ba ma dzas pamanang pa nga myed pas sanas bkar bar/ denas drang chub sems da rnam ngas/ yang smras nargya rgyan 'dungs su
146a6(1): ba'i byor/ sangs rgyas kyis byir gyis phyogs bcur dam par bltas so/ sa sangs der spros kyi chu bo'i rgya mtsho dor bris brgyan pa rnams brjod/ gzhi rnams
146a7(1): ri chen mam rnas pas 'ang dong ba/ mA~M gas dadi la dus sa da mangs/ spras da ra ba'i rgyal po mang po dang / ma'i ring bu 'bri ste m+b+ha dang / dang pa
146a8(1): 'bring ba'ang ma gzhirnams meng yang du smras kyi chums mal kyi ma tho sa zang / 
146b1(1): rab tu gdong ba'i dbyangs kyis kyang / sangs rgyas rnams par phul par du sgrog/ zem skas phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan/ gzhi ni rir chen nor bum pos brgyar
146b2(1): stegs bu kun bkon ri re chen pad+mo'i/ spror sdug dra ba rnams par bres pa ste/ rir chen nor bu'i phreng ba dag/ rin chen gser gi yid 'od 'bar/ 'od kyi
146b3(1): tshes dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang / rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs su rab tu ra smros/ spos nus yongs gang rin cher sgrubs pa ste/ me dog pun+d+ha ra~Mkakur ras bskur
146b4(1): spos dang 'od dang bdug spos 'od bzer bkye/ de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs/ rir rer rgyal ma rin mu dag 'bar ba can/ gos dang nor bu sna
146b5(1): tshogs kun 'chang zhing / rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba can/ thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ bad+ma'i grong khyer rnams kyis kyis kun nas
146b6(1): nas bskor/ kha dog mtha' yas ror bu'i rnam par brgyan/ phyogs rnams kun ras mu dag sprin bkyis po'i/ grong khyer rgya mtsho de dag rab tu brgyan
146b7(1): dri ba bzang pos kun ras bskor ba ste/ rir cher byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyim kha gyi rnapas/ rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i/ rgya chos
146b8(1): bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyad/ sngon chang rnam par snang mdzad kyis mdzad pa/ sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yos sbyangs pa/ shin tu rgya che maH
147a1(1): ngang dbus med pa'ang/ de dag kunan rnam par 'phrul pabyed/ smyos chu'i rgya tshong dgu re re tsA yang skyes dus kyang dag
147a2(1): phyogs su 'khor bzhing 'bab pa/ gling bzhi'i 'dzag der gyi khams rdul shin tu prA ba snang gyis 'khor byas pa ste/ spos ru'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang
147a3(1): 'khor kun ras rdo rje'i pad+ma kha dog dang dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o/ nor bu'i 'khor lo dang / nor bu'i 'ang rnam par dag pa sna tshigs kyi mtha' kun nas
147a4(1): dkrigs pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khon rin po che thams cad kyi 'a dog lta bus rnam par sla byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// 
147a5(1): sems can thams cad kyis sku dbyangs sgrogs pa'i dril bu'i rnon po thams cad kyi khangos du 'jug pas kur ras khebs pa'o/ spong pa'i 'od kyi slong
147a6(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mar gyi dbyings lci bu rab tu 'byung ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyud thangs cang dad snang na 'od shid du 'bar ba dzag/ rjer rgyal
147a7(1): mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad shin tu ga yogs par byas pa'o/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis sbrul rnams par sdang ba dang / sangs
147a8(1): rgyas thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i me tog shin du rgyas pas kun nas khebs par/ dus gsum du ga shesas pa'i sangs rgyal dang byang chub sa
147b1(1): sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'o/ spos kyi chu dang rin po chen 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu byung ste/ chu klung
147b2(1): ngag re re zhing yang rgyar shin tu bstar nga 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shi du phra ba snyed de/ de ras byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos yang
147b3(1): spos chu'i rwa klur gyi rgyad dang yor dar rgyu ro 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs
147b4(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras// chu klung dri ma med pas chus rgyas shing / gzhi ni ror bu rdo rje pang mas byas/ rin re mang pos sil bus gzhi bkram zhing / 
147b5(1): nas brgyad pa'i snga rigs yod du 'ong/ them skas phreng bas de dag kun ras bskor/ pad+ma 'phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor can te/ me tog rgyan pa'i bu rig 'phreng
147b6(1): ba dang / me dog lnga ldi sna tshogs kun bres/ nor bu chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni/ rir ce kur gyi kha dog ltar 'bab pa/ rin cen ror bu me dog mdzes par bkod/ 
147b7(1): sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsungaskang brjod/ de dag rnye de na nir bu zla ba ste/ ron chen sna tshogs thams cad rba klo / phyogs bla cu'i des kun tu dag par yang
147b8(1): spos dang 'dreg 'od 'byung ngo / chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad gyis/ 'od zer 'phro ba kun du rab tu 'byung / me dog nor bu'i phung po'i gdugs rnams kyang
148a1(1): de cir 'dra kyis 'od zer rab tu'abar/ phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs pardar mang po dang / sangs rgyas gzugs brnya
148a2(1): rin chen rnams las sdang / rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi den yong 'ang las/ spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab/ rin re chen gser gi dril bung ba yin
148a3(1): g.yogs cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab/ rgyal po kun gyis byang chub spyod pa dang / kun du bzang po'i sbyong mchog rab tu 'jud/ sangs rgyas smon
148a4(1): lam snang byangs rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag na ma ga rer ba nga da rje sa kAr ras/ sgra rnams stegs pa kun na rab du sdang / 
148a5(1): be thams cad klong dag las kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon cen 'bar ba da / chos kyis dbyings rab tu rgyas byed pa/ 'byam gyis phyogs rnams
148a6(1): na rab tu snang / chu klung de dag thams cad dri meng cing nor bu'i rgyal po sgron gyi kun khyab pa/ mdzod bu'i phal dang sangs rgyas gzo brjir 'bar/ nor du
148a7(1): rdul po sangs rgyas brdzogs sngar snang / spos chu'i chu klung de dag par dag kyang sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab du rgyan pa ste/ rlu
148a8(1): gaM bar de dag ro rang na ma rin gi tshi me tog banar ka'i thong ba/ slong bzhi pa'i 'jig da gyi khams kyi bral shin du sra ba bskyed kyis kun nas bskor po'i
148b1(1): chu klung gi bar de dag re rer zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng gling zhi ba'i 'jig rter gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba'o// shing gi gseb zam
148b2(1): cad nas kyang rgyan gyi sprir dag/ par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprid dang / 'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // 
148b3(1): shing gi bar dag thams cad kyang 'od shin du'i'abar ba ste/ spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smor
148b4(1): lam bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o// spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang ba byed pa'i
148b5(1): sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o// spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyad bsam gis mi khyab pa'i kha dog
148b6(1): yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang pa'o/ gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs sbyor lta bus mngon par g.yogs pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu
148b7(1): 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis rdo g.yegs par byed par rnam par rgyas pa'o/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ban
148b8(1): nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyis las rnams par smin pa rgya che'i gzugs brnyad shin tu sten pas rgyas pa ste/ de dag la stsogs pa'i chu klung gi par de dag
149a1(1): re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ de ras byang chub sems dpa' kun
149a2(1): tu bzang po'i yang spos chu klu dag par gyis rgyas yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho'i 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur
149a3(1): rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras/ chu klung ba rnams shin tu rnam par dag/ rid cer rgyan can gser gis rnam par bris// yal ga me tog
149a4(1): sprin rnams 'chang ldang ba'i/ shing gi phreng ba'i kun nas mngon par khyab/ shing gis yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgro ga nas/ rin cher mang po'i sprin rnams
149a5(1): kun kyang 'byung // me tog 'od mang ri cer snying po can/ phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed/ gzhi rnams nor bu'i mngon par bkram pa ste// me tog rnams
149a6(1): zas rin pon 'bru dang ldan/ kun nas rin cher sbyin gyis khyab pa ste/ rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang / sangs rgyas kyis nor bu'i rgyal po sas
149a7(1): sa rnams thams cad kun nas rnam par gang/ phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing sdang ba'i sngon/ rdul phra kun 'azugs brgyan gyur par snang / nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin
149a8(1): rnam par rgyas/ mu ga gsal ba'i drabs rnam par bye/ nor bu'i 'khor lo'i kun nas rab tu bsod/ kur nas rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang // 'jam klas/ 
149b1(1): 'ong zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis/ sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye bkuran na sdang / sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing // stobs bcu
149b2(1): mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog/ rin cher sna tsho ske bun+d+ha ri ka yis/ chu rnams kur rgyas snying po nor bu spos/ de las mi dad 'od zer rgya mtsho
149b3(1): rnams/ rab tu 'byung ba'i ba ma sna tshogs 'byung / dus rnams gsum po'i rgyar rnams thams cad kyang / nor bu de dag 'bru'i nang na ste/ 'byung
149b4(1): ba med cing gzung du'ang yong ma yin/ de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'brul pa'i mthu/ rgyal ba rnam par mdzad thams cad du// rgyan dang sprul pa tha~Mng
149b5(1): rab tu 'gyed/ sngan chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis/ de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba dang / rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang // 
149b6(1): rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod de/ rang gi zhing dang lus bstan sa yi rnams/ bsim pa rnams dge tshul bzhin de dag mthong // kye rgyal
149b7(1): ba'i sras ngas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyar shin du bstan pa ri bas ma g+has mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
149b8(1): ngag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang snying po me tog gis rgyar gyis brgyan 'ang dmigs pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang
150a1(1): @rgyang can du bsan pargyamadzan 'jig da gyi lams rgya mtsho'i rdum gas tha ba snyed du shes par rgyam dengs byang chub sems
150a2(1): dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing yod dang mtha' dang dbus med pas yon dar rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa'i
150a3(1): mtsho 'di nyi yongs su bstan pa'i rgya mtsho nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byid gyi brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bsdus te/ de'i tshe chags
150a4(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang / rin chen 'od zer rnab par gnas pa ste/ sdug cing gsal ba'i sprir kyis kun ras g.yo
150a5(1): ri can thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'ang/ mu ga nor bu'i stan mang zang po zhes sangs rgyas gzugs bcur phyogs su dam par snang naden med pa'i na
150a6(1): par 'phrul pa rnams/ byang chub sems dpa gi tu stong par byed/ sangs rgyas gsung bus ma myos mi khrang saM/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sdug/ 
150a7(1): rnam par snang mdzang sngon gyi spyod pa rnams/ ri chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing zag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'ang/ can rnams thams ca
150a8(1): nang na snang / 'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang / sprul pa rnams kyis zhing kyi rgya mtsho gang / sangs rgyas sprul pa rnapas ri snya ma 'am/ 
150b1(1): de dag la ri byed pa gang yang med/ sangs rgyas yul rnams byir gyis brlabs pa yi/ zhing rnams kun ra sangs rgyas rnams rnam par 'phrul/ zhing rnams
150b2(1): 'bya bkris par ni rnam par 'phrul zhing/ ji snyed zhing du de dag kur rgyu ba/ de dag nor bu kur la rab tu sdang / de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho pa par rnam par
150b3(1): spangs/ sprul pa rnams ri rig g.yor 'dra ba dang / thams cad dag na chos nyid yang sdang / 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul te/ smon lam rnam par
150b4(1): 'phrul las bog bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams 'byung gyur pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgyas mchi nan/ de dag dul phran kun la rang rang gis
150b5(1): rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zhab 'bring du/ bskal pa bye brgyad tshebs pa yas su/ de dag spyod yul thams cad mthong
150b6(1): bas ra/ skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston/ zhing rnams mnyam med pa ste/ de dag mkha' 'ang mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med/ smon lam stobs
150b7(1): kyis kun du gnas pa ste/ sems cad rnams la bar phyir rab tu spangs/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'dzag rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin du snyan pa gang zhen
150b8(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'jig rten gyi khams spos chu'i rgya mapo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med med pa bcu'i rdul shinaHphra ba snyed pa de dag la 'jig rten gyi khas pa
151a1(1): gyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du bang ba'i rdul shang bya ba snyed du gnas te/ 'jig der gyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'dzag der
151a2(1): gyi khams 'byab klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shi du phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/ 'dzag rdon gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam
151a3(1): klas pa de dag thams cad kyang / gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan 'dug pa/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la ba lnga ba/ rnam pa gan
151a4(1): dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyad gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'grengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'dra ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang
151a5(1): gzhan du mi 'dzes pa/ rnam par bral pa dang / byir gyi blarlas gzhan dang gzhan yang bdag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam
151a6(1): mas pa la lan pad+ma'i rtswa mtshal rab tu gnas so// 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsha 'byam klas pa la lan/ ring po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me dag rgya mtsho la rab
151a7(1): gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ ring po che'i 'grong ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la rnam par gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
151a8(1): 'byam klas pa la la ni spos chu'i rgya mtshal rab tu gnas so/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bya ba klas la la ni me dag thams cad kyi rgya mtshal rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten
151b1(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya ma rol du gnas so// 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas
151b2(1): pa lA lu ri 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho klong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab du gnas so/ 'dzag rten gyi khams mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ byang chub ser
151b3(1): dpa'i nor bu'i con par sna chos kyis rkyen la rab tu gnas si/ 'jig rter gyi khams rgya tshe 'byam kris pa la la ri/ sems can lus sna tshogs
151b4(1): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig nor gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas
151b5(1): so// de dag la stsogs pa 'dzag rder gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa'i gnas shin du bsten pa ni/ 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin du phra ba bsnyed
151b6(1): 'jig rter gyi khams rgyas mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dus pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ rir
151b7(1): gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o/ 'dzag rter gyi khams rgya ma ro 'byam klas pa la la ni/ kur
151b8(1): du 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig der gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/ kun ras 'khyil ba'i dbyings lta bu'o// 'jig der gyi khams 'byam klas pa
152a1(1): pal la re 'kho lo'i dbyings la du'o// 'dzag den gyis khams 'byamaklas pa la la ni/ ngang ga mangs ris kyi sa
152a2(1): lta bu'o// 'dzag rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/ shing gi dbyangs lta bu'o// 'dzag rter gyis khams 'bya ba klas pa la la re/ khang pa brtsegs
152a3(1): pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ 'dzag rten gyi khams 'byab klas la la ni/ rdo rje rgyal mar gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'dzag rten gyi 'byam mas pa la la na
152a4(1): phyogs 'byams klas pa'i dbyibs la bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum zas pa la la ni/ khang po dbyibs lta bum/ 'jig rter gyi khams 'byams cas
152a5(1): bal la ro pad+ma'ang babs lta bu'o// 'jig der gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ babs kyi dbyings lnga bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa lal na
152a6(1): sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lnga du'o/ 'jig rded gyi khams 'byams klas pa la lan/ sngon gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'dzag rten gyi khams 'byams rdzas
152a7(1): pa la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyis mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rter gyi khams 'byams klas ba la la raM/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ga dbyings lta bu
152a8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ nga ba sna tshogs bkye ba'i dbubs la bu'o// 'ang gi rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ne/ sra
152b1(1): kun ra yod pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'dzag der gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de
152b2(1): ngag la stsogs pa 'jig rder gyi khams 'byams klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shin tu bstar ba'i 'dzag rter gyi khams kyi rdul shor du bsnyed ngo // kye rgyal ba'i
152b3(1): sras dag pa'i 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho'i chus de dag ni/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan gdar bstar pa ste/ 'jig rder gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ phyogs
152b4(1): thams cad kyi nor bu'i sprin kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ 'od lhan can no/ 'dzag rded kyi khams kyi rul la la ni/ ri po che
152b5(1): dang spros 'od bro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me rdog kha sbyong las sgrubs pa'i ldan no// 'dzag
152b6(1): rder gi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis gzugs brnyan gyi lhan can no// 'jig rter gyi rdo khams gyi tshul la ro/ sangs rgyas
152b7(1): gyi 'od kyi lhur can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la ni/ rin po che 'od kyi lhun can ro/ 'dzag der gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyis la
152b8(1): dog gi lhun cen ro// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi lhur car ro/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rul la la ni/ sems can
153a1(1): thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sku'i lhur car ro// 'jig rter gyi khams kyi tshul la lan
153a2(1): sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i lhun can no// 'dzag rten gyi khams kyi mtshul la lan/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyong ba'i
153a3(1): dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhan can no/ 'dzag rter gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra'i
153a4(1): ldan macan/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i lhun can no/ 'dzag rder gyi khams kyi tshul la la na
153a5(1): zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i ltar can no// 'jig rter g+hi rgyal la la ni/ sangs rgyas kur gsung dang dbyibs mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhar ma
153a6(1): 'dzag rter gyi khams kyi tshul la lam/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra'i lhan bar ro/ 'jig rjed gyi khams kyi rdul la la ni/ sems ca
153a7(1): kye dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra'i lta ma la shi na mas sa kyi rdul la 'ja surgyas thams ca ma da ma sangs snang ba pa
153a8(1): me rgyal mas gang dag la sugs pa 'angagi rten gyi khams kyi chung 'i byam khas pa'i tshul byas las na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mche'i dum yin na
153b1(1): ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang pos yang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i cha gyis lus rnam par
153b2(1): 'khod pa shin tu bstan 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas ste/ de'i
153b3(1): tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu bstan par grub// dri med bral 'od 'gyed snying po can// nor bu pad+ma rgya mtsho kun la gnas// lal
153b4(1): gang ga 'i rgya mtsho dag las gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyi bzhi gnas shing / dbyabs kyang sna tshogs gzugs kyang mang / ririb grong khyer shing kyi dkyil
153b5(1): 'khor dang // zhang rgyang thams cad la la phyogs kun blta// la la 'od lus med tog snying po can// nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu// la la rgyud gsal/ 
153b6(1): mu dag 'os zer las// nor bus gzhi nas kun kyang mi shigs sa// 'byam klas la la kha dog gya skal// 'od 'dra 'ong 'phro mar me sbar gyi mdog/ la la'i rgyud
153b7(1): ri sgra dang skad mi lus// de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas byung // la la sa'i rgyud ni slob lam sgra'i lus/ sprod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi sgra'i lus
153b8(1): la la bsod nams yongs dang las kyi sgra// la la yi lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sgra/ zhang gi rgyud rnams rlung mtshe bas ma yas pa// kun nas mi zad dri mas
154a1(1): bya/ sgo nas 'jug/ rnam 'phrul yangs pa mi zad na rgyar gyi rnams/ chang med kur gyis phyogs kur byas par 'gengs// 
154a2(1): phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te/ yangs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud bzhugs pa/ phyogs bcu kur 'du bar snang ba yang / 'gro ba med cing 'jug
154a3(1): ba yod pa min/ tshul gcig gis ri rgyud rnams kun kyang 'gengs/ thams cad ma lus ri rer rab du 'dra/ de la tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te/ gzhi med kun 'gengs
154a4(1): mtha' dang dbus yang med/ zhing rnams tshul gyi rgyung la rnams 'phrul pa/ sangs rgyas rnams par snga mdzad kun ras snang / spor lam sgra ni rgyamatsho rab brjod cing
154a5(1): zhing gi dbyings na sems can kun kyang 'dul/ zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang / bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpas gang / sangs rgyas
154a6(1): rnam 'phrul mi mnyam ston cig/ sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/ shar du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas pal po che zhes
154a7(1): bya ba las/ ning gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bstan pa ste/ le'u brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po
154a8(1): ming/ bam po dgu pa 'o/ kyirgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'ji garten gyi rgya mcha gang chen mtsha tshungs den/ spos chu'i mchi 'phrul gyi ram pa
154b1(1): rnam par phye ba'i gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i dul shin du phra bsnyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la gang chen mche
154b2(1): dbyings kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi nang na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma gze ba yid du 'ong zhing
154b3(1): 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste/ de'i rang ras nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshar gyi
154b4(1): bad mchen po gzhi spos dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad gyis rgyas rgyan can zhes bya ba mngor par 'byung ste/ de la 'jog rter gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs
154b5(1): kun nas rin po che 'bar pa'i 'od rnam par snang pa zhes bya ba 'dzag rter gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu zab bskyed b+huskor ba dmig
154b6(1): pa thams cad kyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lha ni rab tu gnas te/ de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma naM/ dpal+la ra snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ 
154b7(1): de ni rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan dang / 'od kyi 'khor los sa mtshams nor bu rin po che ze ba mang po la rab du gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang / rin po che
154b8(1): me dog gi rgyar thams cad kyis rab tu g.yogs par gyur pa ste/ 'dzag rten gyi srungs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du za ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ 'jig rten
155a1(1): gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas/ rgyar gzhan dang gzhan dag ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa tshul nam
155a2(1): par dag cing / dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das par 'jig rter gyi
155a3(1): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed par/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos snang chos kyi pad+ma dpal gyi rgyar ces bya ba rgyan thams cad gyi rathams cad ri po che'i
155a4(1): pad+ma'i shin du mang ba la rab tu gnas pa seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig 'bru 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla bre'i sprin gyis kun ras g.yogs
155a5(1): kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyis rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis 'khor kyis bskor ba yod do// de na de bzhin
155a6(1): gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nang khams 'das par/ 'jig
155a7(1): rten gyi khams rin pa chemams cad kyi can kun du snang ba zhes b+hA basmos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khongs mtshams ca/ ri ba che'i me dog gi phreng bsna chags la rab tu
155a8(1): gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor lo'i gzi brjing bzang po'i tsa ma'i sbor gyis kun ngas g.yogs par yan lag brgyad du dpa' pa'i dbyibs can/ 'jig rten gyi khams
155b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyi bskor ba rnams par dag tsang kur ras nyor mongs pa yod de/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa 'od jim
155b2(1): med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'dzag der gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi shin tu phra ba steng 'das pa na/ 'dzag rter kham
155b3(1): 'od gzer sna tshogs kyi yod du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis mnyams can kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje grag+ha rgya mtsho la rab tu
155b4(1): gnas pa/ rin po che pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bu 'dug pa/ rdo rje 'od zer dang dang / rin po che 'bar ba ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i/ 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyu
155b5(1): mtsho'i sprin gis kur sa nas g.yog pa cig tu dag pa/ 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul phra ba snyed gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de
155b6(1): bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yis pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/ de'i steng 'dzag rten gyi khams
155b7(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra snyed 'das par/ 'jig rter gyi khams 'di shin tu kye ba'i me dog gsil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ rin po che thams cad jig
155b8(1): bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis mtshams cam/ shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i ring po che'i 'khor lo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa phyogs thams cad nas srab
156a1(1): du ma'i dbyi'is su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i dbyibs su sgrog pas kun ras g.yogs pa/ kun nas rmongs na
156a2(1): rnam par dag pa/ 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi khor bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga'
156a3(1): pa'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba zhugs so/ de'i steng 'jig der gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug rdul shin du phra ba steng 'das pa na/ 'jig der gyi khams dge ba
156a4(1): sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drugi rdul tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag tsang kun ras non mongs pa rin po che shing
156a5(1): sela'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan sa mtshams can rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas gru bzhina'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'khor lo'i
156a6(1): ma pa yang dadung gas pa smra nga su shes pa
156a7(1): sa bya 'a ba cad gyi 'ams sangs rgyas kyis 'ang 'ja tshul ma ga gas
156b1(1): 'dug pa/ me dog pang pa sna tshogs kyis rgyan gyis mthams can/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang rin po che'i kha 'dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ ngas
156b2(1): bajog mtsho la rab tu garas pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang mu tig dang stegs bus kun nas g.yogs pa yid/ der de zhin gshegs pa dga' brgya
156b3(1): mtsho'i shugs dang dran grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng 'das pa na
156b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par 'byung ba'i bzi brjid zhes bya ba 'dzag rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'khor gyis skor ba/ 
156b5(1): kun ras nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gdong pa'i rgyar gyi tshams can/ ri po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / 
156b6(1): namakha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'khrul gyi dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/ 'od kyi me tog dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pa kun nas g.yogs pa yod des
156b7(1): der de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya cher po che ye shes rgya mtsha'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i snying 'jig der gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
156b8(1): za bgyid 'das par 'jig nar po khams spa byangs rab tu klog pa zhes bya 'jig de pa khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gu'i rdul shi tu tha bsad kyi la
157a1(1): gyis bskor ba rnam par sti kun nas rten mongs pa ring po che med bzhin gi rgyal po'i 'khor lo shing gi rgyan gyis
157a2(1): mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyur thams cad kyis sprin 'bar ba'i sgra'i rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gangs pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa
157a3(1): seng ge'i khri'i sngar rin po che yid du'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyad can gyis kun ras g.yogs pa yid/ der de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub med
157a4(1): pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan
157a5(1): zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba cag tu dag pa/ rgyan ma cha mtha' yas pa dang / mu dag 'bru
157a6(1): rab 'byu ba nga/ rin pa che zeng bgyur gyi mdza ca/ ri po che'i sengs 'khri rgya nga mu dag phreng pa dang / rnamams ca kyis btsun pa
157a7(1): bu'i rgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa kar ras grub pa'i dbubs su 'dug pa/ spos dang ror bra dang / me dgas tshogs kyi ri rab kyi snad ri rab bcu'i rdul shan du
157a8(1): bsnyed kyi kun ras g.yogs pa yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng
157b1(1): 'jig rteran gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu pra skyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rnams 'dog rnam par sdud pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig
157b2(1): gyi khams kyi zhing bcu pacig rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun ras nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rdo ji ltar mi gshigs sla
157b3(1): rgyar gyis mtshams can/ me dog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas ri ri pa che
157b4(1): bla bres kun nas g.yogs pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos ning chad med zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'jig rten
157b5(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba steng 'das pa na/ mjig rten gyi khams snang mdog ces bya ba 'dzag rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces
157b6(1): bya ba 'dzag rten gyi khams sas rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shing tu phra ba snyed kyi khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyin mongs pa 'od
157b7(1): zer gyi brgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa mtshams cad spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho me dag gi glang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug
157b8(1): pa/ gos sna tshogs sprir gyis kun ras g.yogs pa yod de bzhin gshegs po tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'jig
158a1(1): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba steng 'das pas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed se ces bya ba
158a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun ras nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa/ 
158a3(1): bzhi'i sa 'jams ma rlung gi kyil 'khor la dag sna tshogs ca gyis shin du bzung ba/ badra'i drung ngas s+ho gangs pa/ ma'a'i lnga'i khang pa ca
158a4(1): gyis brgyan pa yod de/ den bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mngang 'di btsunas su sangs kyis kyi zhing 'di'i snang 'dzagader
158a5(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shor du phra ba seng 'das par/ 'dzag rter gyi khams mnam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ 'dzag rjer gyi khams
158a6(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i dul ze ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bsor ba/ rnam par dag cing kur sna chen mongs pa rin po che thams cad kyis chubs cad/ rin
158a7(1): che ges sna tshogs r+b+ba pacol rab tu gnas pa/ de rje'i dbyis lar 'jug pa/ de rje'i jig mtha' yas pa lun nas g.yegs pa yid de/ 
158a8(1): bzhin gshegs pa me kyi dbyings shin du 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i sdeng 'jig der gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin duH
158b1(1): bsnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rteran gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin
158b2(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba cig tu dag pa rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla bre'i sa rnams can/ me tog gi dra ba rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas
158b3(1): pa/ dbyabs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa nor bu'i shing dang / spos chu'i sprin rgya mtsho'i kun nas g.yogs pa de yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa stobs
158b4(1): la thub pa med pas kun du snang ba ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa ma
158b5(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams 'ang 'phro snang ba'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi khor gyis
158b6(1): bskor ba/ nor phongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mi zad pa 'greng ba'i sa mchis can/ spos dang 'ang 'tho sna tshogs can gyi 'a
158b7(1): mtsho can la rab tu gnas cad la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs rus sbrul gyi mgo ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par sdang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsar ngan
158b8(1): gyi sprin gyis kar ras g.yegs pa yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma'i dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten
159a1(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi gang gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das par/ 'jig rten gyi khams ring po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu ba
159a2(1): pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba// rnam par dag cing kun nas don
159a3(1): mongs pa dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyur gyi snying po 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs yang lag brgyad
159a4(1): du 'dug pa/ 'khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang maud dag nga / shing gi drabs kun ras g.yegs pa yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa
159a5(1): chags pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kur du rnam par snang ba'i 'odang ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi gang gi rdul
159a6(1): du phra ba steng 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shan du phra ba steng
159a7(1): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa rgyan gyi rnam par thams cad kyi sa mtshams cad me tog gi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs su me tog gi
159a8(1): 'breng bsrel pa ltar 'dus pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po ring po che thams cad kyi spos khyod kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas g.yogs pa yang re/ der de bzhin gshegs dpal
159b1(1): tshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal tsha mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'dzag der gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das par/ 
159b2(1): 'dzag rten gi khams phyogs yongs su dag tsang sdang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ 
159b3(1): kun nas nyon pa nges shing rnam par dag pa/ rer bu'i rgyal po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams cad/ spos dang 'od bro ba kha dog mtha' yas
159b4(1): nga'i ri rab rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor ze ba khyil pa lta bu'i dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po dbang po'i 'od gyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas
159b5(1): pa rab du 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun sa g.yogs pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang rnamakha' kun du ra snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs
159b6(1): so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs noring po che 'od 'bro khyil ba'i
159b7(1): dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ 'dzag rten gyis khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskar cig tu rnam par dag pa rin po che
159b8(1): ni rdza rnam par snang ba'i sa mtshams can/ dbyibs lha 'di dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan gyis rnam pa dun
161a1(1): / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam pa klas thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred kyis ku
161a2(1): nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ de dag la stsogs pa 'dzag rter gyi khams 'byam klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shi phra ba snyed kyis kun ras bskor
161a3(1): ba'o// 'dzag rten gyi khams gya 'byam zas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa rnam par dgas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rnal shi na pa pa
161a4(1): snyed kyis kur ras yongs su bskor ba'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcub rdal shin du bu sbeng pa rjes dag re re zhing yang 'dzin
161a5(1): don gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i rnam par gdags pa shin tu bstan pari sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ spros chu'i rgya mtsho zab mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yang
161a6(1): 'od ba zhes bya ba churlung gi 'khor dang bcas pa/ chu blang so 'khor spong dang bcas pa' khongs na 'dug gi/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho zer ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yang du 'ong bde
161a7(1): 'dab chagasu shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtshod med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ don 'dzag rten gyi khams kyi rgyu zhing kun nas 'khyil pa'i
161a8(1): rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba sres dang rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+ma chen po la rab tha gnas pa ma byang chub sems dpa' spyod
161b1(1): ba'i sgra rgya mtsho mdor par sgrubs pa'i nga ro'i lhan can yod do// de thams cad kyi 'og na 'dzag rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyi brgyad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ 
161b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi gang chen po mtshol rab tu gnas
161b3(1): pa 'khor kun nas grub bzhir 'dug pa/ pad+ma'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i srin gyis kun nas g.yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs dpal rnam par spang
161b4(1): ba'i mdzod sru'i 'od ces bya bzhugs so// de'i steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
161b5(1): ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog
161b6(1): gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyi bas kun nas 'khor du 'dug pa/ mu tig grong khyer dpal gyi dpal seng ge'i khri sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod pa
161b7(1): der de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na'ang gi rder gyi khams sangs rgyas
161b8(1): kyi zhing gi rdul phru ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim pos dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rter khams rgya
162a1(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gyi 'khor gyis bskor pa/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs
162a2(1): pa ri pre che thams cad rgyan dang / dril bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu garas pa/ rdo rje'i dbabs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
162a3(1): spyir gyis kun nas g.yogs pa yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas sdang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
162a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba steng 'das pa na/ 'jig rje gyi khams na'i kha dog dang 'ong yid du 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'jig rten
162a5(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra skrong dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ spos chu'i kha dog mtha' yas pa ring po che'i rkyen dang ldan
162a6(1): pa'i rgya mtsho la rab du gnas pa/ dbyibs ner du'i bar lolta bur 'dug pa/ mu tig nying ma'i tshul kun du snang ba'i 'od kyi khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
162a7(1): g.yegs pa yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i'akhor legs par 'byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so// de'i steng 'daganid gyi 'khas sangs rgyas
162a8(1): nga gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das par/ 'jig zer gyi khams dag pa'i g+has khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin du za
162b1(1): snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba// kur ras nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ spos dang rdo rje'i tshu la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+ma dbyibs lngar 'dug pa
162b2(1): 'od zer rdul dang bral ba dang sras chu'i sprir gyis kun ras g.yogs pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gyis chos kyi shugs gyis 'gyengs pa mi zad pa'i blo
162b3(1): gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'dzag rder gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng 'das pa na/ 'dzag der gyi khams me tog dpal gyi
162b4(1): gzi brjid gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun ras na mongs
162b5(1): pa rab narin po che thams cad kyis bden par skabs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur gsum gyi dbyibasu 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i
162b6(1): cod pa na rI 'od dang / 'od zer gyisi kun nas g.yogs par yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun rA spang ba zhes bya ba
162b7(1): bzhugs so/ de'i steng 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra pa snyed 'das pa na/ 'dzag den gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mas
162b8(1): rgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jog rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa pad+ma'i rgyan zam
178a1(1): baphyogs bcu yon tan rgya chen po rnam par grags pa'i 'od zer mi zang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i sring na 'jig rten gyi khams 'ang 'gro bar btu brtan par ni
178a2(1): che'i snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po bstan dga' ba mnyam na don yo pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rter gyi khams dpal gyi me tog
178a3(1): legs par sngags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs paspo bas dang ye shes tshad med pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi
178a4(1): sna tshon 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprul pa kun tu 'od ces bya

178a6(1): gshegs pa don grub pa shin tu grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i seng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'phreng ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams par
178a7(1): pang mdzad 'dul ba las mngon pad+ma 'a byung ba'i gzig brji ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i seng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shidi t+tam bsnyed 'das pa na/ 
178a8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog pal gyi mang me'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sprin ma shin tu chags pa meng pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bcwa
178b1(1): so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshul bzang po'i sgo sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod bzhugs so// 
178b2(1): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams can dan gyi ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gsung chad med pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// 
178b3(1): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi dra ba shin tu yo mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i shin tu 'bigs pa'i 'od ces bya ba
178b4(1): bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yongs su dag pa'i klong gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nyid ma'i 'od
178b5(1): zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
178b6(1): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrogs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po chen pad+ma'i nags tshal yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
178b7(1): gshegs pa ye shes pos mgyis mi khyab pa la 'khwa 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba zhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rin po che ltar gzhi mnyam pa
178b8(1): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs par ni po che na'i dpal gyi 'od gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor
179a1(1): / ba shin tu mnga' ba/ zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod rnams rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i rgyur dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 
179a2(1): 'i na 'jis rten gyi lakhris gas rgyu ba byed bzhes bya ba snad de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pas mag sa du byed ba ngas kun tu bzang dus
179a3(1): ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan par sgrub babyugs
179a4(1): thams cadang btu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shA tu bra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che yid bzhin
179a5(1): kyi rgyal po yan leg rgyang du rnam pa dbye ba'i 'khar lo rgya ma tshal rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang / mthe'i sprin gyis kun nas ga yags pa yod pa

179b2(1): bu'i mu tig gi phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug phu rab tu snang ba'i sprin gyis kun nas g.yogs
179b3(1): yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing

180a3(1): shin tu yang dag par gnas pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mag 'phrul gyi nor bu'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba

180a5(1): de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang tho ba'i tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi'odakyi'akhor lo zhes bya ba yang
