180a7(1): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yin tan thams cad kyi sprin kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jug rten gyi khams shing gi tshogs
180a8(1): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin po che'i me tog shin du rgyas pa'i zla ba'i blo nas bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams
180b1(1): 'jigs pa med par shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong ngam pa gser rgya sngon ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i sring na 'jig rten gyi khams klu'i grags pa dpal gyi
180b2(1): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgyal mtsho thams cad rnam par bzigs pas tha dad pa med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
180b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams nang bu'i ge cha yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de ra nga bzhin gshegs pa stsal ba'i ni ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i slong na 'jig chen gyi khams 'a
180b4(1): blo bas rab tu brgyar ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi dpal rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng ra 'jig
180b5(1): rten gyi khams spos kyi na bun gyi 'od gzer ces bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ngam pas dgongs pa zhes bya ba yo zhugs so// de'i seng na 'jig rten khams
180b6(1): med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i seng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan pa'i 'ong
180b7(1): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pad+mas kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyis zhing gi
180b8(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzad bus sgrubs pa'i mtshan ces bya ba 'jig rter gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
181a1(1): @kyis bstor ba/ gcig tu dag brna ba kham pa'i dbyibs lngar 'dug pa/ rin bache'i me zhig gi ring rab lar rabatu gnas pa/ nor bu'i rgyal
181a2(1): rgyam thams cad 'bar ba'i 'od kyi sprin gyis kun nas g.yogs yang de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de nas la phyogs lags
181a3(1): ma sus chu'i rgya mtsho'i wa'i grong khyer rin pa che'i shing rtags kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang de/ de la 'jig rten gyis khams chung mar me'i 'od zeng snang ba zhes bya ba rnam par
181a4(1): snang mdzad gzhan dang gzhan dang gzhan thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i dbyings kyi lhur can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rini po che'i zla
181a5(1): bI'od 'gro ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu tha bskyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu ga pa/ rgyun thams cad kyi dbyings lnga bung 'dug pa/ 
181a6(1): rin po chena'i rgyan rgya mtsha thams cad la rab tu gnas pa/ baiDUr+ya dang / dngul gyi seng ge'i khri sbyin gyis kun nas g.yogs pa yod de/ de'i rangade bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'odi ltar
181a7(1): bdag po med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i seng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyis zhing rdul shin du pa bsnyeng 'das 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od
181a8(1): ribo 'byung ba khyod do/ den de bzhin gshegs pa chos mi bzang ba'i rgya mtshar ni po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzugs so// gzhung de bzhim du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyis
181b1(1): rdul ba margyar rgyas chags kyi'ang ces bya ba yang nga / den de bzhini gshegs pa ma chog gi 'byung gnas rgya chen ba zhes bya ba bzhugs sa// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
181b2(1): metog shin rgyas pa'i nan bur ba tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ drin de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bre ngas pa'i dbang po'i dngol zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten
181b3(1): gyi khams smo skangs tshogs shes bya ba yang ngo // de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad mkhyen pa ci kyil bar lo rnam par srung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i sang
181b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams mi'am ci ljon pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa bsod nams tshad med pa'i gzil brjid ces bya ba bzhugs/ 
181b5(1): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sdang ba dag pas 'ong mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po chena'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya bzhugs/ 
181b6(1): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi rgyan thams cad kyi blo gros zhes bya ba btsugs so/ 
181b7(1): de'i sring na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che rnam par bye bar rab tu mang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po chena'i 'ari ba ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
181b8(1): 'jig rten gyis khams yongs su snang ba'i gtsug ri rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa thams cad kyi 'od shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba
182a1(1): bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi char pa phra mo'i gdugs shes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ba rol tu
182a2(1): byani pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i rgyan mtshe zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi dra ba seng ges rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
182a3(1): bzhin gshegs par riri po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i me tog shin tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 
182a4(1): de na de bzhin gshegs pa spor lam thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i seng na 'jig rter gyi khams chos thams cad kyis 'ong
182a5(1): ces bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi don shin tu yangs pa'i gtsug ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig chen gyi khams mu tig gi phye mas
182a6(1): gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'ong zer gyi dra ba mchog gi blos shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams de rgyu
182a7(1): 'be bshin du 'byung ba posam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba ba na yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs par ni bo rje'i brtsegs pa'i chargyal mtsham zhes bya ba bzhugs
182a8(1): / de'i slong nge 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chad med pa'i 'khrul pa bzang ba zhes bya ba yang ngo de// de de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes la thub pa med pa'i
182b1(1): rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs sa// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs rmongs pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba bcu yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs
182b2(1): pa dan thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa'i yon tan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' batshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten
182b3(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i 'od
182b4(1): zer gyi dra ba'i klog gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyad thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis kun nas galog pa la de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
182b5(1): la thogs pa med pas chos kyis dbyings rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od bro ba'i snying po can zhes bya
182b6(1): bde dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul pa'i lus bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ den 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha dang bar ba
182b7(1): gnas pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de dang 'drab 'chags pa na spos chu'i cha rgya mtsho rdo rje'i mag rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
182b8(1): rgyud chos kyi dbyings las yang rig par 'jug pa'i rgyan ces bya ba mngon por 'byung ngo // de dang 'dra ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+ma'i tshul rnam par
183a1(1): sa bya ba nga/ des rkyen la sa m+b+ha gyus sgyu ba ba tu byung bzhes bya bstan pa sgru
183a2(1): 'dab chags su spos chu'i cha rgya mtshor rin po che'i rgyal po'i dkyil khor ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams rgyud pad+ma'i lo ma sbyin stug sas zhes bya ba mngon
183a3(1): par 'byung ngo // dngang 'dra ba chags su smos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul ba'i sras kyi 'ang 'bro bas kun tu brgya pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyis khams kyi rgyan rnam par
183a4(1): snang mdzod kyi sbrul brgyu ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo // de dang 'ang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gram 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de las
183a5(1): 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad byin kyis brlabs kyi yul zhes bya ba mngon pa 'byung ngo // de dang 'dab chags su sros chu'i rgya mtsho'i kha dog kun tu 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces
183a6(1): bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od dam pa zhes bya ba mngon par 'byung ngo // dri dang 'ang ba chags su shar phyogs logs na spos
183a7(1): chu'i rgya mtsho can thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyis khams kyi rin po che 'di 'gro ba'i lce rab tu snang b+hU shAn+da bye ba zhes bya ba mngon
183a8(1): 'bar 'byungs de dag la sogs pasas chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i yang rdzong du med pa'i rdul shin tu tha bsrid kyi phyi rol shing phyogs legs kyi la khor
183b1(1): yug gi mchis na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po shes ces bya ba yod de/ de na las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grol ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
183b2(1): yongs su dag pa'i ba skal pa rgya mtsho na'i dbyings kyi lhan can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'ong ni 'jig rten gyi khamam gyi dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
183b3(1): ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i
183b4(1): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la btsan 'grus kyi blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyis khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du bya ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig
183b5(1): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kying byas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de la 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i
183b6(1): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shan tu phra ba snyed kyi khor gyis bskor ba cig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa'i sgron
183b7(1): ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyis khas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdza mjed ces bya
183b8(1): ba skyed pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi dbyings sleb pa med pa'i ri ra ba ces bya
184a1(1): @ba bzhugs so// de ra'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shAng du pA bsnyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi
184a2(1): dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams lus dam pa'i spos gya rnam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyid shu'i rdul shin du ba ba sred kyi 'khor gyis
184a3(1): bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag me 'og 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i chu rgya mtsho'i 'ong
184a4(1): kyi dkyil 'khor drizhim po mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dang / 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na/ spos chu'i rgya mtshon gzi brjid bzang po dpal dang ldan
184a5(1): ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khargyad rgyan mtha' yas pa la gzhol ba zhes bya bar btu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgyu
184a6(1): mtshor rin po che shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi rgyud spos dang ri po che'i chos yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// 
184a7(1): de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud spos dang rin po che'i chos yang
184a8(1): dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba rabatu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ 
184a9(1): ma cher gyi/ sa kyi rung bzhis mtshang gyimi meng ba'is kya tha langs/ ngengs ra 'thams ca rgya mche spang bdas gakyi tsha matsam pan ma byab par/ 
184b1(1): de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par phye ba'i gnas yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya sa rab tu gnas so// de dnga'ang ba chags su la phyogs logs
184b2(1): na spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing yongs su gsal bar snang ba zhes bya ba
184b3(1): rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho can ngan shin tu yid du 'ong gzer ces bya ba yid de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog
184b4(1): gri klong gi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ang ba chagasu spos chu'i rgya mtsho byin gyis brlabs kyi rlung zhes bya ba yod de/ 
184b5(1): de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che na'i 'od zer gyi sgra ni dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'deb chags su spos
184b6(1): chu'i rgya mtsho brgya byin gyis gdeng dang / lus shin tu smras pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu g+hi rgya mtsho snying po zhes bya ba
184b7(1): rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ang ba chags su lho phyogs logs na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho gnas shin du mnyam par yang dag sgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i
184b8(1): yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung bai DUr+ya'i 'gram bu sna tshogs bkram pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i
185a1(1): sgyu mchu sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu tha bskyed kyi phyir la/ 'khrugs kyi mtshams ma smras chu'i rnamache shing gi
185a2(1): zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs yangs pa'i zhes yang dag 'byung bya zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad bdud gi 'khor yongs su 'dul ba'i
185a3(1): gsung gi ldan can no zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de thams cad kyi 'ogan/ 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyu skar mnga' 'od 'phreng zhes bya ba cig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gag
185a4(1): pa 'jig rten gis mchod pa yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i mi steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snying 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud
185a5(1): dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhi mnyam pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba yong dang de bzhin gshegs par ni bache
185a6(1): sgra ni seng ge'i stobs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i ste don 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul sha ni tu phra ba skyed 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi mi mjed ces
185a7(1): bya ba bzhi mnyam pa long bder/ 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi rgyal ba mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
185a8(1): 'jig der 'argyakhams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdud kyi rdul pan du za ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig chen gyi khams kyi rgyad kyi dang pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rini ba che'i 'greng bas
185b1(1): ge rnam par snang ba zhis bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa d+ma ga ni dustsal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i rgya ba tsho rdo rje'i 'od gzer 'brang ba'ang snang
185b2(1): ma zhes bya ba de dang / 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnam par bris pa thams cad kyis rnam par klu bas pa'i rgyal mtshar zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rter gyi rgyud rgya ngas
185b3(1): ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtshor ni po che thams cad kyi me tog gis rnam par snang ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yid de/ ngel
185b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan gyi rgyan dang / dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su sros chu'i rgya mtshon pad+ma'i ze ba'i me tog shin du rgyas
185b5(1): pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud byang chub sems can dpa'i rkyen rin po che'i cod pa na shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// ded 'ang ba chags su
185b6(1): spos chu'i rgya mtshor rin po che'i gos kyis yun ra ni po nas bka ba pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi rgyud mu tig rnam par dag par ni po che'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rab tu gnas
185b7(1): so// de dang 'dra ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang po yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sdang ba'i sgra ni 'od zer rnam par
185b8(1): ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su cha spos chu'i rgya mtshon mtshon mkha'i phyogs dang mnyam par sdang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
186a1(1): @rin po che kun du snang ba rnam par dmigs pa shin tu zab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de ba dnga'ang ba chags su sbas chu'i rgya mtsho ma rtag
186a2(1): bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gser gyi mig zla ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags
186a3(1): su spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos dang / mu ta gi dam pa'i sring po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rter gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi dpal gyis kun tu spang bya yod de/ de dang 'ang ba
186a4(1): chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'khor los smras pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyis khams kyi rgyud sprul pa bzang po 'byung ba sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu
186a5(1): gnas te/ de dag la stsogs spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi phyi rol lnga phyogs legs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na/ spos chu'i
186a6(1): rgya mchog ni 'khor lo tshad med pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig chen gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tshad med pa sbrel gzhi zhes bya ba zhing gi rgyud yon tan snang tshogs tham/ 
186a7(1): na shi du ston pa'i sgra'i lhan can rab tu gnas to// de thams cad gyi khams rdo rje'i me tog gos khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ra nge bzhi gshegs pa mtshar mi zad pa'i 'ang/ 
186a8(1): gzir sgra kun nas sngags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i song 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsred 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya
186b1(1): ma 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na de bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams ni po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang/ 
186b2(1): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi sprin kun tu dbal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyis khams gzhi mnyam pa mi mjed
186b3(1): ces bya ba yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khya dra par gyi blo gros rgya mtsho zhes
186b4(1): bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i mig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi nyi ma'i pad+mo sbyin ces bya
186b5(1): ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i mtsho rin po che in+d+ra ni las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan can dang / 'dra ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhung la lA ma yan gyi gnas shin 'byung
186b6(1): ba zhes bya ba zhes yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer chu'i shugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtshon
186b7(1): seng ge'i rin po ches sgrubs pa sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyu dar ni po che thams cad kyis phyogs su khyab par byed pa rnam par dmigs
186b8(1): ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya che kha dog gi sprin gyi gnas 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang
187a1(1): @ri ni po che'i rin po'i spel dkyil 'khar rnam par 'bres pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su sras chu'i rgya mchog zhi dang slob
187a2(1): rnam par bkram pa zhes bya yod de/ den 'jig rten gyis khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang ba'i chos kyi dbyings bde ba'i rgyan ces bya bar rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags
187a3(1): su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me tshul bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyur stsal pas phyogs rnam par lta zhing kun du khyab pa zhes
187a4(1): bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bsam gis mi khyab pa'i rgyan shan du banan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'dil 'jig chen gyi khams
187a5(1): rgyang daphyogs thams cad du snang bas legs par rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de dang 'ang ba chags su sras chu'i rgyal mtshor rin po che'i phung zas nim rgyan
187a6(1): bzhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud skar mnga'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ad ba chags su sas chu'i rgyas
187a7(1): brnam par dag pa 'darab tu 'gying ba shugs shes bya ba yang de/ de la 'jog rten gyi khams kyi rgyung rlung chags med pa'i dri rlub drug mas// dengang
187a8(1): chagasu su sa cu rgyamatshar ri ba tsharigs dang / sregs dro'i rgyan ces bya ba yang de/ del 'jig nyin gyi mas kyi byung deng nin tshimigs pa'i sman dum
187b1(1): sa byab btuganas pag 'argyags pasas rgya rnamams sa rgyas kyi zhing brtad du myed pa'i tshul ma ba me rgya ma rnas par chug mimanams/ 
187b2(1): rgya mtsho gang snang tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul lta bur shin du gnas pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' tham
187b3(1): cad kyis rab tu gnon pa'i sgra'i lhan can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig cher gyi khams sangs rgya
187b4(1): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos chu'i 'od zer dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhug
187b5(1): bam po bcu gcu gcig pa'o// / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed sangs
187b6(1): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/ 'jig chen gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i
187b7(1): shing gri ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ der de bzhir gshegs pa rnal kun du ston cing sgribs pa med pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig
187b8(1): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyan sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
188a1(1): chos kyang ba byug pas kyis pa gnan pa'i thags nas dra ba bzhugs pa// nga mi na 'jig rkye khams kyin+d+ha kyi la
188a2(1): 'jas ched gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis legs par sel pa zhes bya ba yang / der de bzhi gshegs pa pang+gA'i 'ang kyi ba'ig di rgyas pa'i rgyal ba nas
188a3(1): bzhugasas// sras rgya'i rgya mtshal ba lo brtan pang bsgrags pazhes bya ba de dang 'ad ba chags su sus chu'i rgya ma tshig ni sprul pa'i bang sa brgyan pa cos bya ba ma
188a4(1): 'jig chen gyi khams kyi rgyud shing la yongs su' dbu rab tu stod pa'i sa bya ba rab tu gnas sa// de dang 'ang ba chags su sras chu'i rgya mtshan pa che'i gzi brji
188a5(1): 'bang ba'i 'ang ces bya ba yid de/ de la 'jig rjer gyi khams kyi rgyang chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'asnyengs pa la tshungs pa med pa zhes bya bar bcug nams// de dang nga
188a6(1): chags sa sus chu'i rgyam sras dang ring bu'i rnam mchags nas zla ba meng do// de la 'jig chen gyi khams kyi rgyung byugs langs su gzhal bar rnam par dmigs
188a7(1): la'adag zhes bya bar bduganas so// de nga 'di bzugs su sa nA'i nu batshod ni ma che gci brjid 'bang ba'i'ad skyes bya ba yid de/ dang 'jig rjer na
188a8(1): khams kyi chung stong bkunas rgyal ba'i gsung sdig pa zhes bya ba btu gnas so// de dnga'ang ba chags su sras chu'i rgya mtshong blangs phab ma mu med banas
188b1(1): ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud daphyogs tha dad pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas sa// de dang 'ang ba chags su smos chu'i rgya bachesang
188b2(1): po dang ldan zhing shin tu 'brug pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rter gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tho dang ba mtha'i dbus med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab
188b3(1): chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tshangs pa'i dbyings yongs su dag pa'i sgras zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyun thams cad yongs su dag pa zhes
188b4(1): bya bar btu gnas so// de dang 'ad ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan dan gyi dbyangs shin tu rnam par phye ba'i stegs bu'i snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de la
188b5(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rmyil mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dra ba chags su smras kyi rgyal po'i 'od zer gyis shi ni tu smra bas pa zhes
188b6(1): yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi ste bas kun tu snang ba yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gonas so// spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+ma'i dbang po ma
188b7(1): tog shin tu gan rgyas pa de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho ngul gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyis skabs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
188b8(1): rgyud yongs su gsal bar kun du rgyud pa zhes bya bar bdu gnas so// de dang 'i nga ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya'i sba ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin sdug po zhes
189a1(1): khyab la nga / des 'jig ched kyi khams kyi rgyu daphyogs su dbyangs skrag pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ang ba chags
189a2(1): thugs kun zuga'i bci kyis rgyal ba'i phung ba'ang 'bri ba sa dra ba med de/ del 'jig nid kyi 'ams kyi cung thugs dam par bya bar chu
189a3(1): zhes bya bar btuganas so// de dang 'dra ba rgyags sus sa na'i rgya mtshag ser gyi rgyal mtshan nang bu'i rgyal ba'i dang la rab tu byed ba skyes bya ba yod de/ dril
189a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rdo rje'i rtse mo'i zhing gi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su sdes chu'i mtsho tha dang ba med pa'i sprin
189a5(1): 'bang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ don 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gtsug ces bya bar ba tu gnas sa// de dang 'a
189a6(1): chags su bos chu'i rgya mtshor ni ba che'i me 'og zang mi shes pa shin tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba med de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyu
189a7(1): mtha' yas brdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// deng dngo'i rab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho che zhing gser lder yongs su dag pa grags pa'i dpal
189a8(1): gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jog chen gyi khams kyi rgyud ni mtshon du bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dnga'ang ba chas
189b1(1): su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mag yor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud las kyis kun tu brgyan cing rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu
189b2(1): gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dag dbyangs zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu rgyas pa la mngon tu bal
189b3(1): ba zhes bya ba tu gnas sa te de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu p+tA bskyed kyi phyi rolo khA la yug gi mtshams
189b4(1): na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od 'gro ba sdug pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba
189b5(1): snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khyor sgra'i lhun rab tu gnas so// de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i
189b6(1): dmig sna tshogs shes bya ba 'jigs rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin du pra ba skad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg
189b7(1): phyags thams cad rnam po snang brtsi'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i sring ma 'jog rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing pa'i rdul gni dus bsring 'das pa'i 'chi
189b8(1): chen gyi khams kyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yong de/ don 'jig rten gyi khams me chog
190a1(1): ut+pal dang / dpal gi be'u zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 
190a2(1): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod bde na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams rdo rje lter srab sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ ngan
190a3(1): bzhin gshegs pa brtse pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning bdun kyi rdul shin du bya bsnyed 'das pa'i 'jig
190a4(1): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho dag pa sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis mi non par mngon par 'phags
190a5(1): pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i mtshor rin po che 'byung gnas kyi mdzod shin du brtsegs pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtshar ni
190a6(1): pache 'od snang bar 'dzes pa nas bya ba yod de/ do ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung grags pa rje mi med pa'i rgyun ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dnga'ang
190a7(1): chags su sris chu'i rgya mtsho der rin po che tshad med pa'i me tog shin du rgyus pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan nyidi rnamapa' lta bur rnam
190a8(1): par spyod pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgyang mtsho rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
190b1(1): thogs pa med par kun nas snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ad ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing tsan dan gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 
190b2(1): de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mtha' yas par khyal phyogs su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab du gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su gser gi rin po che'i
190b3(1): rgyal po'i gram bu rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyal mtshan gyi rtsal zhing gi 'khor rgya ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// 
190b4(1): de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'khor kun rdo rje me tog gi 'byung gnas yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rje gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par phye ba bsam
190b5(1): gyis mi khyab par ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ang bo chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nor bu yid bzhin gi rgyal po'i 'khor lo sna tshogs kyi gzhi
190b6(1): zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par rig pa med chags pa med pa sangs rgyas blta ba zhes bya ba rab tu gan so de dang 'dab chags
190b7(1): su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi ni po che'i phreng bas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig kyi khams kyi rgyud blo gros dge ba mtha' yas pa'i gzi brjid
190b8(1): ces bya bar btu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su sbas chu'i rgya mtsho mu tig sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la
191a1(1): @'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi yul spyan lam gyi rgyud mthun pa las byung ba zhes bya bar btu gnas sa// de dag la stsogs
191a2(1): bsngos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol 'khor yug gi mtshams na/ smos chu'i rgya mtsho 'jam bu chu klung gi mdzod
191a3(1): kyi ya kyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi rgyun tu sras sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhan dang gzhan gi skor rab
191a4(1): 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ngo // de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog 'ong 'phro ba zhes bya ba 'jig gyi khams sangs
191a5(1): rgyas kyi shing gi rdul shin tu 'gra ba snyed kyi sna'i khar gyis bsong ba/ gcig tu drug pa med de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dpo' bas gsal ba zhes bya ba
191a6(1): bzhugs so// de'i snying 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shini du phra bsnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi khams
191a7(1): 'irgyu mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod bden/ 'jig gyi khams pad+ma rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
191a8(1): zhing gi rdul kani dubya bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa ying / den de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis rnams par
191b1(1): 'phags pa'i sems kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsred 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
191b2(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jed pa ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stobs cu'i rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
191b3(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod / de na de bzhin gshes pa legs par byung
191b4(1): kha'i yon tan tshang med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dang po la/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor bu brtsig
191b5(1): pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blos gros rnam par yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po
191b6(1): ches mthun par rnam par brgyan pa de dang 'ang chags su sros chu'i rgya mtsho 'od zer gyi mdzod kyi ri bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
191b7(1): rgyud na mkha'i sprin yangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar bdu gnas so// de dnga'ang ba chags su sros chu'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba yod
191b8(1): de/ nga la 'dzag rten gyi rgyud dri ma med cing sgribs pa med par rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i brgya mtshor ni dang
192a1(1): che'i bad+ma'ang ba ma sdug par rabatu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yong de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rlung lus kyi rgya mngam pa'i mar me zhes bya bar bcwa
192a2(1): gnas so// de dang 'dab su chags su sras chu'i rgya mtshor na pa che thams cad kyi rgyan shin du gnas pa zhes bya ba yong de/ de la 'jig chen gyi khams kyi chung cing ma'i 'ong
192a3(1): zer gyi dra bor btu gnas sa// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yang dag par smras pa shan tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nga ni bache
192a4(1): ze ba byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mchog ni zh-i pad+ma'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ling de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud ra mkha'i rnam
192a5(1): bar dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shag zi brjid dag bcing yangs pas snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig
192a6(1): chen gyi khams kyi rgyud oM nA mi la'i dbyibs lngar 'dug pa/ sar mnga' lhung sdang ba zhes bya ba bdu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su sros chu'i rgya mtsho yang 'od
192a7(1): bar 'gram pa'i niradr-i mu tig gi rnam par srung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung dbyangs kyis kun tu sdug pa'ong ral dga' ba sa
192a8(1): bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pasres chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du bra ba snyed kyi phyi ro la khor yug gi mtshams ma/ sras
192b1(1): tshwa'i rgya mtsha yin nim rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba lang ngo de/ ngal 'jig rjen gyi kham kyi phyogs kun tu spang ming \u0f7f drang pa'i sa bya 'o/ byang chub sems dpa' thams ca
192b2(1): kyi chos yang dag par 'byung ba rang re sgeg pa'i lhan can rab tu gnas te de thams cad kyi 'gan 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba dam pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rter gyi
192b3(1): khams sangs rgyas kyi stong gi rdum can du zla ba sgreng 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kying dbus gzhi pa mnyam pa yang bde dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams cad yang sa
192b4(1): par gnas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ drin de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang lhag 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rteran gyi kham
192b5(1): mi 'dod ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de ngan/ 'jig rten gyi khams be DUr+yas skabs pa kun 'khor lo zhes bya ba baM yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab
192b6(1): mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog gli rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu drang
192b7(1): bsnyed kyi 'khor gyi sa bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs bsngal ba mi zad pa'i sman gyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba bzhugs so// skyes tshu
192b8(1): rgyad mtsho sgra rdo rje ltar shin tu brtan pa'i dbyangs shes bla ba de dang 'dab chagasu sbas chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing thags kyis bskor ba shin tu 'phags pa zhes
193a1(1): bya ba yad de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung ni ba che'i rdul mtshan shin tu 'greng ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas sa// de dang 'dab chag
193a2(1): su sos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba thams cad shin tu gnas so// dang dra'adab chags
193a3(1): su spos chu'i rgya mtshor rini po che'i sprin dam pa dang ldan po zhes bya ba yad dang / de la 'jig rten gyi rgyang gzhir ni pa tshe thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'di rnam par snang ba zhes bya bar ba
193a4(1): gnasas// de dag 'ang ba chags su sas chu'i rgya mamatshan pa che'i shing gi ze ba'i kha dag gi rgyun ces bya ba yang de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang dge ba'i tshig
193a5(1): kyi gzi brjid bal po che zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su smras chu'i rin pa che'i gos dang shin du brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khan
193a6(1): rlung rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya bar bzhuganas so// de dang 'dab chags su sbas chu'i shing gi ya la gang brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod do// de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
193a7(1): rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba'i sgo na la shin tu rjen pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ang ba chags su skyes chu'i rgya mchog zhi ying du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yid
193a8(1): mngal 'jig can gyi mas kyi rgya chags bzang pab na kun rgyub zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de la nga 'ad ba su chag su sus chul rgya mam kun sa
193b1(1): brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ngel 'jig rter gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho dgas mtha' yas pa'i klong zhes bya ba rab tu kun gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su sras chu'i rgyam
193b2(1): riri ba che'i yan lag dam pa rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung zhing gi gzhi rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// 
193b3(1): de dag lasags bcwas chu'i rta mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi phyi rol khar yug gi chams na/ sras pa chu'i rgya mtsho byed par brda
193b4(1): dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor shin tu rnam par bye ba'i 'khor la
193b5(1): zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs la 'jig bshin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'ogar 'jig rten gyi khams spos shin tu zhim pa'i rgya
193b6(1): mtsho shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang sprul pa tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de'i dbus na 'jig rten
193b7(1): gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa long ba de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan dang tshul gyi sgo bsam gis mi khyab bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
193b8(1): pa ye shes tshad med pa'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba ni mnyam pa yong ba de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang
194a1(1): pa'i phyogs me tog gi sring po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge spyan 'ang 'dra ba'i srin ces bya ba bzhugs sa/ 
194a2(1): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pachu'i lnga 'od 'phro ba'i sku
194a3(1): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// spos po chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer dang / nor bu'i shing thabs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de dang 'ang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba
194a4(1): 'khor los rnam par gsol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i phyogs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so/ 
194a5(1): deda'ang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che na'i tshon gyi srang rnam par sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ den 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brgyad pa du mas 'jug
194a6(1): bzhes bya ba ba tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i brgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis kun du gang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi kham
194a7(1): kyi rgyud rin po che'i rnam par snang ba zhes bya bar bdu gnas so// de dnga'ang ba chags su sras chu'i rgyal ma tshe rin po che'i dra ba rnam par bye ba kun du 'byung ba
194a8(1): bya ba yad de/ de la 'jig rten gyi rgyung tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chagasusus chu'i rgya mtsho rtsal mtsha
194b1(1): dam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yang de/ des 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa rgya mtsho'o sgra zhes bya ba badrug nas pa/ 
194b2(1): de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nyid ma'i gnas yongs su skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul gyis rgyas par
194b3(1): 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ad ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sa la snyan thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs ladi du 'ong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 
194b4(1): de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud klong thams cad kyi gting rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'ang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan ngam
194b5(1): pas bsgrubs pa rnam par snang tshigs shes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khoms kyi rgyud 'od dri ma med pa'i sprin kun stug po'i bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu
194b6(1): gnas so// de dang 'ang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me mar 'ong phro bas kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas
194b7(1): kyi smon lam gyi dbyibs tha dad par byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnaso so// de dag la stsogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas zhing brjod du can pa'i
194b8(1): med pa'i ya rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho phreng ba dang / gos kyis shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de
195a1(1): des 'jig rten gyi d+hAd kunasas snang ba gas pa gA stsa bu sa zu sa rgyas sa
195a2(1): bdang / dkar byung ba thams cad kyi mtshan ni zhin 'asug pa'i len cen mngon par byung ngo // de thams cad kyi gan sus chu'i rgyal mtshang bang bu mi
195a3(1): pheb khyil ba'i stong ba zhes bya ba yang ngo de/ den 'jig rten gyi khams rab gral bas dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rnam
195a4(1): shani du phra ba snyed kyi 'khor kyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes kyis pham pa med pa zhes byab
195a5(1): bzhugs sa// de'i steng 'jig can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu zla bsnyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi
195a6(1): khams rnga rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhi mnyam pa yod pa den/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'bru'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
195a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin du \u0f7f bsrung bkyi 'khang gyis bsang ba/ gcig tu dag pa yang / den de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba chang med pas
195a8(1): sa bzhis bya ba bas// ba seng la gcan gyi sa rgyas kyi ni gi rdumanan tu za bsangs pa'i 'jig gyi khams tsha
195b1(1): khyab gzhi mnyam pa yod de ngen/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gang na pad+ma dang / seng ge'i zhes bya ba 'jig rter gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul ni
195b2(1): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shi rnam par dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs dri med ba cing mnyan pa na spong ba zhes
195b3(1): bye ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdun gyi rdul shin du phra ba skyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyud steng na/ 
195b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud klu'i rin po che'i gri 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bsku
195b5(1): pa gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings yongs su gsal ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ kye de ltar rgyal
195b6(1): ba'i sras ngag spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi cha
195b7(1): brjod du med phrag bcu rdul shin tu phra bsring rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa kyi rgyud de dag thams cad kyang spos chu'i rgyad mtsho de dag la nor
195b8(1): bu'i rgyal po// byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa'i mag g.yor gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+mol rab
196a1(1): tu gnas pa shasta go/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi rgyan gzhan rang gzhan can mang po dang mtshams 'dab chags su gnas pa shas / 
196a2(1): 'od ni pa cha gzhan dang gzhan gyi bdog du 'gyed ba shes so// 'od kying kyil 'khod kyi sgor gzhan dang gnan gis kun ras galags pa shas go/ rgyan rnam par bris pa'i
196a3(1): 'ong gzhan dang gzhan cam nasug/ bskal ba'i grangs dang / tshul gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa gsag/ sangs rgyas gzhan dang gzhan skye zhing gshegs pa shas/ 
196a4(1): chos rgya mtshod sgra gzhan dang gzhan du bsnung ba zhu bsgrags pa shas go// sems can gyi lus gnan dang gzhan gyis kun tu g.yogs pa shas go/ phyogs gnan dang gzhan la 'dra/ 
196a5(1): bram 'dres pa shAs go/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyu
196a6(1): de dag ri'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams nas rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra brgya nas tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par
196a7(1): sna tshogs kyi tshul tu/ 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mchog ni dang snying po me tog gi rgyan pa gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad yongs su gang du// ji ltar 'jig rten
196a8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyud nas byung ba de la
196a9(1): rgyung ma ma dang / 'dzig na gyi sa kyis mtshams dang / garnam pa rdzogs rgyas pa gas pa ngag can kyi khams kya
196b1(1): byung ba kun gyis kyang 'jig rteran gyi khams rgya mchog zhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di thams cad yongs su gang ngo // der byang chub sems dpa' kun
196b2(1): tu bzang bas yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod
196b3(1): ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten khams ni rgya mtsho rnams
196b4(1): yangs dang mi yangs sna tshogs pa// na mkha' dag gi dbyings la gnas// kha rog tha dang chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dang // 'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtshon// zhing
196b5(1): rgyud rgyu ni bsam mi khyab// tha dang mni pa rnam par gnas// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag go/ rnam phyer sna tshogs shin tu gnas// kha dag tha dad rab tu 'dug/ 
196b6(1): zhing gi rgyud dag rnam bye ba// 'jig rten khams kyi gang chen mtsho// lhun dang dbyings rnams tha dad de// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam phul ba// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab
196b7(1): tu snang // las kyis de dag shini tu bris// rig brgya mtsho dra ba dang // 'khor lo glog gi dkyil 'khor dang // pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra' byam klas pa// de dag de yis
196b8(1): kun nas bskor// rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dang // rdo rje kun nas 'khor gnas pa// 'byam klas pas mi gyis mi khyabs// de dag rgyud ni kun nas bskur
197a1(1): @'ad kyi drab bsam mi khyab// mug cig mngag kyang rgya mchis// ming gi rgyung rnams kun kyang 'bar// bad+ma las yang kun gnas sa/ 
197a2(1): re re dag gi rgyud rnalas kun kyang // 'od zer drab bsam mi khyab// 'od zer dag gi zhing gyur cing // rgya mtsho'i phyogs rnams kun tu 'grengs// ning gi rgyud rnams
197a3(1): thams cad kyi// dmigs pa kun gyi sgonas kyang / thams cad tshul la 'jug pa yis// mi zang tshul rnams rab tu snang / zhing gi rnams ni bsam mi khyab/ 
197a4(1): rgyud rnams mi zang shin du byung / rgyan rnams bsran pa tha dad de// drang srong chen po'i byin brlabyas// zhing gi rgyud rnams de dag na// 'jig rten bsam gyis ma
197a5(1): khyabs khams// kun nis 'du zhing rnam par 'jig/ 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams ni// 'jig rten khams rnams 'byung ban/ 
197a6(1): ji lta shing gi skye gnas nas// shi 'og sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin zhing gi hU~M ni rnams na// sems can sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// ji lta sa
197a7(1): ben khyA ba b+hai gyi// 'bras bu sna chags snang bltar// de bzhinalas kyi khyab par gyis// sems can rnams dang zhing 'byung ngo // yid bzhin ni chen
197a8(1): rgyal po yi rnams/ khadag kun snang ba ltar// sems can thabasam pa rnam dag pas// de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu sdang // klu yi rgyal po sprin gyi rnams/ 
197a9(1): jim shing la lo ma rnams// 'byung zhing ltung bar 'gyur ro lta pa/ de bzhin zhing gi rgyung rnams ma/ 
197b1(1): namakha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar/ de bzhin sangs rgyas ston lam gyis// zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin// sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis// sa rnam
197b2(1): tshogs ston pa ltar// de bzhin sems can las rnams kyis/ bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byung ngo // ji ltar re me'i gzugs kyi rnams// ri ma'i las kyis
197b3(1): bris pa ltar// de bzhin zhing rnams 'di dag kun// sems kyis rimar bris pa yini// ji ltar sems kyis brtag par ltar// de bzhin ning gi rnam pa yang
197b4(1): thams cad las kyis rnam par bris// ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin// mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar/ 
197b5(1): de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o// pad+ma'i dra ba phyi rol gyi// sems can zhing gi mtshams rnams dang // dbyibs dang kha dog gzhan dang gzhan// dri ma med
197b6(1): pa sna tshogs snang // pad+ma'i dra ba de dag la// zhing gi dri ba rab tu gnas// rgyan dang bstan pa sna tshogs te// sems can sna tshogs mang po'i gnas// 
197b7(1): zhing gi dbyings rnams la la ni// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par gnas// sems can rnams kyis nyon mongs las// chos nyid de dag nang na snang
197b8(1): kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag tu// zhing gi rgyud ni bsams mi khyab// sems can bsam pas rab tu byung // byang chub sems dpa' rnams
198a1(1): kyang 'khor// la la rnam dag nyon mongs can// zhing gri dbyings ni rnam pa mang // byang chub sems dpa' rnam par sprul// 
198a2(1): rgya mtsho las byung ba ya ni// zhing rnams la la'i 'od btang ba// ra ni cen rang bzhin dri ma med// rnam par sna tshogs dri med dag/ sangs rgyas rnams
198a3(1): kyis yongs su sbyangs// zhing gi rgyud rnams la lan// bskar ba'i me ni bsam mi khyab// kun nas nyon mongs rnams la ston// zhing gi dkyil 'khor
198a4(1): shin tu sra// rlung gi phung po sngon lam dang / chu'i phung ba la rab tu gnas// zhing gi rnam pa shin tu mang // sems can las kyis bsngags pa yin/ 
198a5(1): zhing na gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing gi chos nyid snang la ltos// de dag 'byung ba gang yang med/ de dag la ni 'dzag pa'ang med// skad cig skad
198a6(1): gcig sems kun la// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis// nang rnams rab tu 'byung ba'i rnams// shin tu dri med dag pa lngas// zhing

198a8(1): la rdo rje'i dngas// kun mas cad mangs 'jigs pa che// bdeb chung 'ang sdug bsngal meng // bsang ram sa rung ba'i gnas kyang ya/ 
198b1(1): zhing rnams la la lcags kyi dngos// la la zangs kyi dngos su gnas// sdig pa'i las kun tu gang // ri dang phrag gis mnyam pa med/ 
198b2(1): 'jig rten den dmyal ba yi// sems can sdug bsngal skyabs med pa// mun pa rjes su rnyed gyur tsong // me lce rgya mtsho'i ra'i nang na 'bar// 'on kyang byol
198b3(1): sang skyes gnas su// lus ni mngon par 'byung 'gyur kye te// bdag gyi lus kyi nyesra ba yis// sdug bsngal tshor ba mang du myang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten
198b4(1): rnams na'ang snang // skom dang bkres pas rab tu mnod// me'i ri yis gdung ba yi// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur// la la ra ni chen bdun
198b5(1): las byung // la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas// dge ba'i las kyis byung po ste// sna tshogs khyim gyis rab tu brgyan// mi dang lha rnams la la ni// 
198b6(1): mtho sa ngag gi 'jig rten na// dge ba'i bson nas 'bras bur ldan// dga' ba de dag ltos// spu'i rtse mo gcig la yang // zhing rnams bye ba bsam
198b7(1): mi khyab// sna tshogs dbyings kyang tha dad de// de dag 'dres pa grang yang med// rang rang so so'i las kyis na// sems can khams rnams bsam mkhye

199a2(1): nas gnas// tsan dan gser las yongs su byung // 'byung / 'od 'phro sprin gyi mdog dang mnyam/ zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos// spos kyi gos kyis kun
199a3(1): nas g.yos// la la pad+ma gcig la ste// byang chub sems dbas yongs su rgyas// lal mtshams kyi mdog dang 'od// nang rnams rin chen dri med// mig
199a4(1): 'phrul 'od kyang rab tu 'gyed// 'od zer dra bas sdang bar byas// zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i dngos su spos la gnas// la la nor bu'i 'od kyang

199a6(1): byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang mnyam// la la mchog shing rnams dang // la dkyil 'khor sna tshogs te// nor bu'i sprin gyis kun du khyab// zhing gi
199a7(1): dkyil 'khor rnams par dag/ zhing rnams la la pad+ma'i mdongs// snang ba bzang pos rnams par bres// sangs rgyas sprul pa yang dag yin// 
199a8(1): zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab// rinin chen cong ba sna tshogs kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang // gang na las de bzhin lal 'byung / 
199b1(1): can dang bye ma sna tshogs dang // 'od dang sprul pa'angar ba tu 'gyed// mdzad bu rnams par sdang ba'i 'ong // sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od gzer rnams// zhing rnams
199b2(1): 'byung ba rab tu brjod// la la rgyan dang 'ad cig par// zhing rnams dri ma med par snang // la la rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// rnam par sna tshogs rab tu
199b3(1): brgyan// la la zhing rnams bcu dag gi/ rgyan gyis mngon par rab tu brgyan// la la zhing rnams stong dag dang // rnam par brgyan cing rab tu gan/ 
199b4(1): zhing gi rgyan rnams bye ba yis// zhing rnams la la rnam par bris// sna tshog rgyan dang tshul rnams tha dad par// sna tshogs mag khor lta bur snang // brjod
199b5(1): du med pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgyan cag la yang rab tu snang // 'od ni gzhan dang gzhan bkye ba// sangs rgyas smon lam mthu' las byung // smon lam
199b6(1): rgya mtshon ma mang bas/ zhing rnams la la rnam par sbyangs// de dag rgyan mang thams cad snang // kun tu zhing gi rgya mtsho thams cad stong // kun tu bzang
199b7(1): po'i smon lam gyis// rlung rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa// de dag kun la dus gsum gyi// zhing gi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang // zhing gi rgyud kyi rnam
199b8(1): sprul pa// kye ma rgyal ba'i sras dag ltos// ma 'ongs pa yi zhing rnams kyang // rmi lam bzhin du dag snang // ji la snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rjen gyi
200a1(1): @'das pa'i nang rnams rgya mtsho lang // zhing gcig gnas na thams cad snang // mag yor gzhan du sprul pa yin// dus gsum
200a2(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rnam thul zhing rnams gang yod pa// ning gi rgyud mi 'di la spang // kun kyang ningan yod pa// zhing gi rdul gyi rje mo la// sangs rgyas
200a3(1): thams ca rnams rdul pa// shar bas de dag kun snang ba// mig la mtshan nyid med pa'o// lal r+b+ha man+d+ha 'idabyings su 'dug/ nang brgyab rgya mang pa dag
200a4(1): lngas/ rdzi ba ri yid byi bas 'dra dang // 'jig rten khams ni bsam mi khyab// na rnams lal rnam par bris// migag yor dbyis su gnas pa ste/ 
200a5(1): sna tshogs shing ging byibs su gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun du khyab// zhing rnams nor bu'i 'khor lo'i dbyibs// lawa pad+ma khri dbyibs su gan
200a6(1): it+pa lag rgyad pa sna tshogs mang // sna tshogs kha dog drim meng // lal khri ying bri bas lta bu// gra'i dbyibs dang khyang khyud de// lngal grong khye
200a7(1): dbubs 'jig/ nings pa'i lus s+yA thuganas// lha nga bang ba'i gtsug dang byings// zlag 'am/ la gnas// ning bur yod byingasas
200a8(1): 'khod // ting ma 'idakyil 'khor dbyings kyang dra// sras chu'i rgya mche'i grongs thong // 'jog ngam khams rnams rab tu gnas// 'od kyi kyil
200b1(1): 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs// 'khor lo bkra shis dbyibs lta bu// 'jig rten la la'i dkyil 'khor te/ 
200b2(1): mdzad spu'i spyi drug dbyibs lta bu// la la mig gi tshul yang 'dra// sangs rgyas phyog gi dbyi bsnga lta bu// la la rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dug/ 'od 'ja
200b3(1): yi dbyings kyang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu gang // zhing rnams la sa seng ge'i dbyibs// nor bu'i go char mngon bsgrubs pa// gzugs
200b4(1): dang dbyi bas ni du ma ste// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas// zhing gi rgyud ni gcig la yang // zhing gi dbyings rnams mi zad pa// rab tug ni
200b5(1): pa'i byin brlabs dang // sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung // zhing rnams la la po skal pa tsam// lal bskal bcu pa ste/ zhing rnams la la rdul mnyam
