200b7(1): pade bzhin bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med// zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas bcos// pa la'i 'dir sangs rgyas gcig/ la la'i sangs rgyas
200b8(1): mang po yi// sangs rgyas med pa'i zhingadi rnams dang // 'jig rjer gzhan gyi khams su yang // sangs rgyas sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing // rnam par 'phrul por
201a1(1): tu ston// 'bru dang byung ba sku tshe dang / byang chub sems mngon par 'chang brgya dang // bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang // chos kyi
201a2(1): 'khor lo bsar bston// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang sngon// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// 'jig rten kun
201a3(1): la d+hing // sangs rgyas 'di rnams re rer yang // rgyal ba gcig ni skyes gyur te// waM grangs bye ba phrag stod du// chos kyi dam par bskon// sems can sa ngas
201a4(1): gyur la// sangs rgyas ston pa mi mdzad de// sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas na// de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong // sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing gi rnams// zhing
201a5(1): rnams re re dag tu yang // sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye// rgyal ba so sa de dag na// rgyal ba mang po rab 'gyed ces
201a6(1): chos kyi dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// nang rnams la la'ang med de// mun pa 'jig pa shin tu che// reg na sdug bsngal
201a7(1): gr-i'ang // bldan mi bzang sti yang gza'o// zhing rnams lal la 'od can// lal khyim gi 'ong can te/ lal zhing ma'i 'di dang ldan// song gi d+ha ba
201a8(1): mi khyab// zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od// zhing gi 'od can dri ma med// gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba// deng dag sems can dge bas byung // la lar 'ong can
201a9(1): dag 'i// zhing rnams la la nar bu'i 'ong // lal mar meda'i 'ong can te// sems can rnams kyi las kyis byung // zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'ang / 
201b1(1): byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang // zhing rnams la la pad+ma'i 'od// 'od 'phro 'ang can rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams lal me doga'o// spos chu'i 'ad
201b2(1): ldan pa yang yong // spos chu'i dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro can// smon lam dbang gAs rnam par sbyangs// zhing rnams la la sA ni 'od can// nor bu'i go cha
201b3(1): 'od kyis gsal// sangs rgyas byan gyis brlabs kyis sdang // yang du 'ong ba'i sgrang dbyangs ljon// ra ni cen cod pan 'od dang ldan// rdo rje gser gyi 'ong
201b4(1): snang // yongs su dag pa'i sgrang dbyangs can// de dag na ni sdug bsngal med// thams cad rgyan gyi 'od can dang // zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la snying
201b5(1): po byang chub 'ong // 'khor rnams kun tu snang // sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sdang ba'i sa can// sangs rgyas spu gyis mngon par yog/ kun du 'od kyis rab
201b6(1): tu snang // chos kyi dbyibs dang mnyam pa'i 'od // zhing rnams la la 'jigs sgra can// mi zad 'jigs pa'i nga rol can// rtsu bcang rlung ba'i sgra rnams dang // 
201b7(1): yid 'ong 'jigs pa chen po sgog/ dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams// mya ngan rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rnams// 
201b8(1): nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung // lal dag na ya'i 'ong sbra// dga' bar byed cing sngon 'joms pa// dge ba'i las dang bras bu'i dbyangs// nang
202a1(1): gi 'khor na rab du skrag/ bal brgya byin ltung bang dbyings// gnan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te// 'jig rten kun
202a2(1): gyi dbyangs su yang // la la'i zhing nas rab tu grag/ zhing rnams la la sprin gyi sgra// ran chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang // nor bu'i shing gi gzugs sgra dang / 
202a3(1): rol mo'i sgo dang // rol ma'i sgra yis kun tu khyab// 'od zer klog gi sgra rnams dang // sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i snga
202a4(1): dag dang // 'od zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung // chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang / kha gcig ni ngan bsemayas pa'i// sngon lam rgya mtsho'i di re dang / 
202a5(1): sbyong ba'i sgra dbyangs sman pa 'byung // dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ mtshan kyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang // de dag ning rnams 'byung ba'i sku/ 
202a6(1): zong ba med pa'i dbyings stegs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sna dang // chad mengs dang pha rol byan// chos kyi rang bzhin spangs kyang // kha ci
202a7(1): nga na dra ba tu grags// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi// sgra mi zhing rnams bye ba byin// bsalnga par gnas spyir rab tu sgeg/ sna dbyangs 'byin
202a8(1): pad migs// ming gi byings rnams la 'an/ sangs rgyas rnams par stsol po dza// skam mchos kyi dbyings bka' ba/ de dag
202b1(1): kun na rab tu grag/ sha ni tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba las 'jig rten gyis khams kyi rgyud rnam par bkod pa shin tu bstan
202b2(1): ba zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dgu pa'o// bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// // rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi kham
202b3(1): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol// dI bas kyang pha rol ma snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu
202b4(1): snang ba zhes bya ba'i dus su// 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de na/ rin po che'i ba
202b5(1): 'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa// 'jig rten gyis khams ri rib kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis skor ba/ 
202b6(1): kun nas zum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis shing gi 'khor yug brgya stong phrag gsum
202b7(1): gyis kun nas bskor ba/ ra ni po che'i rgyan tshe thams cad kyi kun nas yog pa/ ri ra ba dang / grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med cing 'ong rnams
202b8(1): par dag par snang bas brgyan pa// zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi lang sbyong yid kyis bsam pas 'byung ba/ rgyan gyis rnam par brjod pa sna chog
203a1(1): dang ldan pa brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ spos chu'i rgya
203a2(1): mtsho'i 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de// de las me tog gi ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan gyis rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar rini po che'i khri'i phreng bcu'i'i khang
203a3(1): kyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ ri rab de'i steng na/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal
203a4(1): mtshan sang phrag dpag tu med pa shini tu med pa shin du bsgreng ba'i rgyan can me drug gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par bris pa/ nang bu'i
203a5(1): pa brtsegs pa/ rnam par bkod pa'i rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog bu rika dpag tu med pa'i phred kyi kun
203a6(1): nas bkang ba/ sras dang ni ba rba'i bad ma pa dpag tu med pa'i thams cad kyis rab tu brdzun pa/ ral ma su chags kyi sgra ya'i dubang ba'i sprin dpag tu rgyas / 
203a7(1): ma sa 'a 'ad 'bras pa'isgo mi pag tu byed bas kus srung bar byas/ khyod khyer byug zag ga ba srung rtsig pa sems can rnamams
203a8(1): ma ra pa/  mas la pa la 'i rgyas panas kya sa thugs gas za
203b1(1): 'od thob snang ba zhes bya ba mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya sdang phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ ra ni pa che 'ba' smrig lngas byas pa/ rlung
203b2(1): du dag cheng srong brag bdun yong ba/ rin po che'i snga chags kyi shing \u0f7fdang / phru mar ni bdun gyis rgyan cing kun nas bskor ba/ rin n+ya rgya'i 'obs sus kyi nus
203b3(1): gang po/ ra ni bain+ti'i me tog ut+pA k+Sha~M/ bad+ma dang / kun mu ta dang / me tog prAn+d+ha rikas rnam par brgyan pa/ bdun gyis kun nas bskor/ shing zha la'i nga
203b4(1): brgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po'i byin pa/ bdud gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang khang brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sbed nas gser gying
203b5(1): ba dang / dri bu'i'adri ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i dI ba dang / in+d+ra nI la'i ba dang / rdo rje'i pad+ma'i dra bas kun nas ga phyogs pa/ rin po che'i shing drung me tog
203b6(1): dra ba dang / rol po'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin ling du 'ong bas kun du khyab bsdus dang phreng ba'i rkyen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ya de/ de'i 'khor kun
203b7(1): nas slob pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/ snying ngag thams cad kyang ring po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/ stede dag thams cad kyang ni ma
203b8(1): ra ni pa t+ya'i rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// za shing gi rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas
204a1(1): bskod ba ste/ bza' shing gir ba de dag kyang spos dang ni po che shing sna tshogs kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs thams cad
204a2(1): yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// grong khyer chen po 'od 'tho ba'i sngani ces bya ba de ni ma skyes pa thams cad kyang lus kyi rnams par smin pas rdzu 'bral thob pa
204a3(1): dag ste/ namakhar las byung ba/ mi dang lda mnyamang spyad pa/ yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha sreg go/ de nas lce phyogs legs na lha'i grong khyer
204a4(1): gI mag sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de nas lnga phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas lho phyogs logs nA gnos ni
204a5(1): grong khyer rdo rje dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas phyogs lA legs na// dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po zhes bya ba phod
204a6(1): 'da' chags su la la ni gyi glang 'khyer 'khor pa'i dzin ces bya ba yang de// de dang 'dab chags su'adam ma bzang bu'i grong khyer du ba tshasems
204a7(1): babang po'i lci ba zhes bya ba me dang // de dnga'ang ba chags su bram ze ro'i grong khyer rgyan bzang ba sna chags zhes bya bya/ de dag la sngags bgrong khyer
204a8(1): byeb khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan lang po dums brtson pa nas/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig
204b1(1): brgya snang gi 'khor gyis bskur ba'i bar du ste/ nags tshams chen po la la ga'i dkyil 'khor rarin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i dbus na/ skang po byang
204b2(1): chub rin po che'i me tog rnam pa zhes bya ba/ ra ni po che thams cad kyi shing gi yal ga sdug cing rgya che ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ 
204b3(1): ran po che'i me togazugs dang de byibs rnams par tha dad pa shin du mang pos rgyas pa/ spos dang med mar ri po che thams cad kyi kha dog lngar 'dug pa'i phreng ba mang ba
204b4(1): rgya chen po'i sgra ni kun tu bkram par ni po che'i 'od thur tu 'phro bas zhang kun tu khyab pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs
204b5(1): bcu'i 'od gzer mngon pos rnam par snang bar byas pa/ rgyan thams cad ra ni po che sna tshogs mang pos smras pa// rol ma thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin
204b6(1): tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus byung ba/ phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang por ba tu 'byung ba yod de/ 
204b7(1): de'i mdun tu 'byung pad+ma chen po me tog gi zla ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ rgyur dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgyar yod pa/ rtswa bsgos dang ran pa
204b8(1): dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zugs pa/ yu ba ra ni po che sna tshogs kyis tshon gyis rnam par sna tshogs su gyur pa/ rin po che rnam po dad pa tshad med pa'i mdab ma can
205a1(1): dani bacha'ang dro ba dang / spos chu ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan ba snying po la rin po lar nib chena'i kha dag mtha' yas pa
205a2(1): mtshon bkye ba/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa'i bye ba khrag khrig rgya steng phyag bcu'i 'khor gyis skor ba/ phyogs bcur 'od dkyil 'khor rgya chen
205a3(1): po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab
205a4(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs par ni ra ba bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed de dag las de bskal pa'i thog ma thams cad kyi thog
205a5(1): mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi ni rab kyi dbyangs shes bya
205a6(1): / ngas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med pa'i sgra phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yangs su spangs so// kye rgyal pa'i sras dag
205a7(1): rten gyi khams dpal gyi nyes bya ba der lo rgya nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byung de zhes bya bo'i che/ nags tshul chen pa lal ba'odaky-il lA ra ni pa
205a8(1): che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'ang 'gro ba'i sbyin pas
205b1(1): sa mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i sang po can dgyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi skal nga rab tu 'byi/ phyogs bcu dag kyang
205b2(1): gzer gyi dri bas rnam par snang bar byed/ gzhal med khang dang / khang khyim gyi rdul thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'od
205b3(1): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snga ni kyang rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i spyi dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
205b4(1): thams cad kyis mtshan gyi khor lo rab tu gdog pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par bsdu ba pa'i
205b5(1): sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dres pa'i tshogs sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to// de dag ni de bzhin gshes
205b6(1): pa skye ba'i ltas te/ rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jog rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do// 
205b7(1): de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang / snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhom
205b8(1): ba'i de dag thams cad kyang ltas sngon tu byung bas yang dag par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yin tan thams cad kyi ri bo
206a1(1): rab thams cad kyi pal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i smacan/ sangs rgyas kyi rlung rnams cad du yongs su
206a2(1): skye bar rab tu 'phros pa/ sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnams par dag pa/ 'jig can gyi khams thams
206a3(1): du mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa/ mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shan du rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su thugs brnyam rab tu 'byub/ 
206a4(1): 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi skul pa kha dag mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od
206a5(1): dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de/ pad+ma chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur te/ 
206a6(1): ji ltar skyes chu'i rgya mtshan ma par dag pa'i 'ad lar btugs pa'i ri ba me chog gi 'ang 'ong 'tho bas rgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser nani tu 'bang ba'i rgyun ces
206a7(1): ba'i rtse mo la nags tshal chen po yal gu'i dkyil 'khar rin po che'i me tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
206a8(1): dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ring ba bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs pa kun na snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya chen po
206b1(1): kun gyi 'jig rten gyis rgyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shani tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas bdag gis gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying
206b2(1): byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi rI ri bra dpal gyi sprin gyis sra ni mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ 
206b3(1): 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu bkye ste/ 
206b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
206b5(1): kyi yon tan ri ri ra ba dpal gyi sprin gyis 'od zer de dag pa kye mthag tu de'i mdol sems da thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ bsgrib pa'i dra ba thams cad
206b6(1): kyang shan tu bskul/ sangs rgyas lta ba la bsgribs pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam por btsam/ sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par dag/ dge ba'i
206b7(1): rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung / mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i g.yangs pa dang / 
206b8(1): 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par btsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhing / sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang
207a1(1): rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shan tu thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od zer des yang dag
207a2(1): par bsal ba dang / 'dzag rten gyi dbang ba thams cad 'khar brgya snang du ma dag gis bskong cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der drang bar gyur to/ 
207a3(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro bla ces bya ba der rgyal po bldan dga' shin tu gtsang ba'i gros zhes bya ba grong khyer bye ba khrag
207a4(1): khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong brag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// de la bu gzi brjid
207a5(1): chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yod do// rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med blta na bzang ba la sogs stong phrag bcu yod do// de nas
207a6(1): rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ sngon gi dge ba'i rgyus ches bcu khong du chud par gyur to// 
207a7(1): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di l+lat+te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khar ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ sangs
207a8(1): rgyas kyi chos kyang dkyil dbyings la sa kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khang du chu // 'di ltas yul tshangs pa'i sprin gyis
207b1(1): po zhes bya ba zhes rab tu byin pa khong du chud du// 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyun chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen pa khong du chud ngo // 
207b2(1): 'di lta ste sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po khong du chud ngo // 'di lta ste yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas/ yang dag
207b3(1): par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i dga' ba chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa zhes bya ba btang snyoms chen
207b4(1): khong du chud do// 'di lta ste tshul gyi bzhin chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste mos pa rgya
207b5(1): mche'i sgribs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen
207b6(1): pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugaso zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i shos chen po'i sgo khong du chud do// de nas
207b7(1): rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad
207b8(1): la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// nyid mi mang po stong gi chos// mkha' las mngon par 'phags pa bzhin// snying po byang chub dri med la// sangs
208a1(1): rgyas 'dzin shin tu snang // bskul pa bye ba stong dag gis// mgon po 'jig rten 'byung ba na// sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa
208a2(1): rnams// rgyal ba kun na rab tu snang // ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer lo// sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab// gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang // 
208a3(1): de de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhag/ 'od 'phro sbyini rnams rab bkye ba// 'od zer spyan la zad mi shes// 'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed/ 
208a4(1): sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi skra dag las// 'od zer rnams ni dri med pa// sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus// phyog
208a5(1): dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'grengs ltas// sangs rgyas sung ni yid 'ong ba// 'gro ba kun tu rab tu skyugs// 'gro bas kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu/ 
208a6(1): sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod// sangs rgyas 'od kyis theg pa yi// sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu ni/ 
208a7(1): 'gro ba kun kyang dgang skyes// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// ran cen sgra ni rnams rab 'gyed cing // snying po'i sprin gyis rgyal drung / phyogs
208a8(1): bzung ku nas mngon pa'i rang / snying po byang chub 'di la yang // sna'i rgya mtshozab mo grag/ sems cam thams car sdug bsngal ni// sangs rgyas
208b1(1): bar 'phrul la ltas// kun kyang srinu ldan gyur te// dga' zhing shin du mas byas shing / chos kyi rgyal po lta ba'i phyir// 'jig rten mgon gyi drung
208b2(1): 'dang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod pa'i che// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// 
208b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun shwa ni tu grags par gyur to// de nas rgyal po bstan dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i
208b4(1): blo gros kyis// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te// rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// zhing len rnams dang
208b5(1): gzhon nu dang // rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang // tshong ba rnams dang de bzhin du// yul mi rnams dang / kun 'dus shing // grong khyer rnams na kun tu yang // 
208b6(1): rnga sgra dag gisuM myur du sgrogs// kun kyang mthun par ldan cig tu// rgyal blta ba'i phyir deng shig/ sras rnams thams cad kun tu yang // dge ba'i dril ni
208b7(1): sgra sgrogs shing // bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'ding // grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis// rgyan rnams kun kyang
208b8(1): kun tu thos// rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang ba'i rnams// nang bus tshogs brgyan pas// rani tsin dra ba'i bla ze bar rjes// rnam kha'i dkyil 'dre zeb
209a1(1): nas// mam 'di las thams cad dadu// sa ba spya snun gyi s+yA dag b+hU / lam gyi sang brgyan par gyis// rin chen char yang
209a2(1): rkub ba// bzhon par ni can bstan par gyis// rdul ba blta ba'i phyi 'dong ngo // rang rangs si'i 'khod rnams kyis// sna chags sbyin gyi rababachig/ 
209a3(1): kyi tha sa byung gyis/ myum+b+ha d+ma'i dngas drug po par gyis// sras dang ng+gA'i 'ang kyi sbyin// mthas padugs rnams brnam la
209a4(1): dang sa me de dang 'bre n+d+ha dang // gas kyi sprin gyim pob shig/ rirab rnams dang sras kyi// nor bu'i 'khar las brgyan par gyis// dri med ma dan
209a5(1): byi na'i rnams// na mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston// nor bu'i 'gre dang med tog 'phreng / rnams// rgyal ba blta pa'i kun 'deng ngo // de nas rgyal
209a6(1): rini can 'brang ba dri meng dang // rani chen sprin ma'i sprin gyi rnams// nam mkha'i dbyings la bsgrub par gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis lnga/ 
209a7(1): dga'i zhing smra ba'i sems bskyed de// ze dang la khong du bcas pa'i rnams// rgyal ba b.liM b+hi kun 'dod de// de nas rgyal po ba ldan dga' bshin tu
209a8(1): gtsang ba'i bdag pa bsod nams dpal la stsogs pa// bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa 'dzin da // gzi brjid chen po la la sngags pa gzhon nu
209b1(1): brgya dang / blugs kyi stabs la sogs pa blun pa stong phrag drug bcu dang / de dag la sngags pa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang bdun gyi bu rtsa bdun gis
209b2(1): bskor cing 'dun bdar te// grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro sdang ba nas byung nas de'i 'khor dang bcas pa na mkha'i dbyings su mngon par 'phags te// rgyal ba
209b3(1): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang // rgyal po'i mthu chen pos na mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sgra ni thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong
209b4(1): nis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i grong khyod shing gi me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba nas kyang / 
209b5(1): lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng dang ldan cig tu// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan
209b6(1): kyi nabs la spyi bas phyogs 'tshal nas phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // klu'i grong khyer kun rdzogs nas kyang / klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa'i
209b7(1): 'od ces bya ba/ klu bye ba nyisha rdza lnga dang lhan cig tu/ gnod sbyin gi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa'
209b8(1): brgyal ba zhes bya ba gan byor bri ba bdun burtsa bdun dang lhan cig/ dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang babang ba nas kyang // dri ba'i rgyal ba bstan dga'
210a1(1): bzhes bya ba/ dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang / lha ma yin gyi grong khyer lce'i tshe nas kyang / l+h+wa ma yin gyi dbang po gdug
210a2(1): rnam par dgu par las sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ lham yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyi bskur ba/ na mkha' lding gi grong khyer ran pa ches
210a3(1): bzang po'i lde ba nas kyang namakha' lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyad pa zhes bya ba na mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcum bdun dang ldan cig/ mi'i maci'i da
210a4(1): khyord ce ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang / mi'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje'i dpral zhes bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lA cig/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po chen
210a5(1): rdorjesbas pa'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang por rini po che'i grags pa'i rgyal mtshan nas bya ba// lto 'bri chen bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
210a6(1): gsum dang ldan gcig tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang / tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis bam pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bya ba khrag

210b1(1): grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dganas/ sems can gyi ris tha dad par gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder dong ste/

210b7(1): 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi tidi nge 'dzin gyi sgol ye shes snang b.re rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste blo gi ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub
210b8(1): kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes sna tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnams par snang ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par
211a1(1): @dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta sde sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i sran
211a2(1): lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta sti yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i 'o dkyil
211a3(1): 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu the bo po// 'di lnga ste sgra yangs pa nas snang ba bzab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang bar rab tu thob po// 'di lta
211a4(1): ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyisang po dang / mthu chen pa'i rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings mtha'
211a5(1): dang dbus med par sprul pas brgya cwa 'i'abyung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes sdang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med pa
211a6(1): rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par sgrubs pa rgya mtsho ye shes ba duzla ba pa// 'di la skye sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mas po rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan
211a7(1): yang dag par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste ches kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
211a8(1): par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par du bstan pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 
211b1(1): 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos skabs dang mi 'jigs pa thams cad la ye shes kyi smang ba rab tu thob po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pas de
211b2(1): gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi rab kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtshon la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// de'i
211b3(1): che tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di thos nas// bdag gi ye shes sdang ba skyes// des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa// rgya mtsho rnam
211b4(1): kyang rab tu mtho dang // sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur// phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang thong // mtshan gyi rnam pa rnam dmigs dang // gleng gis sangs rgyas mchod
211b5(1): pa'ang shes// sngan chad sangs rgyas drang dag tu// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod sbyong ngo // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas// zhing gi rgya mtsho mang tshad yongs su
211b6(1): su sbyangs// skra yi rgya mtsho mang po dag/ rgya chen yongs su kun btang zhing // spyod pa'i dam pa spyad pa de// rgya mtsho zhing yang shin tu sbyangs// bstan dang
211b7(1): mang rgya mtsho dang // phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te// rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor btang zhing // zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// zhing rnams so sa
211b8(1): rel// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// byang chub sbyad par rabaspyang ngo // zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi// spyod pa rgya mtsho kun
212a1(1): sbyangs// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du// zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu spangs// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khar
212a2(1): mthong ba bzhin// sangs rgyas ye shes 'od snang bas// sangs rgyas yeng shes 'od smrab sngon gyi spong ba rnams kyang mthong // byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yi/ 
212a3(1): chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i// zhing gi rgya mchongag pa las rnams// dri med 'od ces kun kyang mthong // sangs rgyas kun gyi byon brlabs kyis/

212b5(1): tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang yongs su 'dzin tu bcug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri re ba dang

213a8(1): smin par byas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/ kun tu bzang po dba' ba'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rgya

213b6(1): kyang sgra rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo// ye shes rgyas chen po'i byin gyi brlabs dang / chos kyi grong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo// 
213b7(1): kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po'ang rab tu thob pa// dmyigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis brgyas
213b8(1): par byed pa'i snying rje chen po yang rab tu thob po// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan rgya mtsho dang // byin gyi brlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen pa

214a7(1): mi khyab tu// 'jig rten gyi gtso'i dam pashizhin du dkon// sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems camakhar badz+ra ba/ de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mtha
214a8(1): sangs rgyas sku las 'ad rnams rapa mgye ba/ khadag mtha' las rgyal chen rnam par dag/ 'od zer srin gyis 'jig rten kun du khyab/ ma/ 
214b1(1): rgyal ba'i yan can grags par byed// 'od kyi dgi' bskye// 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhing // phan tshun mi byams pa'i sems 'gyur ci
214b2(1): sangs rgyas rnam bral 'di dag kun kyang mthong // bral po'i dra ba stan rnams bsam mi khyab// rnam par du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// phyogs bcu
214b3(1): zhadi rnams kun kyang gang byas shing // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// rgyal ba rnams kyi spyi ze re re nas// dbyangs sngon bkye ba sa

214b7(1): lo bskor// sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul// tshad med rnam par 'phrul ba dag la ltos// zhong rnams kun+da na rgyal ba mngon pa
214b8(1): bzhugs// de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems can don du rnams par ngon sangs rgyas// dga' zhing mis par kun kyang
215a1(1): 'dang bar gyis// bde ba'i yid dang srin sdu ba yis/ bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyi 'dang // dem
215a2(1): sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ni yang dge bskyed byas nying / 'gro ba kun la rnams pa'i sems 'gyur / 
215a3(1): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cang // chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyong bar bya// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis de'i sbrul thigs pa med
215a4(1): bos/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur to// de thos pa'i sems can tshad ming po rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to// 
215a5(1): de yang ba dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong de dag gis bskor cing mdun tu byis te// ra ni pa che'i gdug
215a6(1): kyi spya ni lAs na mkha' thams nad kun nas galegs par byas te// bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der dong ngo // 'ongs bye de dag la bcom ldan 'das pa ro// 
215a7(1): tu byin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyun gyi rmyil ba de bzhin gshegaso bas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma meng pa'i rkyen ces bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams
215a8(1): rdul shin tu bri ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to// nges de rjes nas tshul thams cad rnam par bral 'jug pa'i byang bar rab tu shes so// 
215b1(1): ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang gnon par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gro ba thams cad dga'
215b2(1): bar blta ba'i rgyun ces bya ba la yang zhugs par gyur to// zhing thams cad du yang dge bar 'jug pa dang // snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par
215b3(1): dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs so// smad pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprini dri meng pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba la yang rab
215b4(1): tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su togs pa'i dkyil 'khor ches rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad sdang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to// 
215b5(1): 'jugs pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rU ba tu zhugs so// rang 'byung du gyur pa shin hUM mthong ba'i shugs kyis dang
215b6(1): bskyar ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'odadi rnams par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos
215b7(1): kyang shin tu snang bar 'gyur ro// sman lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa rgya mtsho'i snying pa'i smon lam mngon par smrab pa'i ye shes kyi ste byas la yang
215b8(1): rnam par dag par 'gyur te// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pa rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang ba rgyan gyi rgyal bas// byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po
216a1(1): la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// legs sa yan tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// sangs rgyas byang chub sman lam yang
216a2(1): dag gnas// sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i// rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyis khyab 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho chen po mngon par byung // 
216a3(1): chas kyi dbyings su rnams cad rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas spyad yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i// bsamaM gyis mau khya tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// sangs rgyas tham
216a4(1): cad yon tan sbyin mthong ba'i// ye shes sa yang mi zad ga rten par 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsha kun gyi tshul// grags pa chen pa yongs su rgyas pa
216a5(1): byed/ gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang // so so yang dgar gi tshul mi zod dang // spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngar sgrubs pas/ 
216a6(1): gzhan med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu ma chong 'jug par 'gyur// spun+da lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes pa ste// rnam 'phrul
216a7(1): 'dri la'ang shin tu 'byeng bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab// chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bsam pa rgyu
216a8(1): mtshan rnam par spongs byas te// sangs rgyas smin la rnam par sgrub kra bar gyis/ rgyamatshal ma rnams dri ming rnam par srung // nga yi byang chub su
216b1(1): la 'jug par gyis// sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yis// sbyang pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam spangs pa// de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis
216b2(1): zhing rnams re ra sangs rgyas mang po ngas// rgya mtsho rgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas// stor spyod de yi'i bras bu 'di yin te// 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la
216b3(1): ltos// las kyi rgya mtsho mi zang rgya chen dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag byas spyod ba dang // smon lam bsam las go cha bgos pas na// 'di rnams
216b4(1): 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgya chen spyad byas nas// bsgral ba 'byam klas
216b5(1): kun tu sbyang byas shing // rgyal ba yon tan 'od can mang bar 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang ba'i
216b6(1): rkyen gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas// ldan dga' bshan du gtsang ba'i bdag po dag yang dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzhon gan
216b7(1): brjid chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal sring thob par gyur to// nAg sde tshul chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba
216b8(1): der yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin du 'phags shing zil gyis mi gnon pa zhes bya ba gsum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhi
217a1(1): gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya chen pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas// 'khor thams cad dang dpud kyi yan lag bzhi
217a2(1): 'tshigs thams cad dang / rin po che bdun dang // grong gi mi dang / yul me baicas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya
217a3(1): mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi mnon pa gang na gzugs pa'i drid dod nas// des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa bas ce gus pa spos dang / 
217a4(1): nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi skying bas zhes bya ba phul lo// dring de bzhin gshegs pa des kun du blte ba'i spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa snang ba
217a5(1): zhes bya ba'i mdo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi mdo' 'khor deng bcas pa yang yang dag par bshad par gyur to// de rjes nas
217a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bsod nams chen pos rnams par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa// ting nge 'dzin de thabs kyang
217a7(1): dus gzugasum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsad nams na mA ngon tu gyur ro// de nas bcas ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsangan
217a8(1): kyi sem mams kyi kyi l-i mas cad larnam pa gzugs / khyod chu sems dpa' ma
217b1(1): chen pol tshigs su blaHda de dgasungs pa// yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi rjid can// byang chub mchog gi smon lam yid ldan pa// 'gro ba klun
217b2(1): la snying rje rgya mtsho yasi// nga'i drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs so// snying rje'i skang po khyod ni sems can rnams// sdug bsngal gyur pa kun 'grel
217b3(1): don zhugs pas// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i shin bstan pa'i
217b4(1): rnams// skyo mang yad kyis spyad pa spyod pa dag/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags me pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin du thob 'gyur// de ltar
217b5(1): khyed ni kun du bzang po yi// mthu chen la smon lam spyod par zhugs pas na// bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yani te// bsod nams
217b6(1): 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yin// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes// mtha'
217b7(1): dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho ga rtogs par 'gyur// khyed kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyis
217b8(1): rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin du mthong // dge spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang // sngon chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong // 'di tshul rgya mtsho 'dis su
218a1(1): zhugs shing / ye shes sa la su dgra gnas gyur gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing // thams cad gzig
218a2(1): bar gdon mi za bar gyur/ khyod ni zhing kun rgya mtsho rdul snyed kyi// bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod pa spyad byas nas// rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams// 
218a3(1): bslabs nas rab 'byung zhing du 'gyur bar 'ong // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin// khyod kyi zhing
218a4(1): yang rnam par dag 'gyur te// smon lam kun kyang na ni tu sgrog par 'gyur// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang // khyod kyi smon lam thos 'gyur rab tu
218a5(1): dga'// kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis// byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// mtha' dang dbus med ning rnams 'byam klas par/ 
218a6(1): bsal ba rgya mchidag tu spyad pa spyod// kun tu bzang ba'i stong pa thams cad dang / srin lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis// nags tshal chen
218a7(1): yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de ning du// de bzhin gshegs pa grags bu'i spyan pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to// rgyal po ga
218a8(1): brjid chen po de yang de lanas shi bos nas// rgya mtsho'i sring ni/ lha'i grong khyer rin po chen po'i gnas shes bya ba der phyin phyin te// deng bsod nams dri ma med
218b1(1): pa'i dpal zhes bya bra lnga'i rgyal por gyur to// de nas de lta'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bams te// rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing // bcom
218b2(1): ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+ma'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo // der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
218b3(1): pa grags pa'i spyan pad+ma'i dpal gyis// tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed kyi
218b4(1): mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa// yang dag par stan to// des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// chos
218b5(1): thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to// shan du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba las// rnam par
218b6(1): 'ang 'a zhes bya bcu pa'o// bam ze bcugasu myo 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan
218b7(1): de bzhini gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi zil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa// sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pas/ 
218b8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba ni kun tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs lta bu 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams ni yongasu
219a1(1): 'dzin pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten khams ni
219a2(1): lhan cig spyod pa 'phrul dgu'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs lngar 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyis khams ni kun tu po spyod pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs
219a3(1): ljang 'dug pa/ gling zhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ gnas kyi dam pa mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs lcer 'dug pa/ glang ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum
219a4(1): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyi bas ltar bdug pa/ grong rdal ni mdzad mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi rab ni myang
219a5(1): ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyi bas ltar 'dug pa/ khang pa brdegs pa ni kun nas slad du med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin
219a6(1): chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pan bzhugs te// 'jig chen gyi khams mtshan ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma chang nas kun nas bslang bas/ 'a
219a7(1): rlung btsun gshegs pa'i phyogs gim chil gyi snying pa la gnas par ming mardzud pa 'jig nyin gyi khams rgya mcho babu'i rdul shin du bsed kun kyang de bzhin gan
219a8(1): pa'i sku dbyibs su 'dug pa sa stag dang gzhung de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / can rdzas kyi lag mthil gyi snying po la rab drug / 
219b1(1): par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang nathas kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin gshegs pa dulA dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
219b2(1): dI za'i dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / ma'i maci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mdi mim yin po'i lag thil go snying po rab tu gnas par
219b3(1): ming thun pa thams cad kyang / mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su skor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ sangs rgyas
219b4(1): kyis rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
219b5(1): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phrab snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o// 
219b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' sa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyil ga pa dang ldan pa'o// snying rje chen po rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
219b7(1): shin du ba bA snyed kyi sed pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin 'jam par grol ba chen pa rgya mtsho'i 'jig rteran gyi khams rgya batsho bcu'i rdul shin
219b8(1): za ba nyid kyis dang ldan pa'o// zhan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i rgyamatsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i tshul shin tu
220a1(1): bskyed kyi baspu'i bug dang ldan pa'o// rang sang+yas rgyas kyis rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi du
220a2(1): bskyed kyi lta zur dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos kyis 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyi brla dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam
220a3(1): pa byung ba rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams kyi sman lam rgya ma dzi
220a4(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mchod ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye hrIs gang chen mtsho'i
220a5(1): rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin+da tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin+da gtsug dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mkha'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
220a6(1): rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi dbrel ba dang ldan dang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gis 'od gsal po rgya mtsho 'jig rter gyi na khams rgya mtsho bcu
220a7(1): rdulazhin du phra ba snyed kyi mdzad spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub kyi las rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sman rnams dang ldan
220a8(1): nga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin gyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnams par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya tsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
220b1(1): mig dang ldan pa'o// de bzhir gshegs pa stan gyi khams kyi gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya bcwa bcu'i rdul nan
220b2(1): tubya ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs kyi khams gang chen mtsho'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mche 'jig rten gyi khams
220b3(1): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phye ba snyed kyi snga ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i dzin
220b4(1): rten khyams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shani tu pra ba sked kyi lce dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i khams gang chen pa mtsho rnams par snang mdzad kyi dbang ba rgya
220b5(1): mtsho 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra be smad kyi lus dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khams gang chen mche/ rnam par snang
220b6(1): mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho bcu'i brdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi
220b7(1): sku sprul pa rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin+da tu phra bsnyed kyi sku drung ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun 'dul ba dang / 
220b8(1): nyan tho dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdule shan tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems
221a1(1): dpa' dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi mdo dang ldan pa ma
221a2(1): rnams par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi rol rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khrims rgya mtsho
221a3(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sgom dang ldan pa'o// sems can yongs su sman pa rgya mchi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bcu 'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed
221a4(1): kyi zas dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshang med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o// 'di ltar 'jig rten

221a7(1): 'jig rten gyi kham+b+has rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu prA ba snyed kun du bres so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten go khams sa rgya mtsho'i
221a8(1): thar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'i bu'i rdul shin pa ba snying rnam par bkram pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang / rgya
221b1(1): mtshan dang / bdun 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed kyis kun du khe bras par bkang ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mched
221b2(1): ni kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du zla ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du
221b3(1): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang re dang reg bya dang chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du pra be snyed kyi snying po 'dang ldan
221b4(1): ba'o// mag sna tshogs kyi chu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du rnam pa dang // 
221b5(1): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho becu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan po'o// 
221b6(1): dag gi chu rgya mche re rI nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re rer las kyang me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams
221b7(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bya ba skyed mngon par mngon mngon te/ me tog pun d+hA rig de dag re re la'ang / me tog ut+pala'i 'khor dang / me chog
221b8(1): pun+da ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa ste/ me tog u dpal dang / me tog pun d+ha
222a1(1): ri kA'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnams par phye ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i drul shin tu phra
222a2(1): snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ro'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i tshal tsha dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gyi kha smyig ma'i tshal mang
222a3(1): pongag kyang mngon par 'thon pa sasngag go/ ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu'i rgya mtsho zhes na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu yi
222a4(1): ngam khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi ma 'am
222a5(1): chen pa'am/ chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ thA gnyi ngan pa'am/ rgyang ring po'am/ tha ga nye bar yang rung ste/ gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang
222a6(1): bar se so'o mig gi mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog chu rgyu ma zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du
222a7(1): gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya ba dang / chos kyi chu rgya mcho dag kyang thos par bya'o// ci'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho nas bya nas byan
222a8(1): na/ de dag du sems can gang yang rung se mthung ngam khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyi khams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam
222b1(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyid dag na/ gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am// ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang ging 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ che ba
222b2(1): 'am/ chung ba'am/ bzang ba 'am/ dam pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba'am/ tha ga nye ba yang rung ste/ gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar
222b3(1): rang rang gi mug gis mngon par thor bas/ de'i phyir mig gi chachu rgya mtsho rnams la/ mig gi chu rgya mtshon zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du rnam pa dang // snang
222b4(1): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi cha rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gi khams de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig
222b5(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyis lAn sha ni tu brgyas pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i byad bzang po 'jig rten
222b6(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul zhin tu phra ba srid kyis rnams par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no// chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shAn tu pra bra snyed
222b7(1): kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shani du phra
222b8(1): bsnyed du rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re la'ang bzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin
223a1(1): gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying ba la rab tu gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi sang pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 'a gyi
223a2(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhe bAn/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na/ rdul shin tu hA
223a3(1): bskang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnams par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de// de dag gi
223a4(1): sbe na chos kyi dbyings kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyeng rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na ma mkha'
223a5(1): dbyings rgya mtshos mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi
223a6(1): steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drug shul tsan+da nas bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyeng rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na/ rgyu'i
223a7(1): khams rgyam mo snang rtsi can nas bye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche ba bcu rdul shin tu bri bsnyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi spang na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rnam
223a8(1): 'i gang ban zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul gni du tha ba sring rab tu gnas sa ngag gi seng na mecig mtshan ma med pa las skyes
223b1(1): zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshe bcu'i rdul shin tu b+hA bsnyed mngon par 'thun te// me tog de dag kyangs so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'acu
223b2(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gI tha gru dang ldan pa dgra ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas/ 
223b3(1): de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi tha lo gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dal// de'i bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi
223b4(1): mthil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la stegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni len dran
223b5(1): tshad med dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dam po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ yon tan ji
223b6(1): snyid yod pa'i yon tan de skad ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho den yang de// 'jig rten gyi kham su ra'i kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ tshangs pa'i
223b7(1): lnga'i lus kyi dbyings su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de// 
223b8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten
224a1(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bar rim chen po'i khri phrang du 'dug pa// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed dang
224a2(1): ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du pa bsnyed dang ldan pa'o// ci'i phyir zhes na/ 'jig rten gyi
224a3(1): khams ri rab kun du bzang po zhes de la/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po ngan/ yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi
224a4(1): khams gang yang med de/ deng sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa/ de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs pa de dang dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod
224a5(1): bo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri re ba tu bzang po zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni// de ltar de dag la stsogs
224a6(1): pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor bang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya man de ni yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de skyed kyi yon tan ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
224a7(1): rirab kun tu bzang po de yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang bo na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes
224a8(1): bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug/ snying gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams mang ba
224b1(1): rgyams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba yod de/ spang ba gsum gyi snang ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin bden/ lha'i rnam
224b2(1): par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du klu'i dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin
224b3(1): dang / na mkha'i ljang dang / mi'amaci dang / lte phye chen po dang / mi dang mo ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
224b4(1): bra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa dgod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin
224b5(1): du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed la shin
224b6(1): rab tu gnas pa'o// stong gsum gri stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji skad cig skyes pa de dag kyang
224b7(1): 'du shes tha dad pa ma rtogs par lam gri rgyu dang dad pa med do// theg pa tha dad pa med de// stong pa gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
224b8(1): 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la/ ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa deng / 
225a1(1): sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa thams cad la ngan song gi rigs pa'ang med/ theg pa dma' bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med
225a2(1): gser snar ltung ba'i 'jigs ming/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jig
225a3(1): ba yang med/ rnam par 'phrul par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yang med/ shes rab kyi rgyal bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med pa sa/ de'i phyir yongs su dzin
225a4(1): pa'i stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
225a5(1): khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yonas tan tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ mngon 'jig rten khamasu ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji skad cig yod pa de snyed
225a6(1): kyi yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa 'di na/ stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig
225a7(1): spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dga'i lha'i dbyibs su 'jug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu zab
225a8(1): sbed kyi 'khor gyis slong ba yod de/ srong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyad pa zhes bya ba den/ rnab tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'o rgya mtshom
225b1(1): pa dang mi bral lo// nag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang ma 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral
225b2(1): lo// dzag ta de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya brgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskong ba
225b3(1): rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas tham
225b4(1): cad bu dud du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi'i bral// rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa brgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// snod gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams
225b5(1): lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang dang nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
225b6(1): tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul ta shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten
225b7(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha sdug go/ sdong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la/ 
225b8(1): ci'i phyir lhan cigi spyod pa zhes bya ba zhen// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
226a1(1): mang po// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi chos dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad du rnam par gyu
226a2(1): bar lhan cig spyad pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la stsogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ldan cig spyod pa de ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdoran
226a3(1): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yon tan gang ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni sdong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ldan cig
226a4(1): spyod pa de na yod de// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyad pa zhes bya ba de dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi kham
226a5(1): mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis skor ba yod de/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ 
226a6(1): bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul zhing tu pra bsnyed kyis rab tu rgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'odas
226a7(1): bamatha' yas kyi chos kyis// 'jig na gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du bya ba snyed kyis rgyas pa gang ba// rjes kyi dbyings rgya mtsha 'jig rten gyi khams
226a8(1): rgya mche ba bu'i rdul shin du phra pa snyed kyis mngon par dran pas/ srang gi 'jig kyi khams kun tu sbyad pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can gang ji sang skyes pa de dag
226a9(1): na/ stong gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya
226b1(1): thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred la rab tu gnas pa na sngag sa/ de bzhin gnyen
226b2(1): du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
226b3(1): tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar lo ba tu gnas pa/ 
226b4(1): mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i rgya mtsho 'jig
226b5(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lar btu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ 
226b6(1): ci'i phyir san stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyad pa zhes bya ba de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba zhe na/ kha 'dzeg rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i 'jig
226b7(1): rjen gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dgon/ chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams
226b8(1): mtsha dang / byang chub sems dpe'i khams rgya mtsho dang / sems can gyis rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa zhes
227a1(1): bya ba'o// de ltar de dag la sngags pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni yon tan chad med pa dang ldan
227a2(1): pra ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yong ba'i yon tan de dag ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
227a3(1): kun tu spyod pa na yod do// snong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ glang bzhin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba mche ma'i lha'i lus kyi
227a4(1): dbyings su 'dug pa/ glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de
227a5(1): stong bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyun 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed
227a6(1): kyis rnam par rgyan pa ste// snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang sing gol khri rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed bya
227a7(1): tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri rgyun de dgu re rol yang byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed med po 'khod
227a8(1): baM ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi khams dam pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pade dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa
227b1(1): kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par smra ba
227b2(1): pa'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul sha ni du phra ba snyed pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
227b3(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha sdug go// ci'i byar na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyis dam pa zhes bya ba de la/ 
227b4(1): gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba zhe na/ spong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang // 
227b5(1): gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyis dam gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog bya bas na/ de'i phyir glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
227b6(1): gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba'o// de ltar de dag la stsogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi ngem pa zhes bya ba de ni// yon tan gzhal du
227b7(1): med pa' dang ldan pa ste/ mdor bar ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sbyong ba na/ yon tan gang ji snyed pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling bzhin pa'i
227b8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa den yod do// gling bzhi pa'i 'jog rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan
228a1(1): sa bya ba/ sum bcu na gsum gi lA'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche bcu'i la
228a2(1): shin du bskyed kyi 'khor gyis song ba yod do// gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba den rin pa che'i khang pa brdegs pa ltar 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho mang
228a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phru bstod kyis kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis 'od zer gyi brgya mtsho// 'jig
228a4(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul du bye bsnyed kyis kun du khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa sku/ 
228a5(1): gling byang chubs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der sems cad gang ji snyed skyes par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho byang chub kyi rgyun
228a6(1): gyi dam par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas/ thug pa tha dad pas 'byung ba// rgya mtsho 'jig rten
228a7(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lam ShA ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thA dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho bsu'i shin tu phra bskyed
228a8(1): bar srung pa sha stag go/ ci'i phying na glid byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhe na/ grong byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan den/ byang chub kyi shing ma mkha' rten
228b1(1): ces bya ba byad kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ de skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
228b2(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bas/ de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la/ byang chub kyi rgyal
228b3(1): mtshan zhes bya'o// de ltar dude dag la sogs pa glang byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdon glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
228b4(1): gyi khams gnas kyi dam bde na/ yon tan gang yang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na yod do// gling byung
228b5(1): rab kyi rgyal mtshan de na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyings su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyam
228b6(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do// grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgyu
228b7(1): mtsho/ 'jig rten gri khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgos pa'i phyir rgya mtshor
228b8(1): re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi'o bas rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// ting nge 'dzin kyi
229a1(1): 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul zhin
229a2(1): tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing pa/ de dag bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / 
229a3(1): yon can gyi me toga.u pal dang / pad+ma dang / kun mu ta dang / pranad+hA ra ka jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed kyis kun+da nas khyab
229a4(1): par gang ba'o// gling rdal mdzad mtha' las bde na/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che shin du rnams par dag pa'i phagu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
229a5(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed las gsugs pa/ sa bcu'i khang pa bags pa dang / gnal med khang gi 'bring brgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi
229a6(1): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnams par che ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa dang / sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag
229a7(1): thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshe gas pa rnam par grang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang / nal rgya mtshal rab zhugs pa/ skung cig slong ci ba
229a8(1): can gyi khams sna tshogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul zhin tu phra bsnyed yongs su mya ngan las bai zla ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa ches/ 
229b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po khur/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed bkur
229b2(1): bal yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas ba zhes bya ba de la mdzad mtha' yas pa zhe na/ grong rdal mtha' yas pa de'i
229b3(1): de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shan tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba 'am/ rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu
229b4(1): phra ba 'am/ na mkha'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste/ de ba zhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho// 'jig rten
229b5(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed ma bzhag pa/ da lta bu gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas bde la mdzod mtha'
229b6(1): yas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la stsogs pa grol rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling byang
229b7(1): chub kyi rgyal mtshan na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ grong la mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni/ bza' shing gir mya ngan dang
229b8(1): bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
230a1(1): shin tu bla bcu'i bskyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do// bza' shing gir ba mya ngan dang bral ba den/ nags chal
230a2(1): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i shin tudu phra ba snyed yod de// nags tshal de dag kyang ses nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khan
230a3(1): rgya mtsho 'jib bu'i rdul shin tu za bsnyed kyi tshu las grub pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi 'ang rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba
230a4(1): snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan
230a5(1): pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyo ba brgya mtsho// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyilam
230a6(1): dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zla ba rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pA bai skad kyi grib ma
230a7(1): gsil ba dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la sna
230a8(1): po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdang ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya maH// bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
230b1(1): snyer gyi mal ga dang ldan pa'o// rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lda ldi dang / chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu
230b2(1): bres pa'o// dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i 'dugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed mdza
230b3(1): bar bsgred pa'o// za shing gir ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni/ rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/ 
230b4(1): rdzing nge dge re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho bcu'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul sha ni tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// 
230b5(1): rding de dag re re zhing yang de dag bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dang / yon tan gyi me tog u dpal dang / pad+ma dang / pun d+ha ri kA 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
230b6(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu nas khyab par gang ba'o// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig 'dod pa dang thams cad kyang
230b7(1): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen po mtsho'i sku dang / thugs dang 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho// 'jig rten
230b8(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred rab tu thob par gyur pa sha stag go/ dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang la rnam pa
231a1(1): spyad brgyab tsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu prA bsnyed dang ldan pashasugs/ ci'i phyir na bza' shing gi
231a2(1): mya ngan dang bral de myangan dang bral ba zhes bya zhes na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngan dang bral ba zhes
231a3(1): bya ba bzhugs s+ho/ de dang 'thun pa'i sku grub pas/ de'i phyir ni ba shing gir ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// de dag la sogs pa
231a4(1): brda' zhing gi ba mya dran dang bral ba de ni la mnyan chad med pa dang ldan ste/ mngo na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pan/ yon tan gang ji skad yod pa de srid kyi yin
231a5(1): tan ni// bza' shing gir ba mya ngan dang bral ba de 'bod do// bza' shing gi rab tu mya ngan dang bral bde'i rlung na/ khang pa brtags pa kun nas slad du med pa zhes
231a6(1): bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams pa rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshon bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
231a7(1): kyi khang dang ldan pa yod de/ khang brtsegs bkun nas srad du med pa den/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yan tan na pa rgyas tshogs kyi rang bzhin
231a8(1): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za bsnyed las byung ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi la
231b1(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dang pa'i rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
231b2(1): bra bsnyed rjes su 'dod pa'o// khang brtags pa kur nas slad du med pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gra shegs pa'i
231b3(1): shes gang chen tshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kha
231b4(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul sha ni 'phro ba snyed kyis rnam par sgrubs pa/ ye shes sgyum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu b+hA ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
231b5(1): pa tho ba pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi sde khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa gang
231b6(1): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pra sha stag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kha mu rtsegs pa kun nas smad du
231b7(1): med de la zhesu bya zhes na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'ang ba brtsegs pa
231b8(1): kun nas slong du med pa de la/ kun nas slad du med du med pa zhes bya'o// de dag 'a stsogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas spad du med pa de ni yon tan tshad med
232a1(1): pa dang ldan pa ste/ mang ngan bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ban/ yon tan gang ji snyed yong pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ bza'
232a2(1): gir bkun tu nas slad du med pa de na yod do// de ltar bu'i pho brang khang brtsegs pakun nas slad du med pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi rdo rje'i ldan pa dang / 
232a3(1): ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi gang chen mtsho rnam par snang
232a4(1): mdzad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis rnam par rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul zhin
232a5(1): drub+hu bsnyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang / ma byin pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyirgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
232a6(1): bcu rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas snod de/ 'das pa dang / ma byod pa dang / da ltar byung po'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyis rnam pargya mtsho// 'jig rten
232a7(1): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bri ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs dulnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma ya ni dang / 
232a8(1): rnam 'a bri dang /  byi chen po dang / miding mi mi yin pa'adas pa dang / ma'adas pa dang / dpyir byung ba'i 'khor rnam parda dang brgyamam/ 'jig ce
232b1(1): khams rna ma bcu'i rdul sha ni tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas skor bcing bzhugs so// rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnam patha dad pargyal
232b2(1): nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa'i dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'
232b3(1): re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam parnga dang brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi mkhams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
232b4(1): shin tu phra ba skyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
