232b7(1): lding dang / mi'imaHdang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad
232b8(1): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de ltar 'khor gyi dkyil khor gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa 'am/ 
233a1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya dag na/ mi dang mim
233a2(1): yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan tu zla ba snyed pa de dang las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i par re rangag
233a3(1): kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ban+de'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa sha stag ste// lus rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
233a4(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du pra bskyed pa de dag las/ lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa zla dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod du/ 
233a5(1): mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las mgo re re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam paH dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig
233a6(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba srid pa yod do// de bzhin du rnam pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad
233a7(1): pa/ rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i dul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
233a8(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed nas/ yid kyi dbang po rnam par ngeng ba rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan tu pra ba snyed pade
233b1(1): dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ dbang pobor ba re la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
233b2(1): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul tu shani tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du na pa dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho
233b3(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho nas/ yid kyi rnam par shA dang brgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
233b4(1): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yong ye shes pa rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho bcu'i
233b5(1): rdul shin tu tha gi snyed mdzod// ye shes rnamapa// dad pa rgya ma che 'jig rten gyi khams pa rgya mtsho 'ang bcu'i rdul ga ni du phra ba snying po de dgal la zhes ji snyed ga mi
233b6(1): de dag las/ ye shes re res kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam par tha dad brgya mtsho'i tshul du chos kyi 'khor
233b7(1): rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'di 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shini tu phra ba snyed rab tu skor bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams laji ldang bde bzhin
233b8(1): du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
234a1(1): ci dang / lha'abru chen po dang / mi dang mim yin pa rnams lu lAng shes par bya ste/ lce shes la jilta ba bzhin du
234a2(1): thams cad la yang shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag go gnas kyi yon tan rnam par bye ba
234a3(1): ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe'i byang bzang ba'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgyam
234a4(1): ji skad cig yong pa dang / rkyen gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji skad cig long ba dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par dbye brgya mtsho ji snyed yang bde dag

234a6(1): zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bgengs pa de dag ni// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin 'phra ba snyed kyis bas
234a7(1): brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi rung ngo // bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// 
234a8(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam pa sdang mdzad kyis/ sku'i baspu'i bug re ri nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho ma
234b1(1): rdul ga ni tra pra bsnyed bkye'o// 'od zer rgya mtsho dag re re las kyang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bad+ma rgya mtshol bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
234b2(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i bske re re nas kyang yang dag par bskul ba'i tshig su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
234b3(1): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med mngon par thon to// de dag las yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing yang shar phyogs kyi
234b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba ji skad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re ra la/ byang chub semos dpa'
234b5(1): rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnang sbyin dang / dri za dang
234b6(1): lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding / mi'am cid / lto 'phye chen po dang / mim dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams la yongs su
234b7(1): bskal bar byed do// shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs phyogs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad du yang de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
234b8(1): dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji skad pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho// rnam par snang mdzad
235a1(1): kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhug
235a2(1): pa de dag la de dag la zhus te/ gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya me tshe re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing yang / byang chub sems
235a3(1): dpa'i 'khar rgya mtsho nas/ mi dang mi mayin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyog gi mthal
235a4(1): snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na bder 'dong par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya mtsho bar de dag la/ byung
235a5(1): chub sems dpa' ji skad cig yod pa dang / mi dngam ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de drag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bya
235a6(1): de dag re re bzhid yang lus rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha sdug ste// lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho
235a7(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu zla ba sed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang
235a8(1): kha / khe'i sgo rgya mche 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig bcu'i rdul shin tu zab sed yang ga/ kha'i so re la yang ge rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams
235b1(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shini tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis
235b2(1): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen tshe rnam par snang mdzad la/ lu sar res kyang gA las phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
235b3(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re kyang me dog rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shani tu phra ba snyed kyis
235b4(1): mchod nas// de bzhin du mar med dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba de ni rgya mtsho 'jig rngan gyi
235b5(1): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de/ lce'i re re zhes yang spyong bya rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par stong nas// 
235b6(1): rang rang gi sa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i star rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to// 'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing yang zhu ba rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi
235b7(1): khams rgya batsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba srid yongs su nub byed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye skyes gang chen tshe rnam par snang mdzad des/ 
235b8(1): bus pa do sa ril yang / na tu ldan pa rgyam tsho// 'jog rten gyi khams kyi mche bcu'i rdul gni tha bsad kyis gni du bsan pa mjed de/ byang
236a1(1): chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rgya mtsho'i bar rnam par de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams
236a2(1): pa chos rnamatsho mngan po rnam grangs du mar rnam par bye'o// rnam par bkral la/ gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par bstan no// de nas shAr phyog sna
236a3(1): su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khrims rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad k+Shi gnas kyi
236a4(1): snying po zhes bya ba yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing tshun shes te/ 
236a5(1): thog mar yang dge/ bar du yang dge/ tha mar yang dge ba'i chos don bzang po// yi ge bzang po dag pa/ yongs su gsal ba yongs su byung ba
236a6(1): tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul sha ni tu phra ba snyed la rab tu snyan pa mdzad/ 
236a7(1): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtshanam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par 'thong ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cog mnga' ba dang
236a8(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji med cig mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i yon tan rnam par 'phreng brgya mtsho thos pa 'dzin pa/ 
236b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snod kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang ba rgya mtsho// 
236b2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgya mtsho rab tu sgrogs pargya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
236b3(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yos su spangs 'dzum par dgod pa rgya mtsho 'jig
236b4(1): rjen gyi khams rgya mtsho// bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dung ldan pa/ byamasmra pa chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin+da tu phra ba
236b5(1): sed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su bsgrubs pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
236b6(1): rdul shin tu pra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
236b7(1): skad du ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa
236b8(1): dmigs pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad tu rtogs pa dang
237a1(1): ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i nga nge 'dzin rten yungs shing mi bcu'i shigs la brdzun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
237a2(1): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi snga zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rimi gsi legs par 'brel ba/ rgya mtsho
237a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khrims rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / 'phreng ba
237a4(1): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shan du prA ba skad mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang ra
237a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bo snyed du bzang po gyon pa/ sangs rnams ca
237a6(1): chos kyi rgyun rgya mche// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sdud du tI la gra par phyin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrim
237a7(1): dri zhim pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed kyi spos kyi lus shin du phra bskyed kyi spos kyi lus
237a8(1): shin tu byugs pa dga' ba'i rgyan thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu rba ba srid kyi pha rol tu byon pa'i mchog
237b1(1): thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho baba'i rdul shin pa bskyeng yod de/ de dag kyi khams ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ches rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
237b2(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra snyed 'byung ngo // de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang / snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi spos rgya mtsho
237b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bya ba sred 'i byung ngo // spos rgya mche dag gi dri nim pas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
237b4(1): shan du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas rgya mtshos 'dul
237b5(1): bu'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pas/ dri zhim po rgya mchod dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrin
237b6(1): dri zhim po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred rab tu 'thob po// sems can grang dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs ma
237b7(1): pargya mchos 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi yon tan rnam par phye brgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang
237b8(1): ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa brgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng rab tu thob po// gang gis
238a1(1): dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de bdag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin
238a2(1): brgya mtsho bcu'i rnal shin tu pra ba sgreng rab tu thob bo// gang gis la gnas bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rgya mtsha
238a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba sred rab tu thob po// gang gis mthong la reg pa dang ga thams cad kyang bsod nams dang / ye shes sa
238a4(1): chogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shAn tu pra ba seng rab tu thob bo// gang dag stan cig la lhan cig tu 'khyod pa de dag thams cad
238a5(1): spyang pa byang chub kyi seng ge'i khri rgya mche// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed la rab tu gnas par gyur // gang gis kha dang / 
238a6(1): khar byed par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang rnas par thar ba'i sgo rgya mche 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
238a7(1): sted rab tu thub pa// gang gis padu khyud pa de thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos/ saman ma brjid kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rnon gyis khams sa
238a8(1): bcu'i rdulo shin du ba'o// gang dang chos kyi dbyings su smin par gyur pa deng ga thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rtso mtsho mang po 'jig chen gyi 'ams rgya
238b1(1): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba skyed na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la/ de bzhin gshegs
238b2(1): pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du prA bsked rab tu thob pa dang / yongs su dgu pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya
238b3(1): mtsho rab tu 'anges so// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po ngos yang dag bar skal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams
238b4(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rnga ba rgya mtshos thos nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi sde bas rgya mtsho chags pa med cing sgribs pa med pas de bzhin gshegs
238b5(1): ba sems can thams cad kyis don gang chen tshe rnams par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos
238b6(1): btud te phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrogs pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang dag por skul
238b7(1): ba'i tshigs su bcad ba rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/ de skad ces gsol ba
238b8(1): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen tshe rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po ri ni po che mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
239a1(1): // rgyal ba chen po 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra basbed 'das pan/ 
239a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi thali gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen
239a3(1): mtsho rnam par snang mtsho mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing rje'o// zhes sa chos kyang ston to// yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig
239a4(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed byung ba 'jig yang de'i thus byung ngo // de nas rgyal por ni chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
239a5(1): thams cad kyi don gang rjen mtshornam par spyad mdzad la 'di skad ces gsil to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig tu rten gyi khams rgya ma
239a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa deng / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal
239a7(1): blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkung ba dang / chos nyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de sad rjes gsol pa dang / 
239a8(1): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal por ni chen mang po la 'di sad
239b1(1): sa bAka' stsal na// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab pa dra shes na/ 'grol reg ste rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mame bzhir gshegs pa'i byag
239b2(1): gi 'thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni 'gro ba dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / sken
239b3(1): skur ba dang / chos mnyan par ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byi gyi rla pas ma rtogs par byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin sing po byang chub kyi rgyud rnam par bye
239b4(1): po'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pas kyang / bde blug tu bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi// 
239b5(1): rgyal po chen po de ltar ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos tshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ ngan khyod kyis sngan chad mthong
239b6(1): dam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho phyogs ni gang na 'dug 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dri nas ni nye'am ring de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
239b7(1): ni gang zhig bzhugs shing mchog skyes pa dang / chos rten par mdza dang shas sam/ rgyal por ni can mang bas gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bag
239b8(1): gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshod mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams rgya
240a1(1): mcho de 'dzi nas ni nyi'am nga zhig na mchis pa dang / da ltar den de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 
240a2(1): 'tsho gces zhing chos ston pa ni sras su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gi khams gris ma thos so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi
240a3(1): don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po 'i chen mang po la 'di skad ces bi ki'i stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig gi khams rgya mtsho daphyogs
240a4(1): gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa dang / chos ston
240a5(1): pa legs par bsams shig/ de nas rgyal por rini chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtshal
240a6(1): spogs pa ting nge 'dzin na mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu b+hA ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche phyogs gang
240a7(1): na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag 'di nas na bde'am/ ring ba'am de na du ltung de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho gnos pa dang / 
240a8(1): chos snyan pa yang shes te/ 'jig rten go khams rgya mche de'i mtshan tsam lang ma mdzang // de nis rgyal pa rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya tsha de dag las la
240b1(1): / de bzhin gshegs pasnams ldan thams pad kyi na gang can mtshan sna pang srung mdza 'dis ba sngags pan// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig da kyi
240b2(1): mtsha mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho daphyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ring ba 'am/ nye ba'am de bzhin gnon
240b3(1): pa gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing mchog zhes pa dang / chos sngon lta spos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma
240b4(1): mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mo tshe rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po radri po chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de ltar bas
240b5(1): na rgyal po chen po rnam grangs kyang 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi thil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
240b6(1): gyis zla bas ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul sha ni tu phra ba snyed la rab
240b7(1): tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba'am de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba 'am/ de la phyag bya ba'am/ bsnyen bkur ba'am/ 
240b8(1): de las chos mnyam pa bde bla ga ma yini par shes par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal por ni chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang
241a1(1): @chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gas pa/ 'jig rten gi khams
241a2(1): mche de ni phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rter gi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni thag ji srid cig na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig na bzhugs shing 'tshe
241a3(1): zhes pa dang / chos ldan bstan du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal porani
241a4(1): chen mang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gi khams 'di'i nub phyogs legs kyis mtshams kyi mtha' 'di nas/ 'jig rten
241a5(1): gi khams rgya mtsho la 'jig rten gyi khams bgrogs gi rdul shin tu pra bskyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba
241a6(1): yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrubs pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de ltar bzhugs
241a7(1): / 'tsho zhing gnas pa// chos kyang sngon do// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang rgyal bar ni ba chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche mo shes
241a8(1): ma mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod de ldang rten yang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring bkra ci smos snyamanas
241b1(1): de ltar rjes bsams te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu spobs pa med pa la spogs pa ting nge 'dzin
241b2(1): rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul sha ni tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag go// de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i mad la/ rgyal po la rin chen mang po
241b3(1): la/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gri khams rgya mtsho mang po// 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul sha ni du pra ba snyed na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ci snyed bzhugs pa de dag
241b4(1): thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rla bas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do// / 
241b5(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de dag gis de ltar rgyal por ni po chen mang po byin gyis rlab pa mdzad ma thag tu/ de'i mod la la 'jig rten gi khams rgya
241b6(1): mchos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad drang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrubs pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang
241b7(1): mdzad dang / 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen
241b8(1): mtshanam par snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shini tu phra ba snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
242a1(1): rgya mtshan skyed bzhugs pa da ga thams cad da bani gshegs pa thams pa ye shes kyi skabs dam rnamatshal sags pa/ yegasaH
242a2(1): mtsha dag gi khams kyi mchos 'brel ba zla bstid kyis rab gams/ dus gsum kyang d+ha pa rnam par nargyu tsha migasas// mig rgya 'jig na gyi pas
242a3(1): man su sa da sa mtha pa rnapa pa tshal su bras thas la/ ma' ya byung bab la las
242a4(1): sa rgyal bar cha mangs da 'dzi 'bus pas pas ma tha bang dang la sna nga las
242a5(1): yo/ bam ldan pas bdaga'ajig na gyi ba sa rgya mtshor bani gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snang pa la rab tu gnas par re bzhin gshegs pa ye shes pa ca
242b1(1): sa ldan 'das ma shes tshun man rnam par snang ma nga de la phral gyi/  la ba na ma pa kyang rgya smrams sa mtshal
242b2(1): su ma bum bsted pa da ga dang / brgya mtsho 'jig nir gyi lam mcho bu'i rdul zhon ma se khri cha

263b1(1): dga' bam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mi bye brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul//

263b3(1): ba zhes bya'o// rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o/ nang dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// lus la yod ba zhes bya'o// rab tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ tshogs pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// 
263b4(1): sdug bsngal gyi skyon can zhes bya'o// rtag par bya ba zhes bya'o// rang la bzhol ba de med pa zhes bya'o// 'gro zhing 'ong pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
263b5(1): dge gang sdug sngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na/ 'chi ba zhes mi bya'o// mdud par 'dzin
263b6(1): pa zhes bya'o// rab tu sbyar ba zhes bya'o// tshor pa'i yan lag ces bya'o// an sems pa zhes bya'o// rab rib byed pa zhes bya'o/ mdud par byed pa ni
263b7(1): b+ha//  tu gdung po nas bya'o// kye byad na'o zhes bya'o// kye rdul ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la la
263b8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams mche ba/ stsogs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ g.yo ba med pa zhes bya'o// skyed med pa zhes bya'o// mnyams pa zhes byal/ 'tshogs
264a1(1): pa med pa zhes bya'o// chad med pa zhes bya'o// yangs pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi yan lag ces bya'o// 'dod chags dang thal
264a2(1): skyes bya'o// mchags pan zhes byar/ ce rgyal du'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i bded pa nas bya ba la yang / 'jig rten gyim
264a3(1): ched na/ brtan pa'i snod a yul zhes bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i samatshams zhes byang / bden pa la thub pa zhes bya/ don ba tu rung ba zhes bya'o// 
264a4(1): bzhin la bdugs pa zhes bya'o// lta ba yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// dran pas sgrubs pa zhes bya'o// grol ba sdud pa zhes bya'o// skyob pa'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o// 
264a5(1): 'khrugs myed pa grong zlos dra'o// kye rgyal po'i sras dag ldar de dag la grogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ming ni/ 'phags pa'i dzin darnams la tshad bye rgya snang
264a6(1): ma /  mas semams rgyas pangs pa sa ga/ rnas ma dag
264b1(1): ma she bya'o//  rgyal dra'i sa pa rdzug na la ga byung ba 'phamam par 'dzi pa zhes bya ba ma pa 'a ma sa las rdzu rdzogs
264b2(1): 'dug du'i ga nas bya 'o// sems kyi tshul zhes bya'o// brdzing ma pa dang ldan pa zhes byar/ rjes mthun pa zhes gyur/ dmang 'artogs pa ma yin panas tha'
264b3(1): rnal 'byor dang mi 'thun pa zhes bya'o// rtag par bya zhes bya'o// sgo zhes bya'o// rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o// skabs pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
264b4(1): gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/ gnas pa med pa zhes bya'o// sbyin sreg
264b5(1): dam pa zhes bya'o// phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o// mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// kun tu song ba zhes bya'o// du ba med pa zhes bya'o// mi zad zhes bya'o// yangs pa zhes
264b6(1): bya'o// shin tu mchod pa zhis bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'bigs pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten
264b7(1): khams dbyangs sgrog san/ mdzang bas mthong ba zhes bya'o// rang ba'i don ces bya'o// rnam par rnam pa'i mu shes bya'o// mtshan da 'jug pa rna
264b8(1): ri ba bka' bzhis byar/ de ma thas pa'i di sa rgya'o// mkhas pa dgas pazhis tha'o/  di sa bya/ migs ma
265a1(1): khyad par gi don ces bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la stsogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/ 'phags pa'i
265a2(1): bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba rgya stong zag bzhi sgra yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji ltar ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'ja
265a3(1): gyi khams mi mjed 'din/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bder pa rnams yongasu snyan pa yod de de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye brgya stong chad med pa/ 
265a4(1): dpag tu med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun du mtha' yas pa su med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyangs
265a5(1): kyi lis pa nam rtse kha'i dbyings kyi mtha' btugs padag na'ang / 'brags pa'i bden pa rnams yong su ldan pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re rin yang / 'phags
265a6(1): nga'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye brgya stong zag bzhi bcu'i bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// shar phyogs kyi
265a7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams na ji ltar de bzhin du/ lce phyogs dang / de bzhin du rub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / 
265a8(1): de bzhin du gar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lo ba kyi phyogs marnams dang / de bzhin nub byang gi phyogs pams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs
265b1(1): mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba zag khrig brgya tshad pa/ grangs med pa bsams gis mi khyab pa/ marungs pa med pa/ 
265b2(1): kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pas mtshams med pa gzhal tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa/ nAmakho' dbyings kyi mthas btugs bdag
265b3(1): na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su bstan pa yod do// 'jig rten gi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong zag bcu bzhi bcu
265b4(1): bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gi sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'dul lo// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ni ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams
265b5(1): cad na shar phyogs nas/ steng gi phyogs shes bya ba nas/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi bar dag na yang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su

265b7(1): bzhin du 'dul lo// kun tu 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang / lam gi bden pa'i ming dag kyang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i ma

271a3(1): sangs rgyas shing/ yon tan thams rnga pha rol phyin pa dang / mur brdul gsal nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong / la las chos kyi 'khor la skor bar yang
271a4(1): blugs rje chen po ses bde mthong ngo // las skye dgu med rnams 'dul bar/ skyes bladam pa de de bzhin mthod / lwa las gza'i brjod 'chungs
271a5(1): dri midang ste/ 'dug rter thams cad dz+wal tshwa sgyu ma nar med de/ rtswa dz+wal rag mengan med stobs pa ba/ steng gi 'ang ro srog byur de ba ni mthong
271a6(1): la las rab tu zhi ba'i thugs mda' bu/ 'jig rten snron ma myud ni ngas par mthong / rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas kyang / stobs bcu'i bstobs mnga'
271a7(1): de dag rab tu shes/ de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gi khams de dag nas 'das ni/ shir phyogs logs su 'jig rten ga khams stong snang bar byas nas bzhud de
271a8(1): bzhin du ming gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spang gyi bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'jam bu'i grong bye ba zag brgya bstan nas 'jog
271b1(1): min bye ba zug tu'i bar du snyan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khungs su gang ni la rung ste/ gtogs par de dag thams cad rol gyis bsam
271b2(1): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun yang de bzhin
271b3(1): gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi gangan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems
271b4(1): dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dog ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang
271b5(1): de'i dngul gyi bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams maud 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser
271b6(1): gi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'jo ba'i mdo gces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtsha mad ches
271b7(1): bya ba'i na 'bring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod bu drug ste/ 'di ltung ringag byed mi ga yo'i ban+de sna byu na/ reg byed sna tshogs zhes byang gan par dag go// 
271b8(1): chub sems dpa' de ga thams cad kyang ri re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi mi bya rjem shin tum bsri dang lhan cig tu na bdas sacan rnaM
272a1(1): bde bzhin thams cad do/ thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba shes gdang don 'di brjod de/ gcig ji ltar
272a2(1): de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// gang gis bde gshegs rnams kyi chos
272a3(1): zab pa/ zil gyis gnon pa med par brjod pa rnams/ gang la 'jig rten rtag tu myos gyur pa/ de dag thams cad rims kyi rab tu son/ gal te bdag gcig med
272a4(1): du zin na naM/ de'i spyod yul stong pa zhi ba'ang med/ rab byung rdul rnams shin tu gsal ba yi/ bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar byung / mkhyen dang rnam grol zhab
272a5(1): dang ldan pa rnams/ mtshungs pa med pa grangs kyang nam yang med/ de ni 'jig rten 'di na las dag/ rgyal thogs pa med par 'dod phyir ro// gang la phung po med cing
272a6(1): med de/ skye mched dag dang skye zhing 'chi med pa/ de yi grangs ni 'jig rten 'di skyes pa/ skyes bu med ge rnams su rab tu rjod/ nang dang phyi zhes bya bar btags pa rnams/ de
272a7(1): ngag rang bzhin dngos nyid sdong po ste/ rtogs med cing rnam chog de bzhin med gzhal du med med pa'i chos nyid 'di 'dra'o// de dag la ni g.yo ba nam yang med/ sems shing
272a8(1): ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med/ 'jig rten thams cad rjes su rab tu khyen/ mtha' yas 'dul ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin skyong yul dgos pa
272b1(1): rnams rtse gcig gnams 'ang spyod pa ma yin te/ yad kyis tshogs pa de la gang yang med/ 'dzin sangs rgyas rnam 'dul mtha' yangs so// d+ha dang rkyen dang bya ba
272b2(1): ngag dang pi las kyi rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis/ rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes mi ldog ste/ bde gshegs chos ni de ltar bsam mi khyab/ phyogs rnams bcu na ji la
272b3(1): 'khod pa yis/ 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzigs shing / sems can tshad med yongs su 'grel mdzad kyang / skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog mi mnga'/ thams cad mkhyen
272b4(1): ba nyid ni gser ge mdog/ de yang kun na rnam par kun tu gnas/ de dag bsam pa ji 'dra ji bzhin du thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston// bam po bcu bdun pa
272b5(1): de nas 'od gzer drag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnams 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rngon gyi khams stong phrag bcu sdang bar byas so// gzhung de bzhin du
272b6(1): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu sdang bar byas so// 'jig rte gyi khams re reng yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag rgya snyan pa nas/ 'og min skye
272b7(1): bzag brgya'i bar du snyan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ji yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ral gyis snyan to// ji ltar
272b8(1): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gangaral ba bzhugs shing / bya ba chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhi bcu'i rdul shin tu bsnyed dang thabs cog par snang ba
273a1(1): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhug

273a3(1): dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag te/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal nas/ bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
273a4(1): cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ring 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs bdag ste/ 'di ltar gser gi mdog nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag go// byang chu bems
273a5(1): dpa' di dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'amatshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi na sgyur/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mig yo ba nas/ reg byed
273a6(1): sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' dang gra thams cad re re zhing yang / byang chubo sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyeng dang
273a7(1): lhan cig tu phyin bdag ste/ gcig ji lta ba bzhin tu thams cad de/ thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod do// 
273a8(1): gcig na ji la bde bzhin thams cad yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar 'gyur to// lnga dang 'jig chen pa thams cad batshal mnan te/ 
273b1(1): snying rje la yang gang zhig sems gdog zhing 'gro ba thams cad bskyab par zhugs pa'i rnams/ de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / bde bshegs rnams la snying nas
273b2(1): dang skyed cing / gang gi sems ni nam yang mi ldog par/ sangs rgyas spyod pa yong su mi gdong ba de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / gang rnams gang tu 'jug pa 'od med ci
273b3(1): sangs rgyas yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa/ shin tu rngan pa blo gdung med pa rnams/ de dag las ni 'drar 'gyur bar bya'o// gang rnams gro ba zhing 'dug dang 'chag pa'i tshe/ 
273b4(1): nyin mtshan rgyun du rjes su sem byed cing / sangs rgyas dag nyid che la sems sbrel ba/ de dag la sra ni 'di 'dza' 'gyur bar 'ong / dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal byas kyang
273b5(1): gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas yin nan rjes su glo ba mos pa/ de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ad/ bdag gi rang bzhin yongasu gan
273b6(1): gzhal byas shing / thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang / bdag dang bdag med 'dod chags bral ba'i sems/ de dag la ni 'di 'drar gyur par 'ong // 
273b7(1): gzhan go bsam pa yongs gzhal byas shing / rtag dang rnam chog thams cad rab sbyangs te/ spyod pa 'di dang ldan 'gyur ba/ de dag las ni 'di 'angar 'gyur
273b8(1): rabang gang rnams pas ma gas mi khyab zhing 'alal zhing / sems can rgya mchi yid kyis 'dzin byed de/ blo can rdulaphral spobs dang ldan gyur ba/ 
274a1(1): byabya/ de dag las ni 'dri 'drar 'gyur Sh+To/ gang gis zhing rnams rnam par bsam pa ma/ gzugs dang gzugs med 'a
274a2(1): shes yong med pa/ thams cad grangs su nye bar 'gro ba ni/ de dag lus ni 'di 'dra' 'od 'gyur bar 'ong / gang rnams ning gi rdul tu nis byas shing / 
274a3(1): thams cad phyogasu bkang zhing bgrang bya ste/ de dag nang du rgyul 'dzud byed pa/ de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'od/ de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten
274a4(1): gi khams do gnas/ shar byeg su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya snang bar byas nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong brag rgya'i bar du snang

274a8(1): rgya gan yang / de bzhin ga shegs pabye ba phrag rgya dge sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par srid ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi

274b6(1): dge ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad / thams cad na yang byang sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag go// don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig ji lta ba de
274b7(1): bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ de'i tshe tshigs su cad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas sba bar gyur te/ mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu chen la/ gang dag kha dog rigs kyis
274b8(1): lta 'dod pa/ mi 'ams log par lta bar gyur pa ste/ de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyes dag ni/ 'jig rten kun ma'ang shes par nus pa med
275a1(1): gang gis bskal pa bye ba bsam glang / mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid mi mnga'
275a2(1): chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben/ yang la ga kun lngar ldan nyams med la/ bsam pa bzhin du kun rab tu snang / sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa tshan// 
275a3(1): gang rnams ci yang 'di 'dul shad de/ ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas/ sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu dben/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po 'jigs pa ma
275a4(1): 'byung dang 'jigs par spro bar mi mdzad de/ mnga' brnyes mnga' 'gyur rnam par gdon miza/ brjod du med pa brtan pa rnam par spyod/ lus dang sems kyang mnyam bang rab 'gyur zhi
275a5(1): bya yis rnam par byen pas na/ gnyis po gang du mi rung shes pa'i rnams/ chags med btsangs med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// gya nom snang zhing thugs gsal 'os mdzad pa/ 
275a6(1): snod tshul yongs dag kun du snang 'gyur te/ thams cad pakhyen pad+ma kun ra bzhugs/ skye dgra 'don kyang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad/ gcig tu mye cing mang po rab tu 'gyur/ ma
275a7(1): byung ba cig dung pa la thams dum phyugs na byung/ rnams pa d+ma dang 'dra bar ngacu 'gyur/ sku med de la chags pagang yang med bya
275a8(1): med cing bas gas med na yang / bam tha' yas rnam sa dag byas zhing / 'gro ba sna tshogs lus su lnga 'jig rnam thams cad sems kyis brnags pa
275b1(1): sems dag pa nam yang ma yin te/ bde gshegs ye shes de 'dra rang banan no/ de phyir rgyal ba'i sprin 'di 'drar snang / de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das sa
275b2(1): phyogs logs su 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya stong zag bcu snang bar byas nas/ gzung de bzhin du snying gi phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya stong phrag bcu yi snang bar byas so//

275b4(1): gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad rol gyis bstan to/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
275b5(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu thams bskyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa'i phyag rgya dag na/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba
275b6(1): phrag brgya dag/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu
275b7(1): yongs par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gi bar dag go// 
275b8(1): byang chub sems de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gi mdog ces byas nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog
276a1(1): ces kha'i bdug go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zhapas 'bring nasatshangs
276a2(1): pa'i spyad pa spyod pa ste/ 'di ltar rig byed kyi mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rigs byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar bdag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems
276a3(1): dang 'ong shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tham bsred dang ldan cig tu dran pa dgas/ gcig rngu rdul ba bzhin thams cad do/ thams cad na yang byang chub
276a4(1): semam dpa' 'ang mdapas zhes bya ba gas ga na 'di cing brjod pa/ gnangs pa rje btsun rnams cad na mang brji pa tshamamasas cad pa'ad kyang pa pa rnas
276a5(1): 'jig rten dang 'byung de las mchog med pa/ maM gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi rnams// drang phreng chen po sring pa'i sgyur 'grel pa/ yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no// 'du 'ji med cing
276a6(1): chags pa ma mnga' ba'i/ 'du shes dngos med gnas med pa'i rnams/ bung sum dge ldan sman pa mi mnga' bo/ mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par bka'/ shin tu'ang sdang dag par gyur
276a7(1): banam sa/ rgal tugags med pa rnams/ gam med thams rnams par sangs pa la/ bde gshegs rnams te ye shes tshul 'di yin/ lusa? dang sems la rnam par rgog
276a8(1): bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba/ de dgachos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la/ nam yang nam nur dbang du mi 'gra / 'jig rjemangag ma ma

276b5(1): la gcig pa yodang med do/ mang dang cig pa rnam par sgom byas/ sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur/ 'jig rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang / 
276b6(1): blune tushrI ba chos rnams rnam ldas de/ mi banas sems la jog mi mnga' zhing / rngan ldan sangs rgyas byung chub ba brla 'gyur/ sems nan chos dang de bzhin
276b7(1): gi rnams/ de dag rlung bzhin ji bzhin bzhin brtag byas na/ gcig dang zla drang pinA ma yin to/ de ltar sangs tshul 'du shes pa yin/ de nas 'ong
276b8(1): zer de dag 'dzag rten gyi khams de dag nus 'das te/ shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye bsnang bar byas nas/ steng gri phyog kyi 'jig rten
276b9(1): khams pa maphyi'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rerang yang 'jam du'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min gyi bye ba zag brgya'ang

277a3(1): khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba zag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin
277a4(1): rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba na/

277a8(1): chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpa/ 
277b1(1): zhes bya ba ga stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang soso nas smra bar gyur te/ shes rab nga
277b2(1): med chos rnams mtha' yas pa/ sred pa rgya mtsho pha rol phyin pa dag/ che ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od/ yon tan che mnga' de dag sbyor 'dir/ gang gis sangs rgyas

278a2(1): nAmam pa'i dbyings dang sprul pa'i yid ldan rnams/ gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dang / mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams
278a3(1): zlo ba dkur thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o/ zla bzla byed nyin nang nub 'grang zhing / lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa/ 'jig rten 'a
278a4(1): zhing 'jig par 'gyur pa dang / grangs tshul sum rtogs de dag sbyor 'odi'o// zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba/ gzugs dang gzugs med 'du

294b2(1): gyi khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs gi med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar byung
294b3(1): bal mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ 
294b4(1): brtson 'grus yang dag byung chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu byung ba yang dag byang chub
294b5(1): kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin
294b6(1): stong pa nyid yongasu slob pa yin/ ma sgom pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongasu sgoms pa yin/ smyon pa med pa yang su sgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ 
294b7(1): tshul khams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tu yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bsamA tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ shes rab
294b8(1): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
295a1(1): phyin pa gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes bya bar khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs dang / da ltar byung ba'i
295a2(1): las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khongasu rung ba yin/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs rdzogs par bya ba gnas cig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ 
295a3(1): khams sna tshogs dang / khams du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud ba yin/ mos pa sna rnyogs dang / mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud po yin/ kun 'tsho ba'i lam
295a4(1): shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs dang / rnam pa byung
295a5(1): ba dang / ldan pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsgribs pa med par rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du pa yin/ lha'i mig ni chags pa med pa bya ba khong
295a6(1): chung pa yin/ bag chags kyi tshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad par shes par bya ba khong du rung ba yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongasu gzung ba yin/ k+Sha'i dbang
295a7(1): yongasu bzang ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ dri zi'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po yongasu bzung ba yin
295a8(1): nam pal rdzing gi dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ maM 'amatsho'i dbang po yongasu bzung ba yin/ khro bye chen pos dbang pos ying su bzang po yin/ ma
295b1(1): dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ kri' dbang pos bkur ba yin/ 
295b2(1): bganod skyon gyi dbang po sa bkur ba yin/ dri'i za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ ra mkha'i lding gi dbang pos ba rku
295b3(1): ba yin/ lte phye chen po'i dang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ sems can tham cad
295b4(1): kyi gnas su gyur pa yin/ skyabasu gyur pa yin dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgor du gyur pa yid sgor mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yir/ 'od
295b5(1): gyur pa lani/ 'dren par gyur pa yid/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongasu 'dren par gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin
295b6(1): rdzo bor gyur pa yin/ mthu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu gyur pa yid/ dam par gyur pa yin/ blar med pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar ri/ byang chub
295b7(1): sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpe'i 'jim gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad
295b8(1): ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sas de ltar khyod kyi bo mang po la len pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la ming brtse ba dang / lhang dang ma rnamasakyi
296a1(1): @don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang / bde bar rnam par gzu gang bskyed pa 'bring zhugs zhing de ltar khrod rnam pa'ing
296a2(1): lta bu'i gnas dag yongasu bar sems panin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dang 'dag gi sems kyi lastsa lang
296a3(1): labyed pa'i stong pa gang drung rnabs/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan mi khyang par 'ang dag thams cad thob par 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
296a4(1): thams cad lo thogs pa med po'i las su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyasu bcom ldan 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / 
296a5(1): sems can yong sum gtog sems kyang dadagu lanye bar gnas pa dang / chos tham sa cang ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / dag
296a6(1): nga'i chos rnams ci mangs par 'gyur dge pa tshal thamasas dang ldan par 'byung ba dang / kun tu bza zhing gan mengs pa dang / rnam pa mchog rnams cad dang ldan
296a7(1): dang chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing gnags thams cad la sbyin pa gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las pa dang / long la byed pa'i gyur ba yod de/ 
296a8(1): ba bra sangs byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i byung ba gang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyang par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur po'i byang chub sems
296b1(1): sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin
296b2(1): shes pa dang ldan pas/ khyim gyi thobs pos zil gyis mnon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
296b3(1): cadaskye bos thams cad yongasu sgrub pa'i'aphyir/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
296b4(1): sems can thams cad med pa dang shin tu thal bas dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba dang / rnam par thal bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs
296b5(1): pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ 'dod pa bsal shing rnam par gsal bar gyur cig ces de ltar sems bskyed do// glu ga
296b6(1): dang sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cang gar mkhan gi tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing / chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob
296b7(1): par gyur cig sems bskyed do// chung ma'i 'khor gi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing 'phags pa'i sar chung bar
296b8(1): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khur bor bar gyur cig
297a1(1): cig sems bstod du/ srung ma zang chupa sems dpa' mas rnams du kyang byu
297a2(1): kyi khang stengs su phyin par gyur ces sems skyed do// sbyin pa gdong bu'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad bdag ging bya ba med de/ yong su 'dzin pa'i sems med
297a3(1): bdag gi thams cad yongasu gtong bar gyur cig ces sems skyed do// ma thal zhing 'grogs pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
297a4(1): mthar phyin te/ 'dra ba de zhin tu thal bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// btson ral kham tho ba mthong ba'i de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
297a5(1): bya nas med pa la spyod cing / gang du dga' bar 'ding bar gyur ces sems bskyed de/ ma nas blam med par byung ba'i ba'i na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
297a6(1): rjed sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing chags pa med de me dgos pa dang thal bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi dra ba'i 'anams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub
297a7(1): sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / 'thun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ mkhan po du na
297a8(1): dan kyi chungs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sams mams ca la gyim nang tshig la ma pa cu tshig tsa sems brjod de// rib
297b1(1): gsol ba'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad par chad med pa cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos dkar
297b2(1): 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cog ces sems bskyed do// 
297b3(1): skra dang kha spu 'dreg pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ 
297b4(1): gos dur srog gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rtog pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
297b5(1): rab tu byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang 'byung bar gyur gcig ce sna sems bskyed de/ 
297b6(1): sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par skyes pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdang mi'i chang pa
297b7(1): don du brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos la sgrubasu 'gro ba'i de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob par
297b8(1): gur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs 'gro ba'i tshe/ zang nab sems dpa' sems can thams cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral ning / dge 'dum

298a3(1): ldan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad ldog pa ma yin pa'i las la skyed cing rul drang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems
298a4(1): can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing / mi skye ba'i yegs kyi pha rol du phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/ 
298a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur ci go ces sems bskyed de// gtsug
298a6(1): lcag khang du 'gro ba'i rtse/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ blan med pa'i gnas la rnam par myong bar
298a7(1): cing ces sems bskyed de/ stan gting ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rlos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par dga' ba'i chos can du
298a8(1): gur cig ces semos bskyed do// 'dug pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyi ma snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur
298b1(1): ces sems bskyed do// kyi skyil mo krung 'cha ba'i ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi kho ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstan par gyur cig ces
298b2(1): sems bskyed do// ni gnas yongasu spyod bar byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson ning ni ba dang / 
298b3(1): dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ lhag mthong yongasu sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
298b4(1): shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ chos yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig sems bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe/ 
298b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing / 'du byed pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig par rnam par mthong bar gyur cig ces
298b6(1): sems bskyed do// rkang zil gzhog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur
298b7(1): cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang pa'i zil 'degs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa ma dang ldan pa thob ste/ 'khor
298b8(1): ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las thon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gleng logs gyon pa'i ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad ngom shes ning
299a1(1): rnal med patha med pa dang ldan na pa bzhin na pa na sa sa smra bskyed do//

299a3(1): bskyed de/ thag brdzun pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams cad khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ gang nas gong du dge pa

299b2(1): thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sosems bskyed do/ lag pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
299b3(1): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bzung zhing bcangs pa'i phyir bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ngo cha ga pa'i tshe/ byang chub
299b4(1): sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces skyed do// bar ba len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sa
299b5(1): dpa' sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing lam ston par gyur cig ces sems skyed do// lhung bzed len pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
299b6(1): 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'ong shid sdong du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyod yul du mngon par zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
299b7(1): gnas meng pa la yang dag par gnos ni sangs rgyab kyi spyod yul la mang ni dpyugs pa gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam du zhugs pa'i che/ byang chu
299b8(1): dpa' sems can thams phyin pa ma lus par 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur tshig ces sems bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
300a1(1): thams cad can rnam par dag pa chos pamapa pa med bathub pa bas/ nam kyang byung sa mtha' dang thas med ga khang du chu
300a2(1): gyur cig sas sems bskyed do// lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa med de/ khams gsum las chen du 'phags
300a3(1): par gyur cig nas sems bskyed do// lam dma' bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bdun zhing sangs rgyas
300a4(1): thams cad la shin tu 'drang par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ lam+bu byung ba mthong ba'i de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams cad lta ba mang na mi rdung ba
300a5(1): dang bral te/ meng pa yang sa sangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'amadzang po mthong bya ng+ge/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gi mi ma
300a6(1): sna med de/ sems dang po dang lhun bar rngu cig ces sems bskyed do// lamadza byed che ba mthong ba rjid/ TIng du ba sams dpa' sems can thams cad na
300a7(1): med pa'i chos yang dag par mthob ste/ 'dod chags par gyur de'i chos las rnam par 'brel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ 
300a8(1): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongasu bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khor thong ba'i tshe/ 
300b1(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems cam thams cad dus gsum du gtogs pa'i chos pab mo bstan pa dang / 'thun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dka' ba mtho ba / 
300b2(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad khro zhing khon du 'dzim pa dang bral te/ khyengs pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / rnam par thal bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ 
300b3(1): rlugs chal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad lha dang 'jig rten du bcus pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ 
300b4(1): ri mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thob par dga' ba dang / thibs po med pa rab tu thob cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par
300b5(1): 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing chen ma can mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang // 
300b6(1): gti mug med cing cher mdang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing lam can mthong ban/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad ches

300b8(1): me tog mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas/ me tog lta bur gyur
301a1(1): / gcus sems bskyed // me dog gi zhing mthong ba 'i/ byung dub sems dpa' sems can thams ca

301a3(1): na thams cad snying po byang chub tu gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thams cad 'azlas bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa thob par gyur cig ces sems
301a4(1): bskyed do// chu klung mthong ba'i rgyu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams myong ste/ chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par gnA ga ba

301a7(1): la mkhas ning/ chos thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i tshig ga la dang / ldan par zur cig nas sems bskyed de/ khron pa maH pa / byang chub

301b1(1): sems dpa' sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmyigs pa la/ rab tu brtson zhing dge ba'i tsho ba mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do

301b8(1): na rkyen gyis btsun pa mthong ba'i ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyis the chen po'i mtshan sum bcu cu gnas kyis brgyan par chu
302a1(1): cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
302a2(1): na thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyun med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dga' ba mang ba'i sems can thams cad chos
302a3(1): la dga' cung mos pa dang / thobs dga' ba mang por gyur tugaces sems bskyed do// mi dga' ba mang pa'i sems nam mthong ba'i /

309a8(1): de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas// 'gro ba yongs su smin par gang mkhas pa// 'gro snang ye shes tshul la mkhas pa yi// 'gro bsdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa/

309b7(1): yon tan yongs kyis su rgyan pa// de dag bsod nams pas dam pas lus kyang sbyangs// bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus sbyangs pa// de dag gser ge ri bo 'ang ba

309b9(1): nga nga gis ma ga da ma pa du la la kyid rgyan cing ma cag gang ma ba ra bamapasas tshangams
310a1(1): mang sa ra 'byung ba/ de brgyam pa da gangar bzhugs pa// spyon cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtem kun tu yang // don yong rnams par gyud cing sems cam dul// gang rnams rgyal ba pang pa gang na bzhugs pa
310a2(1): ston cing phyogs bcu kun tu yang dag bzhugs// don yod rnam spyod sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon pashes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// gang gis mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de dag bsam gyi mi khyab chos ston cing // sems
310a3(1): bas mtshan gyis mi khyab dgar byed pas// bsam gis mi khyab zhing rnam rnam par spyod// gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // mtha' yas sems can dga' bar su byed pa// de dag bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na// so so yang dag rig mthus
310a4(1): sems can 'dul// so so yang dag rig pa'i ye shes mthus// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba// de dag lus dang gri yid rtag dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu byung // gang gis lus dang ngag yid rta gtus su// ye shes sngon
310a5(1): tu 'gro bar rab 'byung ba// de dag smon lam stobs kyis ji dga' bar// sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston// smon lam stobs kyi gang rnams ci dga' bar// sems can rgyud du bzugs nang ston byed pa// de dag tshig
310a6(1): tu brjod cing sras yang // rnal dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab// tshig tu brjod cing cing dang ci sA yang // gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam las pa// de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis
310a7(1): gang gis ma lus 'thob thams cad kyi/ bsam pa'i sems rnams sung kyis mashes pa// de dag skyes dang mni 'jo rloms yang med/ nyon mo satsun na pazhin slob med// skye nga'i chi 'pho gapa med pa yang //  mo bcung bang bzhin gyi
310a8(1): de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyi spos par 'jig rten kun tu spyod// yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing // chos kyis smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa// de dgas bcu rnams dang dbang bcu yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod// gang rnams sa
310a9(1): bad bar rnams bcu po yi/ pha rol gyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa// de dag mngon shes can gyis rnam par 'phrul// ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob// mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam bral zhing / ting la ni mchog kyis rnams spyod mus thob ga/ 
310b1(1): dedage phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang skur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad nod byed pa// de dag sbyin por phyogs bcu
310b2(1): sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthi'i bdud brtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang skur ba// de dag ma lus namakha' rgyas byas shing / phyogs
310b3(1): mas kun tu mthu brtan gnas pa te// gang rnams mamakha' ma lus rgyas bkang zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa// dpe' med de dag spyod yul shes par ni// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus so// dper
310b4(1): med gang gi spyod yul shes bya bar// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus pa// de dag brtson 'grus thams cad don yang yod// mthong dang ming thos spobs pa don yod do// gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod cing / mthong
310b5(1): dang mi mthos spobs pa don yod pa// skyes chen de dag sbyin pa gtong ba yi// sbyin pa'i gnas te thams cad don yang yod// skyes bu dam pa de dag byir mthu yis// dam chos tshul ni mi 'jig rten par gnas// dge ba'i las lam
310b6(1): dam pa mchog rnams kyang // rin chen 'jamathus kun na rgyu zhing gnas// rdo rje stug po'i rin chen tshogs yod pas// de yi mthu' yi rgya mtsho'i rin chen rnams// mi bal zhi zhing 'gribs pa gang yang med // de bzhin yon dam
310b7(1): mtha' yas yon tan mtsho// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs ning rnams gang yod pa// de dag kun tu byung chub sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang na ngam chos med gyur pa// de dag kun tu'ang chos kyi gter ston to// de dag mi rtog rnam b+har mi
310b8(1): kun gyig zlab par phyogs mas thams cad du// zlab lnga drar gzugs brnyan sto byed cing // thabs mang ston gyis sems can 'dul babyed// de dag skang cig re reng byang chub tu// rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcung ldan du ma la
311a1(1): / lo skor dang mya ngan 'da' zhi dang // sku bdud rje che de bzhin dpa' bo ston// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyalas// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa// yongs su ston cing skal pa bsam yas su// theg pa
311a2(1): gsum gi sgonas sems can 'dul/ khye'u bu mo de bzhin bung med lus// skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams dang // gdod sbyor grul bu pa lho 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ mos pa thams cad dul ma pas yongs su ston// ting la ni rgya mcho ba rgya yi skong gnas
311a3(1): 'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni de meng dang // cha byang spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gi rnams// thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston pa byed// de dag ning dran bsam gis mi khyab ste/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod par byed// de dag 'od zer mang zin
311a4(1): bsam mi khyab// sems can 'phel ba'i ye shes mtha' yang yas// de tshig gi rnam rdul ye shes rnam 'phral dang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste// sbyin pa rul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bzod pa'i dron 'grus rnam 'phrul bas ma mi
311a5(1): khyab// de dag bsam gtan shes rab rnam 'phrul dang // thabs dang mngon zhes rnam 'phrul bsam me khyab// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin sgo dag nas// yon tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang las// de dag rdul phan 'jug pa'i 'ching
311a6(1): la ni rnams rdul can kun ma mngan par bsgrub byed cing // drul pa che gcig bas ma mas nang rnams/ khyon pa byed kyang rdul la 'phrul bamed// rdul cigace la'ang sangs rgyas bzhugs gang dang / sangs rgyas mi bcugs ning lang
311a7(1): dab mi rbog la thams na mangs rnams das nga/ yang zhing tha nga che ba nang mang sgom yang mas lal la mang 'dra bdang // la skye drug pa rims kyis garnas par un/  la snrel gan tshwab r+b+ha pa
311a8(1): mi gad ya mag tha zung sas / de du tho ba na mthas thams pa su ban / nga ca yi phru lam// mamalams mas ma ga sa
311b1(1): dang rdzogs dang // gabar gyi can dang na ner ma thang ba// lag thal de das char du mngan bar 'byebs/ grags mas mtha' las kun gyi yo byung mas/ rang bang ma ru
311b2(1): 'os pa// de dag lag mthal de nas char du 'babebs// byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed// rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs ni ji sbed pa// rnga chen rnga dang pi bang sA sman dang // rol me bdung bkrol
311b3(1): gling bu sbar ba rnams de dag lag thal de nas sgra yang sgrogs// phyogs bcu dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi// bde bshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs pa dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcad
311b4(1): bsgrubs pa sna tshogs kyang // lag thal de nas sba ba rab stan par 'byung // de dag 'od zer las dges longs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyeng byed cig/ rgyal ba'i ning rnams sa
311b5(1): chus ma lus par// kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod// 'od zer yid 'ong snadro zhing rgyan ldan pa// la ga pa'i mthal bkye pad ma bsam mi khyab// pad ma rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs/ mang po da
311b6(1): zhing rgyal ba mchod par byed/ 'od zer me tog rgyan rnam rab kyi zhing // me tog rgyan dang me chog tha dang / me tog sa tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che bdag rgyal ba mchong // 'ong zer myos kyi rgyan rnams
311b7(1): rab kyi zhing spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang // sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bka' zhing // bdag 'ad che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ 'od zer rgyan dang na badza' tha ze dang // nabazang sna tshogs kun tu yang
311b8(1): bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rin can rgyan rnams rab kye zhing // rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bla re dang // rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid
311b9(1): rme ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer pad ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // pad ma'i rgyan dang pad ma'i tha re dang // pad ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyidi che ba de dag rgyal bas/ 
312a1(1): par po gang gi sas de ltu / nga smras ts+tsha
312a2(1): de dag 'od gzer rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab// gang la 'o gzer bsam las rgya mayod pa/ de dgu 'od las bang du mang po byug/ gang gis 'od las pa
312a3(1): mang mchod 'od zer 'gred pa'i rgyan rnams rab kyi ba/ 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang 'phreng ba'i bla re dang / 'breng bsna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag
312a4(1): rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab kyi zhing / de dag rgyal mtshan dkar ngam ser po dang // sngo nga sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan chen gis//

312a8(1): shing // bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du/ thabs mang srong gis sems can 'dul ba med// la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang // sbyin pa
312b1(1): bsam gis mi khyab btang ba'i sgo// sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims so// babod pa ma zang mi srul so dag dang // la la brtul zhugs dka' thub
312b2(1): brtson 'grus so// bsam gtan rab tu zhi gnas sngo dag dang // don rnam de bar 'bred pa'i shes rab sgo// rdul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgong gang ngo // tshangs pa
312b3(1): skyed pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos pos 'phan tshol sgo dag dang // bsod nams yongasu bsags dang ye shes sgo// bden brten pa'i rnam thar sro dag
312b4(1): dang / la la stobs dang dbang po lam gri sgo// nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang // rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa bsgo// theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul spo ngag
312b5(1): dang // la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo// la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang // mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo// la la ni 'gog nyid 'i dzin
312b6(1): sgo dag dang // 'gro ba'i skyong sgo ji snyed yod rgyal// de sted chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te de dag kun gyi sgo'i sgo dang // bsdam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul
312b7(1): gang rnams kun gyi sgo'i sgo dganas// bas mi nga ji bzhin sems can 'dul bying ba// de dag maran ma gzung bar mi nus te// ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul
312b8(1): ni de 'a'o// de ga dpa' ba'i rgyan gyi tshang 'a na mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs ldan byed 'thun pa// dpa' bar sngo bar ba ldan kun ldan pa /

313a3(1): sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed// gos dang rgyar mchog yongasu

313b8(1): can 'dul ba byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs btsu ma 'jigs pa zhi// chos kyi khya par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba brjod byed cing /

317a2(1): rang bzhin rnams// bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo// 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bgyi zhing // sems can ni snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ 
317a3(1): zang gzugs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin// chos rnams la ni yongs su phan btags te// drang srong rnams la
317a4(1): kyis bsrung byas shing // 'gro ba kun la chos bzhin pan btags pas// 'od zer chos kyis rnams 'phrul de grub bo// 'od zer stod dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / 
317a5(1): sems can 'jungs pa'i steng des skal ba// sgyid pa l+lit+ma na shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur// 'jungs pa 'dul dka'i sems can mdul dpa
317a6(1): nor rnams rmi lam srin tshul shes gyur nas// dpa' bo'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam grol bas// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des sgrub bo// 'od zer yongs su gdung med papa
317a7(1): brtsanapa/ yul ngarna rnams kyang ga des 'phrul ba// tshul sems ma ga rabatu ga nas gnas gyur te// rang byung 'byung bar bya ma ma sems kyir do// 
317b1(1): ba las 'am mangs sru ga sa sa/ tshul khams papa la semasas mang baphrul du/ zung chubs la d+hA
317b2(1): gdung med 'od gzer de grub bo// bzod pas rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing // mi zod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// kho ba'i tha ba rgyal yongs
317b3(1): spangs shing // de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// sdig sems ldan la zhes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don la 'khrugs pam byas shing / 
317b4(1): bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas// des ni bzod pas rnabargyan de grub po// 'od zer brtson dang ldan pas rab bkye zhing // le lo'i sems can
317b5(1): ji snyed des bskul ba// rig par rngon zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par brtson pas dkon
317b6(1): mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skye ba med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdung ni lam las yangs 'das te// myur du byang chub bla med rab tu thob/ 
317b7(1): sems ca zang po bcom grus bskul byas te// dgon mchog gsum la mchong ba sa byas nas// ma ma 'dus su mchos yangs bzung bas/ 
318a1(1): ma ldan 'ong bar de zla ga/ rang po na par byed pa rab bcanapa// ma khrugs sems te skyed des bskul
318a2(1): de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyams su mi gnor ma rnams gnag sems su 'gyur// sdig te'i grogs po nyes ldar spyod can dang // 'dra
318a3(1): 'di yongs su rnam par spangs byas te// bsam gtan ni pa'i dgon par rab sngags pas// des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer rder dang shes rab rnam
318a4(1): brgyan rab ba kye zhing // shes rab 'tshal ba'adi snyed des bskul pa// bden dang u par thang ba'i tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs pa shes par
318a5(1): bden dang / mthar tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i chus la brtogs pa shes kyang tshig/ ge ma'i sgor ma'i tshang ladi thob zur nas// shes rab 'od gsal mdza
318a6(1): rdul bar 'igyur// rgyal sring nod dang bdag 'bas yongs gang ste// byang du bdon sa rgya chos rnams dang phrul ba// de dag rib 'gror rab tu brjod byas pas
318a7(1): sar ba rnam bcan 'od zer de sgrub bo// 'ad mar sangasaHsa ldan pang rabapakyi nga// sems ca da med 'ji ga zeng des brtul ba// sangs rgyas pa
318a8(1): kyi mi khyab zhi ma grangs mtshig la bzhugs pa sa nga / lam rgyam bdas ma / pa sems la ma mas ma
318b1(1): sangs rgyas thobs dang tshul mchod byas pas// sangs rgyas ldan pa 'od gzong dis grub bo// 'od zer mi 'jigs spyod par rab bkyi nang // 'angs
318b2(1): gnang sems can ji snyed des phog pa// 'byung po bza' dang bsad cing brdeg pa dang // nang gis 'jigs pa kun las rab tu bkrol mi 'dzags sbyin pas
318b3(1): sems can sgrub pa dang // srog gcod la las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing // 'jigs pas skyabs rol rnams la bya skyabs pas/ 'od zer mi
318b4(1): 'jigs sbyir pa des grub po// 'od zer thams cad bde bar bkye zhing // nang pa ra ba ji snyed des rig pa// thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par grol// 
318b5(1): bsam gautan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob// nang gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi'o ma
318b6(1): mar dag dang // 'bru mar zas slob byin pas de grub po// 'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing // tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba/

318b8(1): dga' 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku zugs bsdud byas zhing / 'di gang sangs rgyas skyibs kyidang byas pas// sangs rgyas ze pa'i 'ang bar des tha
319a1(1): da pa nan 'dri ba byed// chos kyi rimos pas ga tu dga' bar 'gyur// chos kyi ma go'i dus su chos brjod do// chos tshol rnams kyis bsam
319a2(1): brdzogs byas dang // mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis zhes// brjod pas ros rab rjed pangs thob pa/ sangs rgyas sras rnams mangs sna
319a3(1): sra bskul ba'i phyir// 'od zer dbyings dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
319a4(1): gsung du thos/ gsal ba'i dbyangs ster drang srong che sdod do// rol mo sna chen dril gyi sbyin par mas// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung rab don/ yongs su
319a5(1): ba'ang bas 'ang bar dbyangs ldan thob/ 'od zer 'chi med sbyin bar ba bkye nang// sems cad snyed 'od zer des sprul ba// bag med spong ba thams

319b1(1): rnas brtul ba// tshul khams kyad bang nying lam byung bar dang // shes rab khyung par rgyal ba rnams las na// tshul khams 'phags pad dzin 'phags pa/ 
319b2(1): shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes// byang chub don tu sngags shing bstod byas pas// des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob// 'od zer rin chemarnam

319b4(1): ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la// rin chen sdud de rin cen sbyin btang bas// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od
319b5(1): ber grub/ 'od zer mchog tu snang ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des skul ba// mel med pa'i spos ji tshor gyur nas/ sangs rgyas yon tan
319b6(1): rnams la nges par 'gyur// me dang lha'i spos dang byug pa yis// mi yi ga col mchod pa rab byas te// spos kyi rgyal ba'i sku bzugs mchod rten dag/ byas
319b7(1): byas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba zlab// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam rgyan rab bkye zhing // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bdan sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa byas pas snga
320a1(1): mchod dag ma ma sa rgyas yongs padab bas// 'du zer ma dang ldan parab tu thob// 'ad zer wa ba brnam n+dan rab brtson // gas med gos yang rgyan dang lda
320a2(1): 'gyur// gos dang bge pa 'bed ba sna tshogs drug yongs su bdang bsal bsgrub rnam rgyan grub// 'od zing me mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing / bkres pas kha zas tha
320a3(1): mchog thob par 'gyur// kha zas skom dang blo sna tshogs rnams// byin pas zo mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob// 'od zer nor sngon rab tu 'gyeng byas shing / 'phongs pa
320a4(1): rin rten gted rnams thob par 'gyur// gnas dang gter rnams mi rang dkon mchog gsug// gsol pas dang sbed 'od mer dathob bo// 'ad zer mog stong rab
320b1(1): 'od zer le skyong rab tu brtse byas cing // sla sa na yid du 'ong bas/ sangs rgyas bsad// masman brlang bar sla ba rnam sangs te// lam par snga bar khri srung 'ong bar phras
320b2(1): 'od zer lus spyod rab tu bkye byas shing // dbang po nyams dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rjen la// lus kyis rab bzung lus spyod 'od zer thob
320b3(1): 'od zer sems spyong rab tu bkye byas shing // mos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur// ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gror rab byas pas// des ni sems spyod 'od zer de grub
320b4(1): // 'od zer gzugs skyong rab tu bkye rgyu shing // bsam yas sku mnga' mi yi dbang po mthong // sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang // mchod rten brgyan byas bzugs
320b5(1): spyod thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sgra spyod rab tu bkye byas shing // sgra ri sgra min stong par rab tu shes// rgyan las byung bas sgra snyan 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams bstan pas
